objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

lg.l: 1|duryyodhanara mleccharājā sahita bheṭa o jaḷadhara<lb/>byūha darśana 1
2| jāḷandhara byūha bheda o kr̥ṣṇa arjjuna bandī 19
3| garbhastha abhimanyura catrabyūha bheda śrabaṇa, senāpati-<lb/>-tvare tāhāra jaẏa o jaẏadrathara śibaṅkaṭhāru bara prāpti 49
4| abhimanyura ẏekādaśa dvāra bheda o abhimanyu badha 75
5| sañjaẏa dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅkara kathopakathana o arjjunara aśubha<lb/>darśana 122
7|kr̥ṣṇaṅka sahita pāṇḍabaṅka mantraṇā o jadyaratha badhārtha<lb/>arjjunara pratijñā(?) 160
9| arjjunaṅkara prathama o dvitīẏa dvāra bheda 193
10| kr̥pa, śalya, aśvatthāmā sahita arjjunaṅka yuddha 207
12| bhūrisarbaṅkara sātyaki saha yuddha o mr̥tyu, bhīmaṅkara<lb/>byūha bheda 244
15| rātri goḷa yuddhe dr̥pada rājāra mr̥tyu 305
16| ghaṭukā dvārā aḷāẏudhara mr̥tyu o aḷambuṣa dvārā ghaṭukāra<lb/>mr̥tyu 328
18| ghaṭokraca badha o tāhāra pūrba śāpa bibaraṇa 369
19| bhīmasena aśvatthāmā ratha phiṅgidebā, aśvatthāmā<lb/>hastīra nidhana o tāhāra baṁśābaḷī 377
21| droṇa nidhane arjjunaṅkara kopa o aṅgadara<lb/>pitr̥ruṇa pariśodha 396
22| aśvatthāmāra brahma astra praẏoga, droṇaṅkara mr̥tapiṇḍa<lb/>dāha o aśvatthāmāra śoka, astra dāna 434

div.head: {@sāraḷā mahābhārata<lb/>droṇaparba<lb/>duyyodhanara mḷeccharājā sahita bheṭa<lb/>o jaḷadhara byuha darśana@}

lg.l: saṁsāra nāśāṁgatā tuhi se siddha ẏekā | 1 |
agāda saṁsāra sāgara aṭai ẏe māẏā
samasta goṣṭhī kalu nātha hoi ẏeka kāẏā | 3 |

div.note: śuddha saṣṭika nirākuḷa nīḷakaṇu nikaḷaṁka candra<lb/>niśākara mauḷi deba jaẏatu kāśīrudra | (ṭa)
bhogeṇa bhogī svāmī bhābeṇa apramāda | (adhikāṁśa pothi)

lg.l: catrabhedī bāraṇa nātha parama pada śakatā | 11 |
namo namo deba nīḷakaṇṭha nirālamba śvetarūpī
yābata candrārke nātha tohora kāẏā byāpi | 13 |

div.note: yāhāra udaru jāta sakaḷa jagata | (ña)
mahāpuruṣa nātha sakaḷa pāpabhāra gañjā | (ba, ga)
ḍhaṁsilu–dhvaṁsilu |

lg.l: ẏe bhaba bārādhi madhyuṁ bāreka uddhara | 20 |
he budhajane mohora na ghenimā doṣa
ādi anta madhye yāra abasāna nāhiṁ
namaste jaṅkhera purabāsī tumbhe kara rakṣā
śūdramuni sāraḷā dāsaku karibu debī kāraṇa | 26 |
baibasuta manu pucchākale bhīṣmapaboṅg antareṇa kathā

div.note: sarbaloka bandhu haratā karantā |(ca, jha)
bhaba bārādhi nimagne nātha sacintya saẏaḷa |(ca, jha)
saẏaḷa jana tāraṇa caubarga dānī |(bahupothi)
ẏe janme na paḍhili gata janmara abhyāsa |(ga, ca)
piṅgaḷāccthī-piṅgaḷākṣī |
dāhi-dhyāẏi |

lg.l: bho deba kehu kaḷipāriba gaṅgābāli kari lekhā
haraṇī tāraṇī go śrī sāroḷā debī caṇḍī
taba kr̥pā hoile go kahibi droṇapaboṅg kāṇṭi | 33 |
muhiṁ tāhā bhābi cintili mama bakṣasthaḷe | 34 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsaku mukati bāṭa debā | 35 |
se bacana upekṣiṇa kemanta kale kurudebe | 37 |
pantha na pāi yehne loḍai andhaḷi
droṇa moile bābu bātuḷi kisa arthe
mānagobinde boilā guru he bhīṣma ẏemanta kale mote | 41 |

div.note: jaẏatu siṁghabāhinī jhaṅkherapura bāsī | (cha, jha, ṭa)
baila = baḷada |

lg.l: droṇe boile āmbhe tote sandeśa kahibuṁ
antapure bijekara tumbhe, āmbhe nityakarma sāribuṁ | 42 |
meḷaccha deśara maẏa nāme asura rājā
batiśa marbhmata tule aneka mukuṭabandhā yodhī
ḍagara mukhuṁ rājā mahābhāratha yuddha śuṇi
sambhare āsai se thāṭha ye palāṇi | 46 |
pañchāḷa saini prāẏe bujhi rājā manare kalā bhīti | 48 |
kurupāṇḍabe yebaṇa baḷa ocha tāku debā aiśuryya | 49 |
bābhiẏe kebaṇa deśara tumbhe aṭa mahīpāḷa
rājyadhara mūrati dekhiṇa ye rahile sarbabaḷa | 52 |
yoddhāẏe boile tumbhe kebaṇa deśara nr̥pati
rājyadhara prāẏeka ta diśai tora mr̥tti | 53 |
mānagobinda boilā muṁ kuñjagaḷa deśa adhikārī
muhiṁ se pāṇḍabaṁkara tule bibāde bairi | 54 |

div.note: tāhāra laṁghante kampai bārānidhi |(cha, jha, ṭa)

lg.l: tāhāṁkara pratagyāṁẏe muṁ pāṇḍabe hoili aprīti | 55 |
bipāka karma mohora ye daiba abaḷe
pajāite icchā karai muṁ rājyanta upekhi | 58 |
āho mleccha nr̥pati muṁ śiṇili tora bīradhū bānā
śaraṇa macchaḷa kathā kahanti tohora senā | 60 |
mohora prakr̥ti hāde chāceka br̥tti jāṇi
ẏeḍebaḍa dukhī yebe muṁ hoili tora kati | 62 |
nicinteṇa thāasi ẏebe na chaḍa tora rājya
pāṇḍabe samara ye hoilā mora āja | 63 |
āho ājhuṁ tohora thāṭhe senāpati hoantu ye droṇe
daṇḍa gheni pāṇḍabe samare yāāntu teṇe | 64 |
āho śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna ẏebe samare na thile
chāribhāi pāṇḍabanta jiṇi pāribu ki tohora baḷe | 66 |
driyodhana boilā tu jiṇibu kr̥ṣṇa arjunaku

div.note: bhua = byuha |

lg.l: abheda bhūa se rañchilā asura kāmarūpī
āho caitana mana yehu bhedipāre nija yogabaḷe
se se jāḷāndhara bhūa bhedi pārai samara kāḷe | 73 |
jāḷāndhara bhūa se rañchile sehi rāti | 75 |
āho kr̥ṣṇa arjuna āsibe ẏeṇe raṇe
catrabhūa kapaṭa karibe teṇe guru droṇe | 76 |
meḷeccha rājā boilā yujheṣṭhi bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadeba
ẏehānta jiṇimāku yoddhā samaratha tohora tule thiba | 77 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna ye āsibe ẏeṇe raṇe

div.note: –pañchadaśa yojana tā madhye sthaḷa acchi<lb/>caukati yamunā sarasvatī beṛhicchi |(ca, jha, ṭa)
uṇeiśi dvāre rahile sasrachāri |(ña, dha, jha, cha)

lg.l: subarṇṇa rathe śārddūḷa carma ye chaẏeṇi
pañchaṣaṭhī marbhmata ratha pañchaṣaṭhī marbhmata hāthī
koṭiẏe br̥nda aśva batiśa kṣauṇī pādānti | 83 |
damā dāuṇḍi ṭamaka niśāṇa lakṣeka bābala | 84 |
ālamba lakṣe udaṇḍa lakṣe pāñchalakṣī lakṣe
droṇe senāpati boli thāṭhe śubhilāka dhuni | 89 |
senāpati hoi ye caḷile guru droṇe

div.note: ubhā śatetroṇā ye dāsīneta palāṇi<lb/>uḍanti ālambe ye gagana jyoti jāṇi |(ka)
ubhāsarā = āgusāra = agrasara |
ḍhola damālu lakṣe bīratūra lakṣe<lb/>ulloḷa śabade ye kuruma camake |(ña)

lg.l: amarabr̥nda gheni ki bijaẏe sahasra yoni | 91 |
se dina ārdrā nakṣatra aṭai pāhānti | 92 |
catrabhūa ābori guru rahile prathama dvāreṇa | 97 |
nabalakṣa aśva sātalakṣa hāthī daśasahasra rathī
pādānti tinikṣauṇī tule dujadvāre rahilā jadyarathī | 98 |
benilakṣa ratha pāñchalakṣa hāthī caudalakṣa haẏe
sātakṣauṇī pādānti baḷa gheni karṇṇa tijadvāre rahe | 99 |
ẏeteka saina gheni bijaẏe rāẏeguru śalya

div.note: gābanti madhura bīṇā śaṅkhadhuni |(ga, ca)
bājanti mahurī śaraguṇā śaṅkhabherī dhuni |(gha, ta)
somabaṁśara chatrī se samare maghabā |(ṭha)

lg.l: saptama dvāre rahilā se chatrīkuḷa uttamā | 107 |
daśama duāre rahile tule daśasahasra rājānta gheni | 111 |
pariśa lakṣa ratha chāḷiśa lakṣa maẏemattā
rathī aśva pādānti ke pāriba gaṇitā | 112 |

div.note: madhyadvāre rahile kr̥pa ye āchāryye |(ca, dha, ka, ḍa)
‘tuleṇa achanti tāra tinisasra mahārāje’ pare ‘ṅa’ pothire<lb/>bhinma pāṭha :–
nabalakṣa aśva ye sātalakṣa hāthī
pāñchamabhma ta ratha ẏegāra kṣauṇī pādānti |
ẏeteka saina gheni kṣatrīkuḷa uttamā
aṣṭama dvāre rahilā bīra kr̥tabarmā |
mahācatra ābori se rahilā niṭhiāi |(ṭa, ḍa, ta)

lg.l: droṇaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ se kapoḷe kara dhinda | 114 |
bipāka beḷa mohora ẏeteka kāḷa thilā
mānagobinda boilā ẏeheneka buddha tohora thilā yebe guru
ādihuṁ kimpe tuhi ẏe kathā na bichāru | 116 |
muhiṁ āśrija hoili ẏe catrabhūa chāhiṁ
deba dānabe ẏehā bhedite sāmaratha nāhiṁ | 117 |
sādhu sādhu droṇa mahārathī ẏe tohora buddhi
ẏe kauroba baḷa rakṣaṇaku tu abhaẏe bārānidhi | 118 |
pāṇḍabe airi pacha tāhāṁkara acchi ki pūrbe
prāgatīrthe se ye gaṅgāku kale dhyāẏe | 123 |
daśasahasra baraṣa pariyante se ẏekalaẏe bhābi
dhabaḷa dhauryya śuddha saṣṭika yāhāra kāẏe
ananta koṭi bhmaja debī tribeṇī saṅgamuṁ
prasanna hoiṇa āgyāṁ tāku dileka dhabaḷī
bara māga kaṇaẏabindu ye tohore miḷi | 127 |
prasanna hoilu ki mote abhaẏā pārbatī | 128 |
gaṅgā boile māga ye tohora icchā
mā go jambudīpa bharathakhaṇḍa aiśānya koṇa deśa
mā go dhaneṇa āḍhya muṁ nohai nr̥pati
mā go tu ta māheśvarī kaṇaẏa bārānidhi
tohora udaru go utapatti sarba ruddhisiddhi | 132 |
mā go prāgatīrtharu ye mohora nagrayāẏe
benitāḷa gabhīre hoiba nadī ye goṭiẏe | 133 |
gaṅgā boile tu āga kāṭiyāsi rekhā
aṅguṣṭhi rekhā gāra kāṭilā kaṇaẏabindu nr̥pamaṇi
se pathe bijaẏa kale parama nirañjanī | 135 |
pache pache goḍāile se kaṇaẏa bāhanī | 136 |
tahiṁra taṭare meḷaccha nāme nagra basai

div.note: mā go dhane dharme āsakati nuhai muṁ nr̥pati |(ga, ḍa, ta)

lg.l: aṭhāiśi sahasra rathī aśisasra hāthī ye aṭai | 141 |
tahiṁra kūḷe ye basai yeteka deśa
se kaṇaẏabindura nandana ye upāẏe catrabratī
rāhura duhitāku se baḷeṇa kalā rati | 152 |

div.note: bibhabe kubera se rūpe manamatha siddhi |(na, tha)
nairutasenara nandana maḷaẏākhya jāti |(ḍa, ca)

lg.l: tāhāra tahuṁ nairuta bīrye pāñchaputra utapatti | 153 |
yahu baṁśika rājā se baḍāi dharmabādī
samasta diśa jiṇilā se hantakāru mahābīrā | 156 |
beṇṭa binode thāi tāhā dekhile arajune | 163 |
dropatīra keśa dhari bāmakare neucchi niśācara

div.note: rāgeṇa dhari niante se ghora bane |(ja, ña, jha)

lg.l: se kārttikaśūḷa nandana maẏe nāme sura
pāṇḍabe bibādī se hoilā asurakuḷa rāẏe | 168 |
se nimante pāṇḍabanta jiṇimākaiṁ tāhāra buddhi | 169 |
paśile tahuṁ bāhāra hoibāku nāhiṁ bāṭa | 171 |
agasti boile tu ho śuṇa mahīpāḷa
tu ye boilu meḷaccha rājā pāṇḍabaṁka pāiṁ aprīti
pūrbe baṁśara airi ẏehā kahile agasti | 173 |
phiṭilā manabhrānti munī he taba mukhu śuṇi | 174 |
ẏeke jāḷandhara bhūa duje asura kāmarūpī
ẏesaneka sarūpa se jāḷāndhara bhūa kathā
apāra prastāba se na sarai kahante
ẏethu antare biśrāmilā jāḷāndhara bhūara bāratā
abhaẏe puruṣa ye tāṇḍaba rasa kaḷā
sadā sadaẏe nātha śūnya āsana bhadrā
akāḷa akāma svāmī gajamukha manuṣyara kāẏā
gaja manuṣya śarīra ẏeka yāhāra śarīra | 188 |
śatekoṭi bhaṇḍāra gheni kubera yāhākaiṁ khaṭi

div.note: bandai triẏambaka dadhisaraḷa yāhāra mukha (keneka podhi)
kiñchita abalokane benicachu tīkṣa |(cha)
abhimāna puruṣa ye tāṇḍaba rasakaḷā |(ja)
gaḷai mattarasa lalāṭare śohai kasturīcitā |(ca)
abhaẏe sañchita nātha sadāhiṁ sadaẏā |(ka, da, ña, ṭa, ṅa)

lg.l: bāma aṅguṣṭhire tohora sapata brahmāṇḍa rahi | 191 |
bhagata jana batsaḷa svāmī pūrāa manabāñchā | 192 |
svāmī kumāra baẏase ye kheḍara kutūhoḷe
svāmī kṣaṇake marddaḷa kṣaṇake kaṁsāḷa tāḷa kṣaṇake kuṇḍaḷā śabada
yathābhābe jāṇu svāmī samasta rasa svāda | 195 |
svamī ẏe tohora kautuka tāṇḍaba rasa dekhi
moheṇa ḍhaḷi padile deba pañchadaśa ākhi | 196 |
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara thāānte agrate tote pūjā | 197 |
nyguṇ tote bheṭili nātha nīḷasundara kaḷapabaṭa taṭe | 198 |
kiñchita draśane nātha muṁ pāili paramagati
taba āgyāṁre pāili muṁ pabitra siddha pothi | 199 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa janme janme mūrkhaṭi | 200 |
āho caitana narmadā sarasvatī ye jhaṁkhera pura bāsī
satya tretaẏā ye dvāpara yuga kaḷi
chāriyuga galā ẏebe tumbhe bāḷuta rūpe kheḷi | 202 |

div.note: –ubhaẏe sañchita nātha sadāhiṁ sadaẏā |(ka, da, ña, ṭa, ṅa)
–nirasa āsana yāhāra nirmaḷa nirākāra jyoti |(ṭa, ṅa, gha, dha)

lg.l: māgo satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāiśa sahasra baraṣa ye galā
tretaẏā yuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoī sahasra baraṣa bhogagalā | 204 |
āṭhalakṣa cauṣiṭhi sahasra baraṣa galā dvāpara ye yuga
kaḷiyuga chārilakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa ẏebe bhogya | 205 |
māgo prāṇa bisarjana hoileni aneka taponiṣṭhi
mote ta gocara nohilā tohora mahimāṁ | 207 |
māgo aṣṭabaraṣa ākāra muṁ ye dekhili tohora
ẏehirūpe ghenithibu tu kete kāḷa pariyante | 209 |
someka nāme rudra mohora svāmī sinā | 210 |
mama icchā hoile barai sinā pati
āhuri aneka kāḷa mora bāḷutabhāba mati | 211 |
yāhāra āṣyakaiṁ anta na pāilā pitāmaha
muhiṁ tāhāku barṇṇibāku bhājana kisa kaha | 212 |
bāḷuta rūpa yogeṇa se na icchilāka rati | 213 |

div.note: –tretaẏā yuge śamburājā kuḷeṇa sambhabi |(ca)
–tretaẏā yuge mañcharājā kuḷeṇa sambhabi |(ṭa)

lg.l: tija abatāre dvāpara yuge jāta hoile banamāḷī
nanda mahākhuḍa ghare utapatti nāma mo bijuḷi | 216 |
kaṁsa kachāḍante ye hoili śūnya gati
yāhāra prasanne acchiṭi dharma kāma artha
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita | 220 |
jhaṁkhera pura bāsī caraṇe muhiṁ sebi
śrī mahābhāratha ẏekādaśa dibasa bāratā muṁ kahibi | 221 |
droṇe senāpati ye hoile prathama yudde
catra ākāre bhūa bhiāile raṇa madhye | 222 |

div.head: {@jāḷandhara byūhabheda o kr̥ṣṇa arjjuna bandī@}

lg.l: svāmī catrabhūẏeka thāpi droṇaguru chanti rahi | 1 |
baiṣṇabī catra gheni se mote ātreṣai | 5 |
catra paḍanteṇa tāhā dekhilaiṁ hāde muhiṁ
ẏeheneka satya hāde daiba pūrbare nirbāṇa
sahadeba boile deba ẏethira artha śuṇa | 11 |
svāmī arjuna rathe sārathi hoibā nimante
chāriheṁ bhārā uśvāsa nimante janmila mahīsthaḷī | 14 |
svāmī tohore āpaduṁ bañchāi svarge gale

div.note: –keśākeśī ātraṣaṇe dropatī rahile |(keteka pothi)

lg.l: kāliki cauda baraṣa sampūrṇṇa hoiba abhimanyu | 17 |
āji yebe svargapura tāku na peṣibu acyute
hari arjuna kāli kehi na bratantiṭi jībite | 18 |
tumbha duhinti nāśi yiba se akṣaẏa svarge
tāhānta paṭhiāa hari upāẏe yebaṇa bāge | 19 |
gobinde boile ho samare arjunara thile
se ki prāṇatyāja hoiba mohora beḷe | 20 |
sahadeba boile svāmī mleccha rājāra poẏe
bho deba jāḷandhare bijekara arjunaṁku gheni
āmbhe chāripāṇḍabe yibuṁ catra ye bhūaku

div.note: –“kāliki cauda baraṣa sampūrṇṇa hoiba abhimanyu” ehi pādāntā pare -ja- pothire, pāṭha :–
āji yebe svārga puraku na peṣibu acyuta
samasta māri kāli karibi bhasmakṣetra |
yujheṣṭhi driyodhana duibaḷa thāṭha
svāmībaṁśa droṇa ādi bhājiba murāṭa |
kehi rahi nuāribe tāhāra chamura
stirīliṅga mātra ye rahiba mahīra |
hari arjuna tumbhe kāli yiba hata
tumbha duhinta māriṇa se yiba svargapatha |
tāhāra mr̥tu bheṭiba svāmī kebaṇa bāge
heḷāẏe nāśa nātha hoiba pratagyāṁ yoge |

lg.l: āmbha chāribhāinta ogāḷiba yadyaratha hara bara prasāde
sandeha bāratā sarba yahuṁ kahilā sahadeba
ohobaḷa daṇḍa sāja boli śubhe śaṅkhadhuni | 29 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna ye gale yujheṣṭhiṁka kati
kebaṇa dvāre ke ke samara gacchiba | 33 |
droṇara dvāra se mohora bhāge ye hoilā | 34 |
śrīkhaṇḍī boilā se dvāre māribi yoddhānta samasta | 35 |
se dvāra āborilā uttara kuru mahāmalla | 37 |

div.note: kaurobe nāśayibe arjuna trodhabaśe |(ṇa, jha, ḍa)
sandeha–sandeśa |

lg.l: sātukī boile se dvāra mote āgyāṁ debā | 39 |
āja kaurobānta samare kehu hāde rakhe | 41 |
sājanti saini ye maṇḍanti ratha hāthī
re re kāra śabade bihaḍanti saini | 43 |
svāmī maẏāsura boliṇa meḷakṣa deśara rājā
mānagobinda nr̥pati tāhāku kalāka bahuta pūjā | 46 |
sarasvatī nadītīre jāḷāndara bhūẏeka ye rañchi
ẏeṇe tumbhe gale catra ye bhūaku

div.note: ubhāranti dhanutroṇa haẏabara pādānti |(ka, ṛa)
re re kāra śabade kampai medinī |(ṭa, ṛa, ja)

lg.l: ẏemanta sandeśa bāratā yahuṁ kahile munehi
jāḷandhara bhūaku svāmī chāla mote gheni | 51 |
svāmī arjunakaiṁ gheni muhiṁ yibi jāḷandhare
meḷaccha rājāmānanta muṁ ye māribi samare | 53 |
muhiṁ yuddha karibi deba asuraṁka saṅgatara
svamī āja daśadaṇḍa beḷara ye madhye
svāmī catrabhūa dvāre thiba tumbhe rahi
bhūa bhedibāku tumbhe sāmaratha nuhaṁ kehi | 56 |
āmbhe jāḷandhara bhūa bhediṇa āsibuṁ leuṭi
athabā uchura yebe hoiba āmbhara āsante
sahadebaṁku boile hari tuhi se jāṇu
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna rakṣaṇakaiṁ tu śahāsra bakhāṇu | 59 |
cchiṭi yuddha lagāithiba na bhediba bhūa
āmbhara āsibā yā(?) bāhāra dvārehiṁ thāa | 60 |

div.note: “jāḷandhara bhūabhedi na jāṇanti kehi” pāṭha pare ‘dha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
tinibhmabana madhye śubhilāka dhuni
sahadeba bole svāmī tu ta sabu jāṇu
pāṇḍabaṁku rakṣā boliṇa śrīkr̥ṣṇa āśre śuṇu |(tha, da, ña)

lg.l: arjunakaiṁ gheni jāḷandhara bhūẏe bijaẏe catradhārī | 61 |
ẏe bhūa āẏatana pañchadaśa yojana pariyante | 63 |
mahā mahā bikaṭāḷa se gagane khepanti | 64 |
bahuta caḷa cañchaḷa tāhā ke kariba lekhā | 65 |
kodāḷa guruja muṣaḷī asipatra ye śakati | 66 |
dhanu nāhiṁ phaḷā nāhiṁ nāhiṁnā āḍaṇa
śrīkr̥ṣṇe boiel kemante bujhila ho phālaguni | 68 |
arjuna boile svāmī muṁ ẏehānta jiṇipārainā nimiṣe
hr̥dagate bhāḷuacchi kemante nāśibi binā doṣe | 69 |
nohanti bandhu bairi na māganti bhāgai
svāmī śrabaṇe na śuṇili naẏane na dekhili
gurumukhe na śuṇili jāḷandhara bhūabheda boli | 72 |

div.note: sūcimuna bhedibāku tiḷeheṁ nāhiṁ bhede |(ka, ṛa)
naẏana kāḷacatra śira mandara śikhā |(ca, ga)
se dānababaḷa bhūa ke kariba lekhā |(ga)

lg.l: gobinde boile ẏehi se byūha aṭai pātha
darpa chāpeṇa bāhuthibi muṁ nandighoṣa ratha | 74 |
ẏete boli deba ye nandighoṣa ratha chāpi
tinimarbhmata yoddhā gheni se prathama dvāre thiti | 76 |
nandighoṣa rathe nei prahāra kale toḷi | 81 |

div.note: dekhiṇa nirākuḷa kopeṇa sarbayodhī |(ṭa, ḍa, ña, cha, tha)

lg.l: trailokye jitā ye samare bīradhū yāra nāma
re re kāra śabade sambhareṇa uṭhi | 90 |
mahāmatta gajeka ārohi se miḷilā āgara | 93 |
tinimarbhmata yoddhā tāhāra bāma ye ḍāhāṇe
sahasre sahasre yoddhāẏe nārāja bindhanti garuṭāṇe | 94 |
caudiga beṛhiṇa samare śara ye baraṣi
nandighoṣa ratha ye ākāśe na diśi | 95 |
āho caitana hanumanta bistārilā tāhāra oṣṭhatuṇḍa
napuṇa keśaba ye karanti mote bāci | 99 |
se śakati gheniṇa ye binddhale arajuna
giribara na sahai se bīrabara bhāra | 103 |
pādānti sanyabaḷa ye na yāi kaḷanā | 106 |
dekhai arjuna se dvāre kehi nāhiṁ
bhūa bhedi arjuna kr̥ṣṇa paśile ratha bāhi | 108 |

div.note: durānteka daita paḍilā aṣṭāṁgate<lb/>dekhi mahābirasa hoile thile yete |(tha, ṭha, na)
uddhāḷeka parbate paḍi paḍilā bhūmigate |(ṅa, ḍa, cha)
uttānaśāhī hoi parbate paḍi hoile urddhvagate |(pa, ta)
upuḍi parbata ki paḍilā rāsāṁgate |(dha)
mandārasena boliṇa ẏekai senāpati |(ṅa)
maẏūrakaṇṭha prāẏe diśai tāra jyoti |(ṅa)
mandarakarddana prāẏe diśai tāra jyoti |(ṅa)
maẏūrakaṇṭha samāna diśe tāhāṁkara deha<lb/>yama debatā dekhile kare tāṁku bhaẏa |(tha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: raṇaraṁkā dānabe se diśanti rāhura teja prāẏe | 111 |
hr̥daẏa bistīrṇṇa ye bistāra oṣṭha benipāṭi
mukha bistāra karante ye madhyasvarga ghoti | 113 |
durāntaka jāḷandhara bhūa dekhi lāgilā mahābhaẏe | 115 |
arjuna boile bho deba ẏe bhūa bhedite nāhiṁ bāṭa
gocara heunāhiṁ deba ẏe amāpa baḷathāṭa | 116 |
muhiṁ taẏehā bhedibāku deba na jāṇaiṁ pūrbe
ẏe bhūa bhedibāku tuhi se śakatā bāsudebe | 117 |
śūnyeṇa thāi tu nārāja bindha pātha | 118 |
adharma yuddha tuhi ārambha kara āṇi
meghamāḷe paśi tu śahasra bindha ṭāṇi | 119 |

div.note: bhinma bhinma badana ṣaḍabhmaja bhairoba urddhvakāẏe |(ja, cha)
tini tini badana ṣaḍabhmaja bhairoba urddhvakāẏe |(ka, ṛa, ña)
bikaṭabadana lambabhmaja urddhvakāẏe |(tha, ṭha, na)
bistāra oṣṭha byomaku śira acchi ghoṭi<lb/>raṭamaṭa kariṇa chobānti dantapāṭi |(tha, na)
“mukha bistāra karante ye madhyasvarga ghoṭi” pāṭhapare ga pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
se rākṣasa bhaẏaṁkara gaganaku kṣepi
madirā khāiṇa baḷabanta kāmarūpī |

lg.l: mārante na sarai ẏe pr̥thīki mahābhārā | 120 |
abicchanne nārāja bindha ẏe hoantu nāśaṁgata | 123 |
gāṇḍime pūroi śara bindhe bīra pātha | 124 |
anaḷa jāḷābaḷī kariṇa se nārājanta kṣepi | 129 |

div.note: tāḷure paḍi bāṇa hr̥dagate nikiḷi |(ḍa, ka, ta)

lg.l: adabhmate nārāja boli ākāśakaiṁ karanti dr̥ṣṭi
cakṣure paḍiṇa nārāja kāhāra phuṭai lalāṭa pāṭi | 133 |
gadā mudugara ye chela catra kāti
parigha kunta nārāja paṭā ye śakati | 137 |
na puṇa ārapure paḍai mote bāci | 138 |
gaganu śara dekhi mukhā ye durmukhā
śatr̥ṁkara mukha na dekhiṇa se baḍāi bimukhā | 139 |
pāṇḍaba samara karai ẏe meghamāḷe paśi | 140 |
mukhā dr̥mukhā se asura beni bīrā
datya śara āsibāra dekhi se kirīṭī
arjunara śara na bhedilā kāhārihiṁ aṅge

div.note: guruja lāṁkiā ye ābara śakati |(ka, ñja)

lg.l: arjunaku boile rakṣaṇa buddhi kalāka asurā | 146 |
sehi agni śahasra paḍilā rākṣasaṁka śire
arjuna boile deba, jāḷandhara bhūaku bāhā bege mora ratha
samara karibāre aneka hoilā kisa sukha | 151 |
āja ki prāṇa gheniyibu tu kiraṭī | 156 |
meghamāḷe paśiyuddha tu karuthilu re kapaṭī | 157 |
jiṇu ki hāru ubhaẏe sammukhe karibānā raṇa | 158 |

div.note: –niśaṁke sammukhe raṇa karibā yathārtha |(na, kha)

lg.l: śaraṇa macchaḷa muṁ bhagata jana bandhu
kahuṁ kahuṁ adhara kampilā se nuārilā sahi | 160 |
daibakīra nandana nārāja paḍante kale dr̥ṣṭi
nārāja paḍante se ye añjanāra baḷā
bhābare oṣṭha pātante nārāja cūra galā | 164 |
puṇa nārāja se ye pūroi biśāśate
andhāra ghora kari ye binddhalā dūrāpāte | 165 |
ātreṣi kariātreṣi kari subāhu arjunaku peśilā | 168 |
baiṣṇabī catra peśilā arjuna kare gheni | 169 |

div.note: –“lāṅguḍa bāta ghāte nārāja cūra galā |” (ka, ṭha)
–“tathāpi damana baḷa samare nirbhaẏe” ehi pādānta pare<lb/>“dha” pothire adhikā pade pāṭha :–
tarjanti garjanti mahākopa rāśi
nandighoṣa ratha dekhi paḍileka jhāsi |

lg.l: kāḷacatra svargagalā baiṣṇabī catra paśilā pātāḷe | 171 |
asura baḷa niśodhana se nārāẏaṇa dutī
ẏeka yoddhāku samare beṛhile aneka yodhī
puṇa lakṣeka nārāja se gheniṇa durmukhā
binddhale nārāja benibīre aneka baḷa sākhā | 174 |
puṇa puṇa nārāja se bindhai dr̥mukhā
asura kūṭeśvara se ye kalāka māẏābuddhi
hanumanta arjuna kr̥ṣṇa chāriaśvanta śara binddha | 176 |
dekhiṇa tāhā āśrija hoile bīra pāṁlaguni
yuga antakāḷe yehne āditya teja gheni | 178 |
praḷaẏe sindhu yehne uchuḷai ghora nāde
aśvakaiṁ na diśai kapi ye ketana
śrīkr̥ṣṇa ḍāka dianti āẏe achaṭi ki arajuna | 182 |

div.note: –arajuna dekhai mātra kapi ye katana |(na, ga, kha)

lg.l: arjunaku na śubhai śrīkr̥ṣṇa dr̥ḍha bāṇī | 183 |
āho caitana nandighoṣa rathe thāiṇa debādhi debarāje
jhātikare aśve śūnye ye gale uṭhi | 185 |
na jāṇanti durānteka baḷa lāganti samakacche | 186 |
arjunakaiṁ māra māra śabhai ucce dhuni
samara sammukhe mora ratha bāha debarāẏe | 188 |
āpaṇe āpaṇe anyāanyi hoi marantu sakaḷa | 189 |
para āpaṇā boli bāraṇa na galā saini | 190 |

div.note: –nandighoṣa rathe thāi ātaṅga hoiṇadebarāje<lb/>aśve achantiṭi boli haṇḍajanti (daraṇḍanti) śrībhmaje |(keteka pithi pāṭha)
asāṣṭame durānteka paḍile mahīloṭi |(jha, ṭha, tha)

lg.l: samra karu karu yebe jiṇimā yugate
saẏaḷa jane sādhu sādhu dhuni karibāka mote | 196 |
ohomukha samare yebe abā paḍibe raṇabhūiṁ
badāi agocara samara lāgilā pātha mote | 198 |
teṇu kari aśva muhiṁ ye darāṇḍante
uḍile aśve ye mohora kara lāgante | 199 |
śrīkurṣṇaṁka bacane arjuna sūryyābrateka śara binddha
śara paḍi datyabaḷa sarbe hoileka dhandi | 200 |
binddhalā śaramāna ākaśa chaḍi bhūmire paḍi
nandighoṣa ratha ta na diśai jāḷandhare | 204 |
cihna barṇṇa loḍi yahuṁ na pābanti samareṇa
bolanti arjunaku gheni hari paḷāilā keuṁṇa sthāna | 206 |
nandighosā ratha gheni bijaẏe kr̥ṣṇa pāṁlaguni | 207 |

div.note: tebe āmbhara sukhyāti rahiba jagate |(tha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: debadatta śaṅkha arjunara ghana ghana phuri | 208 |
nārāja pūroi beḍhile nandighoṣa ratha caukati | 211 |
daśabiṁśa triṁśa pañchāśa ye pūroiṇa śara
pātāḷe thile ye śasre kaṁkāḷī betāḷī | 215 |
laha laha jibha keśa ye khāṁkara
bikaṭa dāḍha ghora hāthe kaṭāra khapara | 216 |
pr̥thīre caraṇa śira lāgai gagana pathe
gobinde boile ho śuṇa bīra pāthe | 217 |
ẏe beni śahasra gheni ādhyāna ẏebe kara
ẏe beni nārāje asure hoibe prāṇa apahāra | 218 |
arjuna bolanti svāmī ẏeta aṭanti bhairobī
mohora nuhanti ẏe śahasra samare kemante peśibi | 219 |
dharma nāśa yāi dūṣaṇa hoai chatrībr̥tti | 220 |

div.note: kiḷikiḷā nāda kari rahile kr̥ṣṇa āge |(ṭha, ṭa, tha)
lāghaba yuddhe ẏe asura nohibāka kṣaẏe |(ña, ṭha, tha,na)

lg.l: gobinde boile tu kebaṇa śahasra ta na arajilu
sabu digapāḷaṁka śahasra āṇi tote dile dhanañjaẏe | 222 |
rajusi yāgakāḷe digabije kalu tu pātāḷe
aṣṭakuḷā nāge prasannahoi tote bahuta śasra dile | 223 |
akṣaẏa troṇa dileka tote sadāśibara bāmā | 226 |
ẏe śahasramāna ta kimpe tohora troṇe acchi | 227 |
kaṁkāḷī betāḷī se beni śasra gheni
beni śasraku praḷamba se hoile bibatsa
yāa tumbhe samare paśi damanabaḷa bhakṣa | 230 |
arjunara bacane se caḷile mahāśasra beni
paśile sāṁgrāme ki se kāḷānaḷa bahani | 231 |
sāṁgrāme aneka śara ye peśai dhanurjaẏe
śira cchiḍi paḍante garbhmaṁ muṇḍeka upujāẏe | 232 |

div.note: khāṇḍaba bana dahante ārogya hoile agni debatāẏe<lb/>samasta debatāṁkara śahasra ho dile dhanañjañja |(ṭa, na, gha, kha)
arjunaku bodhile se kahiṇa śuddhaśāḷī |(ca)
paśile paḷāda sainye kāḷarūpa gheni |(ka, dha)

lg.l: pr̥thibī madhye se rodhira huanteṇa br̥ṣṭi
pr̥thīna sahai ye ẏe duhiṁkari pādabhārā | 234 |
kopeṇa peṣilā se pāśupatra śara gheni | 236 |
satyayuge andhaka tripurāra ghenile yehu prāṇa | 237 |
mahāagni teja tāhā ke pāriba sahi | 238 |
mukhā durmukhā ye thile śasra gheni
gobinde boile dekha dekha ho arjuna
puṇa puṇa kabandha ye nācai raṇaraṅga
muṇḍa cchiḍante bhūmire puṇi lāganti ye aṅga | 244 |
puṇa puṇa nārāja ye peśai pāṁlaguni

div.note: mahāyogeśvara se pāśupatra bāṇa |(gha, ṭa)
mahā yogeśvara se anaḷasiddhā bāṇa |(ka, ḍa, dha)
mahābrahma agniśara bekare basai |(kha, na, dha, gha,)

lg.l: samare nibāra nohanti mukhā ye durmukhā
arjuna boilā svāmī ẏeta baḍāi durlabha
kāṭilāra muṇḍa kaaṁḷai kisa acchi ẏehāra garbha | 247 |
gobinde boile ho kathāẏe acchi pūrbe
tretaẏā yugara bāratā tote kahai prasthābe | 248 |
lakṣaṇa saṅge tāra sāṁgrāma hoilā apramita
puṇa puṇa muṇḍa utapatti hoilā kandharu tāhāri | 252 |
garbha bhitare acchi tāra amr̥ta ye liṅga
teṇu utapatti hoẏe muṇḍa tāra aṅga | 254 |
ẏehāra garbhe acchi amr̥ta ye liṅga
sañchaẏe ẏehāra garbhe amr̥ta liṅga acchi | 257 |

div.note: – garbha bhitare achi tāra amr̥taliṅga piṇḍa<lb/>tahuṁ utapatti hoi ye tāhāra muṇḍa |–(ña, gha, ta)
tāhā nāśakale se chaḍiba raṇaraṅga |(ña, gha, ta)

lg.l: śuṇiṇa arjuna troṇa ghenilā ye śara bācchi
samara karante bīra arjuna tāhā dekhi | 258 |
puṇa se nārāja binddhalā debaṁku kari sākṣī
nirghāta prāẏeka doi nārāja paḍilā benigarbhe
rakata māẏeṁsa se duhinti kale keḷi | 262 |
bulāi kuṭhāra ye prahāra karanti āṇi | 264 |
huṁkāra śabadeṇa nācanti śira ye kamaḷe | 265 |
āho caitana se dusaha bhūa jāḷandhara

div.note: – mr̥tupiṇḍe piṇḍe ārohiṇa beni<lb/>dhāmanti bikarāḷe kare khapara gheni |(jha, ka, ḍa, ñja, ga, ṅa, ca1)

lg.l: cihna barṇṇa khoji na pāile unneṣiṇa | 271 |
nagra bhāṅgiṇa puṇa deśa karanti ujāḍi | 273 |
dr̥ṣṭi mātrake abā ẏethu gale kāhiṁ
na puṇa kapaṭa kari yujheṣṭhiṁki dharanti yāi | 274 |
sarasvatī nadīre se aśvanta dyanti pāṇi | 276 |
āho caitana ākāśe thāiṇa se amaẏā asurā
kr̥ṣṇa ratha chaḍante kūṭa kalāka mahābīrā | 277 |
bāruṇābante uṭhi se kale śaṅkha dhuni | 278 |
tāhā gheni arjunaku bandhana kale āsi | 280 |

div.note: gobinda boile āho śuṇa arajuna<lb/>keṇe chāṇḍāḷabaḷa hoile antarddhāna ||(tha, na)
–“keṇe chāṇḍāḷa baḷa hoile gupati” ehi pādānta pare keteka pothi pāṭha :–
“hanumanta boile bhairobī agocara<lb/>dekhuṁ dekhuṁ gupata keṇe hoile niśācara |

lg.l: arjunara hāthe ye dhanu troṇa nāhiṁ
ati kūṭa kapata se jāḷandhara bhūagoṭi
bhedi na jāṇi bandīgalā pāṇḍaba kiraṭī | 284 |
kare bāga dauḍi dhari nandighoṣa rathe uṭhi
dhanu troṇa acchi rathe nāhiṁ ta kiraṭī | 286 |
ati urddhe boilā mote rakha catrapāṇi | 288 |
bāruṇābante jaḷandhare bandī paḍilāni tora pātha | 289 |

div.note: –bhaẏeṇa dānabe pāśaku yāi nuāranti |(ga, ka, ḍa, ña, ta)
–rathe rakhi āsithilā sohodrāra sāiṁ<lb/>rathuṁ āsi giribare thilā ubhāhoi |(ḍa, ṅa, ja)
nandighoṣa rathe yocile bārusa agakari |(ka, ña)

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁku śubhai ye debadatta śaṁkha bādya
dekhile jāḷandhara bhūa andhāra ghora jāṇi | 294 |
beni marbhmata yoddhā gheni kr̥ṣṇara āge rahi | 296 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa tule thile nārāja kaṁkaḷī betāḷī
dhāiṁ yāiṇa se beni asuranta giḷi | 299 |
ẏekā prahārake niśācara hoilā tahiṁ dhūḷi | 303 |
ḍāka śūbhai mātra yāite nāhiṁ bāṭa
bandīkari arjunaku kimpe na kāṭile tanu | 308 |
tāhā se arjuna dhariacchi nija hātha
bharasi kari ḍare kehi yāi nuārinti pātha kati | 312 |
agniki dekhi ke abā na karai bhaẏe
hāṇante bāhuḍiṇa lāgai śira ye paṁkaja
mārante na saranti se duṣṭa ye danuja | 316 |

div.note: bahu datya yujhanti ye kariṇa kapaṭa |(na, tha)
nirāpakṣa baḷa śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁku chanti beṛhi |(da, ña, tha, ja)

lg.l: kope yāiṁ gobinde dhaile tāra bāḷa
catra gheni kāṭanteṇa tā śira kamaḷa | 321 |
boilā se kauṇopa śuṇa ho gobinda
mote na māile muṁ kahibi jāḷandhara byūha bheda chanda | 322 |
mote tu namāra deba yadukuḷa nāna | 323 |
asura bacane deba chaḍile tāra bāḷa
gobinda boile yathārtha kahare tu datya chāṇḍāḷa | 324 |
pachāranti gobinde ye arjuna acchi kaha kāhiṁ
tāhākaiṁ dekhāile tote rājā karibaiṁ muhiṁ | 325 |
jaṭāsura boilā deba satya ki tohora bāṇī
pache pache datya nāśi yāānti gobindi | 328 |
jagannāthaṁku se kūṭa gocara na galā | 329 |
arjuna paḍiacchi teṇe jāḷandhara bhūara bhitare
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna duheṁ biarthī hele ẏe prakāre | 332 |
mahābhīṣma rūpa dhari ẏeṇe kaṁkāḷī betāḷī
māri damanabaḷa ye rudhire kale keḷi | 333 |
teṇe aneka baḷa nāśilā bicitrabīryya nāti | 337 |
puṣyeka bimāna gheni pātha pāśe miḷi | 340 |
ẏe rathe bijekara adrābaḷī dhanu gheni | 341 |
atyanta samara se jāḷandhara bhūẏe kale
tini arabuda yoddhā pādanti samare paḍile | 348 |
jāḷandhara bhūa bhedi prabeśile sarasvatī taṭa | 349 |
bheṭile jāḷandhara mukhe nandighoṣe ẏekā hanumanta acchi rahi | 350 |
bāḷuta rūpa dhariṇa se jaṁkherapure kheḷi | 352 |
adr̥ṣṭiki dr̥ṣṭi muṁ ye karāili āṇi
ānanda nandinī go bighaṁsita mama hr̥de
śūdramuni padaku muṁ bhārjana sāroḷā prāsāde | 358 |
ẏeḍe baḍa padaku kisa mohora pratagyāṁ

div.note: biśvarūpa dhariṇa ye toḷile banamāḷī |(bahu pāṭhāntara)
anubhaba sādhabīki muṁ bhābili pañchumane |(bahu pāṭhāntara)

lg.l: janamahuṁ mūrukha muṁ na jāṇai śāsrabidyā
se mātāṁgī mote prasanne yāhā bhāṣi
nīḷa kaḷapa baṭa jaḷe mote bacana parakāśi | 362 |
biṣṇu purāṇa rājā pātra mārkaṇḍa purāṇa
narasiṁha matsa kuruma purāṇa bauda kaḷaṁkī bakhāṇa | 364 |
sābarṇṇika manu antare ye yamanika bhāskara
aṣṭadaśa purāṇa mote dile sidha akṣara | 365 |
ẏetekaku yogya mote kale abhaẏe nirañjanī
teṇu kari bolāili muṁ sāroḷa dāsa śūdramuni | 366 | 366 + 222 + 588

div.head: {@garbhistha abhimanyura catrabyūha bheda śrabaṇa<lb/>senapatitvare tāhāra jaẏa o jaẏadrathara<lb/>śibaṁkaṭhāru baraprāpti@}

lg.l: droṇa ye catrabhūa kapaṭa kūṭa kale
arjuna na thile yujheṣṭhiṁki dharinebe boli boile | 2 |
koṭiẏe janmara pāpa dhaṁsibi śāhāsra upaneśi | 3 |
badaẏanti agasti muni śuṇa ho mahārāja
āho svāmī svāmī śrī bhīṣmadeba śaraśayyā kale yahuṁ raṇe
se catrabhūa bhedibāku śakya ye kāhāra | 7 |
ḍagara mukhuṁ ye ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
bhāḷanti chāri pāṇḍabe ye basiṇa raẏaṇī | 8 |
śrī yujheṣṭhi debe boile tu śuṇare bhīmasena

div.note: “śuṇiṇa mahābhārata pāpa kara dahija” pāṭha pare kha, ta, dha, nare bhinma pāṭha acchi :–
catrabhūa goṭi ye rañchile gurudroṇe
bhedantā nāhiṁ kehi ẏe tini bhmabane ||
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna ābara padmana bīrahiṁ
droṇe jāṇanti kebaḷa āna na jāṇanti kehi ||
jāḷandhara bhūaku arjuna hari yānte
cintābhare bhāḷanti ye dropatīra kānte ||
yebaṇa catrabhūa bhedibāku mahīre kehi nāhiṁ
āmbhara madhye kiẏe samartha aṭai ||
prathama dvāre achanti droṇa senāpati
yama kāḷadaṇḍa prāẏa tāṁkara śara śakti ||
sammukhe miḷante yiba yamaāḷa
ẏesaneka cintāẏe bhāḷanti dharmabāḷā ||
ẏesaneka bichārante dharmara nandana
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇa taḷe āmbhe śaraṇa pañchujana ||

lg.l: bhīmasena boile tumbhe śuṇa āho dharmarāẏe
se bhūa bhedibāku sāmartha sinā dhanurjaẏe | 10 |
deba dānabe mānabe gocara hāde nāhiṁ
nakuḷa jāṇu kire tu catrabhūara bāratā | 12 |
nakuḷa bolai svāmī dekhilā nāhiṁ naẏane
na paḍhili se bidyā na śuṇilaiṁ karṇṇe | 13 |
tumbhe jāṇani kiho se catrabhūara sambhaba | 14 |
muhiṁ na jāṇaiṁ prahu catrabhūara upāẏe | 15 |
sannidhye prabeśa hoilā āsi arjunara suta | 16 |
biṣama yuddha chanda ki kahibi puṇa | 19 |
mote mukuṭa bānddha kara ho yoddhāẏe | 21 |
somabaṁśara tu kuḷara maṇḍaṇī dhana mora
tumbhaṁku catrabhūa kathā kāhuṁ se gocara | 15 |
śuṇa deba dharmarāẏe mohora hāde bāṇī
svāmī mātāra garbhakāḷe makara śukaḷa traẏodaśī
arkabāra punarbasu nakṣatra mithuna ye rāśi | 27 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa āẏuṣmān nāme yoga
se dina pitāmātā heuthile kathā prasaṅga | 28 |
mātā pachārile svāmī kathā goṭiẏe kahasi | 29 |
mātāra bacane pitā kahanti dharmasvarūpa kathā
aṅge nirbhāi achanti yeuṁ yeuṁ kathā | 30 |
sohodrā boile svāmī kathāẏe śuṇa tathya
āpaṇe yāhā aṁge nirbhāi śikhi se kathā aṭai tattva | 31 |
śuṇa go subhadre tumbhe kahanti phālaguni
jāḷandhara bhūa, catrabhūa ādrābaḷī kuṇḍaḷī ye bhūa | 34 |
gaganabhedi bhūa ghora andhāra ye bhūa | 35 |
mānabhaṅga bhūa bhāluka bhūa barehā ye bhūa
śalyabhūa tribaḷi ābara sāgara ye bhūa | 36 |
ye yemante bheda hoi kahibā tohora ṭhāre | 37 |
muhiṁ garbhe thāi tāhā śuṇili dharmarāẏe | 39 |
yadyapi amaragaṇa tule hari brahmā gheni
bhūa bhedibāra beḷe jiṇi pārai sasrayoni | 42 |
bāhuḍiṇa kemante āsibi na jāṇai buddhi
tahiṁra bāratā na kahile pitā sarbaguṇanidhi | 43 |
garbhe thāi jāṇilā ẏe aṭai biṣṇu dehā | 44 |
bhīṣma droṇa tahuṁ ẏe aṭai baḷīẏāra | 45 |
ẏeḍe ẏeḍe bacana śuṇi rakhithilu uddeśya | 46 |
āgyāṁ heu tāta nabhāḷa kicchi manu | 47 |
raṇe catrabhūa mātra pārai muṁ bhedi
kipari bāhuḍibi muṁ kaha mote buddhi | 48 |
abhimanyu mukharu ẏe sana bākya śuṇi

lg.note: “māẏe nidrāgale niśi hoilā pāhānti” ehi pāṭha pare “ja” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
sehiṭhāru mātā mo śuṇi na pārile |
lg.l: bhīmasena boilā bābu na bhāḷa tu tāhā
tera kṣauṇī baḷa gheni muṁ tote hoithibi sāhā | 50 |
ẏeḍe keḍe garutāṇa se kauroba kaicchā
sarila kurubaḷa āja ke karu āsi rakṣā | 53 |
ẏethaku kicchi śocanā na kara kumara ẏekā | 54 |
bāhuḍi āsibā beḷaku āsibe kr̥ṣṇa pātha
abhimanyu boilā deba nakara kicchi cintā
arjuna āsibā yāẏe muhiṁ pāṇḍaba baḷa rakhantā | 56 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu satya tu paḷibu
arjuna āsibā yāẏe heḷa bujhi tuhi | 58 |
māribi kauroba baḷa dekha tumbhe puṇi
kumāra mukhuṁ ye ẏesana bākya śuṇi
āgyāṁ pramāṇe caḷai se biśvabasura kumara | 63 |
tathira upare ye śveta chāmara maṇḍi
sannidhye lambanti jhīna patanī śveta śāḍhī
śaṁkha śveta padma ye gokṣīra chāribarṇṇa
sāñju dei rathe nei yocilā ketana | 71 |
ratha dhabaḷa aśva ratna dhabaḷa dhabaḷa chāmara dhabaḷa oḷi
se rathara nāma ye aṭai dhabaḷī | 72 |
ādi nama abhimanyura aṭai se bhale | 73 |
dhabaḷī ratha maṇḍiṇa se karai āgamana | 74 |
ẏehāṁkara ratha bāhile caḷai madhya pātāḷa ākāśa bhmabi | 76 |

div.note: yesane mithuna māse āditya udaẏe |(tha, na)
se ratha maṇḍilā ye sabu dhabaḷa barṇṇa |(cha, ḍa)

lg.l: yadyapi rathimāne līna hoibe kāḷa abasāne
rathīmāne utapatti hoile sarathiẏe hoanti samaẏe | 78 |
ādityaṁka sārathi aruṇa indra sārathi mātaḷi
kāmadeba sārathi candradhvaja arjuna rathe sarathi deba banamāḷī | 79 |
daśaratha rathe sārathi sumantaka abhimanyu rathe ketana
baḷarāma rathe sarathi daruki dāruka sārathi janārddana | 80 |
mūṁ kisa kahibi ẏe sārathimānaṁka mahimāṁ
lekhante anta hoi ki ẏehāṁkara baḍimā | 81 |
dhabaḷī ratha caṛhi se biśvābasuṁkara tanu
saja hoilā kumara śubha anakūḷa gheni | 83 |
dibya beśa aḷaṁkāra ye sohodrāra baḷā
ādisr̥ṣṭi sambhaba kāḷe diśanti yehne nirañjana

div.note: śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁkara bhagnījā guṇasāgara sindhu |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: dibya abatāra dhari bijaẏa kale rathe
tinisāgara yoddhā gheni prathamadvāre rahichanti droṇaguru
dr̥pada birāṭa dekhi tāṁku rahile khaṇḍadūruṁ | 94 |
tesana sādriśe se ye bhāradvādaśaṁkara nandane | 95 |
tahiṁki bhāratha yuddhe nāhānti kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni | 96 |
bho sārathi ketana mohora dhabaḷī ratha bāhā | 99 |
śaṁkha śveta padma ananta haẏabara chāri
yā yā boli āgyāṁ dilāka sārathi
nimiṣake droṇaṁka rathaku abhimanyu ratha grāsi | 102 |

div.note: –bho guruketana mohora dhabaḷī ratha bāhā |(ka, ḍa, da, ta, gha)

lg.l: pāṇḍabaṁka asamaẏe ki bije kale maẏāṇe | 103 |
arjuna nandana abhimanyu aṭai ye ẏehi | 104 |
praḷambite nārāje paḍile droṇa guruṁkara pāde
bhūa manthana kalā se sohodrāra tanu | 110 |
mukuḷā pāi sanya aneka se māri | 112 |
pāñchalakṣa yoddhāṁku badhakalā samare śahasra gheni | 113 |
pāñchalakṣa yoddhā paḍante droṇa baḷa bhāji
108 bichāriṇa droṇa puṇa mati kale bhrama<lb/>boile adharma yuddha ẏehā tule mahāśrama |(ca)
bāḷuta kumara boli āmbhe ye heḷayuddha kalu | 116 |
sehi sādr̥śe garji bāṇa paḍanti upara | 119 |
se anaḷa tīkhabaṇa sārathi aṁge bhedi
anibāraṇa śara gheni binddhale bege guru

lg.note: yesaneka kāḷasarpa paśai bimbare<lb/>tesane paḍante śara cchedai mumare ||

lg.l: gahaḷa dhandoḷa ye bārita na galā sanya | 129 |
kr̥tāntaka jiṇī tāhāra teja ye bikāśi
catrabhūa dvāre paśila bhīma droṇaku ātreṣti | 131 |
se rājāra tule thile daśahasra rathī | 132 |
droṇaṁkara tule ye thile śasra gheni
bhīmakaiṁ beṛhiṇa se prahāra kale daṇḍa | 136 |
re re kāra śabade ye kampai ākāśa
bhīma gadā piṭi aneka baḷa kalā dhvaṁsa | 137 |
bhīṣma karṇṇa droṇa yāhākaiṁ sari nuhanti samare
itara yoddhā ke miḷiba tāhāra chamure | 138 |

lg.note: bhūa manthana kalā se sohodrāra tanu |(ka, ñja)
bhīmakaiṁ beḍhiṇa se prahāra kale kāṇḍa |(ga)
bhīmakaiṁ beḍhiṇa se prahāra kale bhūṣanta |(ca)
beni ghaḍi samare paḍile sarbekṣiti |(ṭa, gha, jha)

lg.l: sambhḷi nuārile abhimanyu saṅge yuddha karuṁ | 141 |
madanasena nr̥pati thāṭha paḍile yahuṁ raṇe
paḷāile dvāra chaḍi na rahile ẏekajaṇe | 142 |
sanya paḷānte ye guru hoileka ẏekā
ārambhe yuddha karante guru hr̥dare hoile tāṭakā | 143 |
samare cchidra pāi se sohodrāra baḷā
khāṁkara keśa bhūta preta piśāca ye chāmaṇḍā
ḍākeṇī nāraẏeṇī betāḷī ye nārāja śatakhaṇḍā | 145 |
rome rome bhedilā se droṇaṁkara tanu | 146 |

lg.note: khāṁkhaṇī preta pitāśuṇī chamaṇḍī<lb/>kātyāẏinī ḍāẏeṇī bentāḷī nārāẏeṇī śveta caṇḍī |(ja)
“bhmaja caraṇa ohaḷanti jaḷadhārā prāẏe |” ehi pādāṁśa pare “ja” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
bāhumūḷa karṇṇa kaṇṭha jānupāda māẏeṁsa kāmoḍi
śoṇita yognī śara pianti tanu phāḍi ||
mahāmāī śara yehure khāile mote dhari ||
nārāja bindhante śatr̥ yamaku se bheṭi ||

lg.l: aḷapeheṁ paḍanti śare ye śatr̥ku na bheṭi | 148 |
dekhi sārathi droṇaṁka ratha nelā āḍekari
ketana sarathi boilā bāṇa bindha he abhimanyu
bolai kumara kṣetrīkuḷe nāhiṁ ẏeheneka karma
pitāṁkara guru ẏe samaẏeka thāntu brati
catrabhūa prathama dvāre tinisahasra rājā thile
pañchaśata rājā nabalakṣa hāthī ye paḍile | 154 |
droṇa senāpati aborile sinā kaurobaṁka thāṭha
tāhāṁkara biarthe ẏebe mukuḷa hoilāka bāṭa | 155 |
kurusanya nakṣatrapanti candra se ratha dhabaḷī | 158 |
ẏeteka sanya gheni dujadvāre jadyaratha nr̥pati | 159 |

lg.note: dhanu dharanteṇa nuāsai gune dr̥ṣṭi<lb/>ātmā baikulye kampai beni muṣṭi ||(ca1, ca, ga)

lg.l: śate yoddhāẏe uṭhile re re kāra kari | 161 |
āho kāḷadaṇḍa dhari yehne bijaẏe nāśakara
tesana sārikṣe se diśai pāṇṭaba sundara | 163 |
bhājile kauroba baḷa kr̥tānteka rūpa dekhi | 164 |
benigadā bulai sanya upareṇa nei piṭi | 167 |
daśasahasra rathī ye yadyarathara tule thile
beḍhiṇa brikodara saṁro aneka yuddha kale | 169 |
gadābara ghāte daśabiṁśa paḍanti sātapāñcha uburanti | 173 |
lg.note: leuṭiṇa lakṣe bīra gheni parigha kunta tīkṣamunā |(tha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: kahi prānta ke kariba samara bebhāra | 174 |
antarīkṣe bulāi diai tāhā bege phiṅgi
aneka dhūre paḍi yāānti sehu bhāṅgi | 177 |
mahā mahā baḷabantā ye paḍileka samare | 178 |
nirghāta ye saneke se karai paẏāṇa | 180 |
śūnye nārāja na yāi paḍi hoanti śiraccheda | 181 |
samare bimukha hoi ye hoile biarthī | 182 |
abikṣaṇe bāṇa bindhai se mādridebīra tanu | 185 |
haẏa sārathi upare paḍiṇa yāānti nikiḷi | 186 |
rudhire bile pana se yoddhāṁkara kāẏe
diśai śarīra ye mandāra puṣya praẏe | 187 |
śahasreṇa bheda ye nohai yāhāra kāẏe
daśa sahasra rathī tule sindhu rājāra tanu | 190 |
bolai sindu rājana tu bāḷuta ye tanu | 191 |
sambhāḷa ho jadyaratha tohora ye tanu | 194 |
kiñchita yuddhe cchedila jadyarathara ye tanu | 197 |
āu ẏeka rathe ye ārohilā jadyaratha yāiṁ
abhimanyu bhūa bhitare paśilā ratha bāhi | 200 |
lg.note: –kiñchita yuddhe cchedilā jadyarathara dhanu |(ga, gha, ṅa, ṭha, kha, na, ja)

lg.l: abhimanyu ẏekasare bhūa bhitare ye caḷi
pāṇḍabe na dekhile ratha ye dhabaḷī | 202 |
śveta hāthīẏe caḍhi yujheṣṭhideba achanti saṁgatare | 203 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile śuṇa re bhīmasenu
pañchāśa sahasra rajānta hoilā putra ẏekā
ẏemāna dekhiṇa nandana na puṇa karai śaṁkā | 206 |
jadyaratha jiṇi chala bābu goḍāi yibā pache
ẏesaneka śuṇi dhaiṁlā ye pabanara batse | 207 |
daśa sahasra rathī ye thile āboriṇa
samare niśodhana kale bahuta ye rathī | 211 |
abicchanne bāṇa diga ambare galā ghoṭi | 213 |
lg.note: –raṇa jiṇi bhitare paśilā abhimanyu |(ka, ṭa, ca, dha, gha, na, ṭha)
–sanya sākhā nadekhi puṇa karai mane śaṁkā-(ka, ṛa, ña)
lg.l: sādhu sādhu se pāṇḍabe samare maharathā
ẏe dusaha yuddha sehi se sahantā | 214 |
gahaḷa dekhi brikodara ratha kalā tejyā
gadabara bulāi sanya upare nei piṭi | 216 |
haẏa sārathi rathī na rahile kicchi
pādagati kariṇa se dhamai pāṇḍaba pābeni
kopeṇa piṭilā nei se rathe gheni | 221 |
nakuḷara konte se paḍile bahuta rathī yodhī
puṇa se anibaraṇa aneka śara binddha | 222 |
bhīmasena mr̥tti dekhi sindhu rājā suta
samare diśanti yenhe śāmaḷa mehe bidurehā | 225 |
śarīre śahasra paḍi samasta huanti cūri | 226 |
lg.note: –kaṇaẏagiri parbata yehne āsuthāi uṭhi |(ka, ḍa, ña, ca, cha)

lg.l: kopeṇa garji boilā āre āre pāṇḍaba | 231 |
re re kāra śabada śuṇiṇa pāṇḍaba pañchāḷa
jadyaratha upare nei prahāra kalaka garutama | 233 |
ẏeka kare kuṭhāra ye āreka kare bajraśūḷa
nandīkeśvara diśai yehne andheka bahda kāḷa | 235 |
sahadeba boile deba na kara gabana | 236 |
ẏeṇe se aprāṁjaẏe achai āmbha ye chārinti | 237 |
lg.note: –ẏeṇe seapacaẏe achai āmbha ye chārinti |(dha, ḍa)
–“ẏeṇe se āprāñjaẏe achai āmbha ye chārinti” pare‘ña’re bhinmapāṭha<lb/>yujheṣṭhi pachārile śuṇa he sahadeba
ẏethira carita tumbhe śuṇimā mahīpati || (abaśiṣṭhāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: sahadeba boilā svāmī śuṇa he mahīpate
kr̥ṣṇabhadrā nadīkūḷuṁ ye dropatī nelā baḷe | 241 |
kopeṇa āgyāṁ dila āmbhanta tumbhe rāi
jadyaratha doṣa upekṣā kara dr̥śilāra pāiṁ | 244 |
prāṇe na mariṇa re dropatīki bege āṇa
svāmī tumbhara āgyāṁre āmbhe dhāiṁlu chāribhāi
phalagu nadīkūḷe bhīmasena ṭhākure jadyarathaku ogāḷile yāiṁ | 246 |
svāmī sanyabaḷa māri tāra kalu bhaganasta
muthaghāte bhīmasena ṭhākure bhāñjile tāra ratha | 247 |
dhaiṁ bhīmasena ṭhākure yāiṁ dhaile kaberī | 248 |
lg.note: –lajyā pāi bāhuḍile dhaumya purohite |(ca, ḍa, ña, na, kha)
lg.l: keśa jhiṁkaṇā dei kalu abastā aneka ye śāsti
tumbhara āgyāṁ pramāṇe tāku prāṇe na māilu
rāgeṇa śira tāra ye sātabeṇṭi kalu | 250 |
āre prāṇe yebe tote na māilu jadyaratha
śira chati jānure citā kuṭile pābeni
svāmī satyakari jadyaratha paḷāilā prāṇa gheni
rājyaku na galā se hoiṇa abhimānī | 253 |
tribeṇī saṅgama hoi ākāśuṁ paḍai ye gaṅgā | 255 |
se nadīra tīre se racilā āśrama
nicaḷa āsane basilā dibārātre nāhiṁ śayyā
āhāra maithuna nidrā kalā sarba paritejyā | 257 |
ẏe bidhire dvādaśa baraṣa kari laẏe
siṁgha śukaḷa pakṣa ṣaṣṭhīdine āsana kampilā debarāẏe | 258 |
bābya name karaṇa atigaṇḍa nāme yoga | 259 |
baila ārohi bije deba ye suḍhaḷe | 260 |
rudra boile re bara māga rāẏe sindhu
muhiṁ se trilocana jagata janaṁkara bandhu | 261 |
para dukhe kātara muṁ para dukhe dukhī
dātabya puruṣa muṁ ye mane yāhā bāñchi | 262 |
jadyaratha boilā svāmī biśvanātha yebe tuhi
parama gati pāi sinā tohora nija rūpa chāhiṁ | 263 |
dvādaśa barṣa tape arjili dukha bhāgī
dekhai kinā nijarūpa prasanna parama yogī | 264 |
jadyarathara bacane śiba nija rūpa parakāśi
sadya bāma ghora iśānya tata purukha
dhabaḷa śaṁkha prāẏe diśai tora pañchu mukha | 266 |
saṁgama mekhaḷa nikaḷaṁka nandaka piṁgaḷa pañchujaṭā māthe
jaḷada nīraja aḷi soma sūryya kāḷa agni
jaḷadharā jhara jhara jaṭāru bahai gaṅgā puṇi | 268 |
ẏe bidhi pañchu daśa naẏana kāpāḷī
kaṇṭhataṭe dhailu nātha teṇu to nāma nīḷakaṇṭha | 271 |
dvādaśa bhmaja śobhana baḷaẏa rucira dibyatanu
śaṁkhapadma mahāpadma śvetakuḷika karkoṭaka takṣaka ananta
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śiba śiba sumari | 275 |
āho caitana śiba nāmagoṭi ye talaẏe mama hr̥de
ṭiṇāẏeka bīṇāẏeka jaẏantika ajaẏantika bhīmeka maṇibhadra bīra | 277 |
jadyaratha chamure svāmī nija rūpa dekhāile | 280 |
koṭiẏe baṁśa mora mukata hoilā muṁ nistarili debasvamī | 281 |
draśane prasanna hoili siddha hoiba sarbakāryya | 282 |
ye mane bāñcchā tohora pūrāa abhiṣṭi | 283 |
svāmī āne pirojana nāhiṁ muṁ jiṇimi pāṇḍabanta | 284 |
īśvare boile tu mote māgilu ninā bara

lg.note: āho caitana biśvanāma bhābili mama hr̥de |(cha, na, tha, ṭa, ṭha)
īśvare boile tu mote māgilu anibāra bara |(tha, na, ta)
kirāta rūpe arjuna bhramanteṇa bane |(na, ṭha, tha, ḍa)
lg.l: āho jadyaratha mote boilā ki śāsti tohora charaku
prāṇe māile kisa yaśa hoibaṭi muku | 287 |
dhanu mora gaḷe lai mote bulāilā antarīkṣe
puṇi daẏā kariṇa se rakṣākalā pache | 288 |
śaraṇa paśili muṁ nija prāṇa pāili | 289 |
āho nīḷendī haraṇa kāḷe yebaṇa abasthā
indra, baruṇa, kobera, brahmā, candra, sūryya yama samāna nohileka yuddhe hāde | 292 |
nabadvīpā pr̥thī sapata sāgara se dhailā dhanuhuḷe | 294 |
muhiṁ tāhākaiṁ sarisama nohai hāde raṇe
samre tu jiṇimuṁ yujheṣṭhi bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadebaṁku | 296 |
āho jadyaratha arjuna śaraṇa boli bolibeṭi yete yodhī
tāhānta laṁghile bara mora nohai prasiddhi | 297 |
lg.note: “indra, baruṇa,kobera, brahmā, candra, sūryya, yama samāna<lb/>nohileka yuddhe hāde”–ehi pāṭha pare kha o na<lb/>pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
lg.l: pinākī sāmanye tāku dhanuẏeka hara dile
lakṣeka nr̥patiṁku tu jiṇa ye boile | 298 |
svāmī prathama samare se kumāra abhimanyu
samare chedilā se pinākī samānye dhanu | 299 |
se dhanu svāmī yebe thāāntā ẏehāra hāthe
ẏetebeḷa yāẏeṁ kāhiṁ āme brati thāāntu jībante | 300 |
yeteka kare thile tāhānta jiṇantā nāhiṁ kehi raṇe | 301 |
dhabaḷī ratha bāhi bhūa bhitare paśilā abhimanya | 302 | 588 + 302 = 890
lg.note: “dhabaḷī ratha bāhi bhūa bhitare paśilā abhimanya |” ehi pāṭha pare<lb/>kebaḷa “ṭha” mudrita pustakare adhikā stutiṭie acchi :–
muhiṁ chara ki kahibi tumbhar ayeuṁ yaśa
candra sūryya graha tārā karanti prakāśa |
cauda brahmāṇḍa madhye yete jība jība
tumbha sr̥tṣṭiru muhiṁ ki aṭai bāhāra
kṣaṇe śānti na miḷai āhe daẏāmaẏa |
ki buddhi karibi prabhma nasphurai kicchi
lg.head: {@abhimanyura ẏekādaśa dvāra bheda o abhimanyu badha@}

lg.l: svāmī caurāśi lakṣa ye meḷakṣa yoddhā thile
pāñchadvāre deba caubana lakṣa yoddhā paḍile | 3 |
svāmī kāli dibasa rātre bicitra sāṁgrāma
rātra dibasa na jāṇiluṁ kṣaṇe nāhiṁ biśrama | 4 |
svamī nāraẏaṇī tule samare yesaneka raktabīryya
mārante na saranti se dr̥bhāra danuja | 5 |
svāmī ẏebeheṁ hoilāni āsi deḍharahara beḷā
jāḷandhara bhūa bhedi āsibe ẏehu kati
tāha śuṇi pāṇḍabe sānanda mana citte
śuṇa ho caitana se jāḷandhara bhūara sāṁgrāma
asambhaba saini se na yāi gaṇitā | 11 |

lg.note: –tāhā śuṇi pāṇḍabe ānanda mahācitte<lb/>yujheṣṭhi bolanti rakṣākara ho acyute |

lg.l: oṭa gadha śrikāḷa ye bhāluṁka bāhāne
bhaẏāṁkāra rūpa dekhi samare kehu bharasu | 15 |
kaḍhā marddaḷa ye bijighoṣa bīra dāuṇḍi
kiḷi kiḷā nāde ye matuāḷa nāṭakhaṇḍi | 16 |
goru aśva maniṣa bhakṣanti se kicchihiṁ na karanti tejyā | 17 |
maraṇa jīaṇa kehu na jāṇanti bhale
dharma ke adharma ke na jāṇanti beni
dhara dhara māra māra paḍuacchi bobi
kiḷikiḷā śabada śubhai se māile na sarai | 21 |
arjuna boile mohora āge kāka diai rāba
mohora pañchubhūta ātmā kimpe baikulya bāsudeba | 22 |
ẏe jāḷandhara ta kapaṭa prāẏe mote diśai debarāja | 23 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bolanti pātha rudhira māṁẏesa gahane
teṇu utasalye rābadianti utapāta pacchī jībagaṇe | 24 |
lg.note: –ẏekara paḍante se āreka abatari<lb/>kiḷikiḷā śabade se māranti gālatūri |(ña, ka)
–kiḷikiḷā śabade ke tāṁku nuheṁ sari |(ṭha, na, tha)
teṇu se rāba dianti kāka uluka pacchīmāne |(ja, ka)

lg.l: na bratanti yoddhāẏe ye paḍanti pātha āge | 25 |
śuṇa ho caitana śrīhari kūṭa kapaṭa
mārante na sarai meḷeccha saini se akāṭa atuṭa | 26 |
abhimanyu teṇe na paḍile jāḷandhara bhūaṭi ẏeṇe na sari | 27 |
āho caitana māẏādhara aṭanti se jagata gosāiṁ
mahākhaḷā pātichanti hari arjunaku gocara ye nāhiṁ | 28 |
se ta na chaḍilā ẏeta nuārile jiṇi
ẏekā rathake bhūẏe paśilā kumāra abhimanyu
kemante yuddha hoilā mote kahibā kumbharuṣi tanu | 33 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā abhimanyu yuddha kathā | 34 |
candrakiraṇa prāẏeka diśai ratha ye dhabaḷī | 35 |
lg.note: –āho caitana aghora māẏā jagata gosāiṁ<lb/>chāẏā māẏā beni peṣichanti arjune gocara nāhiṁ |(ja, tha, ca)
–chāẏā māẏā kaḷikāḷa bīranta dekhāi<lb/>mahākhaḷā yuddha karabanti bhābagrāhī |(ga)
–biṣṇura māẏāre jāḷandhara bhūanta dekhāi<lb/>mahākhaḷā yuddha dekhānte hari arjunaṁku gocara nāhiṁ |(ṭa, jha)
lg.l: durāpada catrabhūa se abheda yāhā boli
ulaṭa bheda na jāṇai se chāpe ratha peli | 36 |
raṇaraṁga dhandoḷa se ratha ye caḷante
arjuna parāẏe bujhi se yoddhāẏe apasarante | 37 |
tīkṣaṇa munā śare ye cchedai sarba dhanu | 38 |
bindhanti lakṣe yoddhāẏe ẏeka mukhe nārājanta gheni | 39 |
sambhāḷi thāa aśva na puṇa kṣepanti gagana | 42 |
sārathi boilā ẏeta aṭai agamya raṇa
ẏethi gamibu kimpe tu ẏekā bāḷutanandana | 43 |
abhimanyu boilā tāta cintā kimpe karu
ẏe chara sanyaṁku muṁ ye nibāribi dhūruṁ | 44 |
tu ye boilu ho ẏe agamya ghorabana
ẏe bana dahane mo nārāja hutāśana | 46 |
lg.note: –tīkṣaṇa munā śare ye chedai sarbatanu |(tha, na, ta)
–sārathi boilā, ẏeta aṭai agamya ghora bana |(ḍa, ña, ja, ṭa, cha pāṭha upayukta boli jaṇāyāe)
–mo mātuḷa hari muṁ sāṁgrāme jagujitā<lb/>na jāṇuki sārathi kṣatriẏa mora pitā |(ga, ca)

lg.l: ẏekā śareṇa ye paḍanti hāthī rathī
nabalakṣa yoddhā gheni se samarakaiṁ āẏe | 54 |
nabalakṣa yoddhā se saburi hāthe dhanu
troṇaru abhimanyu tāhā bege bācchiṇa kāṛhilā | 56 |
kareṇa se nārāja gheni sohodrāra tanu
hāthare dhariṇa mantra ḍākile hoilā sahasraśikhāmunā

lg.note: –ke śate ke pañchāśe ke beniśata śarabinddha |(ca, ka, ḍa, ga, gha)
–lakṣe lakṣe nārāja abhimayu bindhai muhūrtte |(ḍa, ga, tha)
lg.l: nabalakṣa yoddhā ye paḍile sarbe ḍhaḷi
tāṁka upare caḷāi nelā se sārathi ratha ye dhabaḷī | 60 |
raṇaraṅga kariṇa sahasreka rathī tinisahasra hāthī
arjuna prāẏe maṇilā se ādityara tanu | 64 |
nanddhaghoṣa kr̥ṣṇa sārathi nāhiṁ, nāhiṁ kapiketana dhvaja cinha | 65 |
karatāra bijaẏe kale ki śūnyabhmabana upekṣi | 66 |
puṇa puṇa niropai se karṇṇa mahārathī
boile se bāḷuta abhimanyu ẏeḍe kimpe duṣṭa | 68 |
go brāhmaṇa hoile śiracchedana ẏe bhūmira | 69 |
aṇa uprodhī yoddhāmāne chanti ẏe samare
bāḷuta br̥ddha taruṇa ẏe sama ẏekarāśi
abaśya prāṇa nāśi samare yehu paśi | 71 |
ẏeḍe baḍa samare paśi tu hoilu niśaṁkā
aśisahasra yoddhāku tu bāḷuta pua ẏekā | 72 |
ẏemāne jībite nāhānti ki tu ẏekāputra goṭi | 73 |
thāṭha sanya ādikari kehi nāhānti tora pacha | 75 |
kheḷantā hasantā ture aṭu bāḷuta hāde pua
kimbhūte chāṇḍāḷe re tote hoile nirmoha | 76 |
prahtama dvāra rakhanti ye rāẏe guru droṇe
ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe ke tāhānta jiṇu raṇe | 77 |
se dvāra jiṇi tu ailu kemante
deba dānabe yāra nāme karanti bhīti | 79 |
iśvaraṁku sebi se pāilā pināka nāme dhanu
tāhānta jiṇi kemante ailu re abhimanyu | 80 |
se mahāyoddhā ye sadā dharmeṇa brati
bāḷuta putra boliṇa abā tote chaḍile tathi | 81 |
samare bāḷuta putra mārite na yogāi
teṇu upekṣā kari chaḍidile re tukuhi | 82 |
āre kṣaṇakare mr̥tu acchi pāṇṭaba pañchāḷaku

lg.note: bigchehoi samare paśilu tu pramādara kāḷa |(ga, ta)
“samare bāḷuta pua mārite na yogāi” | epādāṁśa pūrbare<lb/>adhika pāṭha :–
se puṇa jāṇai bābu ẏe yuddhara bāratā |(ca, ga)
bābu hārilu muṁ yaśa tote jiṇile ayaśa |(tha, na)

lg.l: kimbhūta bairāgare tu samare dilu jhāsa | 85 |
bābu kauroba baṁśaku lakṣmanakumara pāṇṭaba baṁśaku tu abhimanyu
ẏeḍe baḍa baṁśaku sarbe tumbhe bāḷuta beni tanu | 86 |
śalya kr̥pa bhūrisarba dekhile yibu yamaāḷa | 87 |
bābu pitā hoiṇa yebe arjai bibāda
kisa tāhāra jībana kisa tāhara sampada | 88 |
jībana thāuṁ thāuṁ jāṇa sehu hāde malā | 89 |
dekhile nimiṣeka madhyare bhakṣiba tohora māẏeṁsa | 90 |
tuleṇa sākhā nāhiṁ bābu kehu tote āja rakhu
jaḷantā banānaḷare bābu paśilu dekhuṁ dekhuṁ | 91 |
muhiṁ tohora āpāda gheni yāiṁ kināre bāḷa
āre samare yehuṁ paśai abaśya tāku māri
dharma adharma ye dui na bichāri | 93 |
bāhuḍi yāa bābure na bhāḷa kicchi lāja | 94 |
bāsudeba yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba
āja yadi se āsante ẏetedhūra pariyante

lg.note: kisa tāhāra kuṭumba kisa tāhāra sampada |(ka, ja, ña)
yebaṇa jana hāde bābu kuṭumba nāśakalā |(ka, ja, ña)
lg.l: āho caitana gurujana jhiṁghāsa śuṇi kopita abhimanyu
guṇa ṭaṁkāra śabade se ādhāna kalā dhanu | 98 |
micheheṁ kete darpa kaha ho ādityara tanu | 99 |
raṇayāga na kari sehu śara śeyyāẏe śutile | 100 |
dvāra chaḍi guru yebe na yānte āḍo hoi
śiracchedi āṇanti nā dekhantu svāmī tuhi | 102 |
boila jadyarathakaiṁ ye iśvare dile dhanu
tāhāra thāṭha manthilāṭi ẏehi bāḷuta abhimanyu | 103 |
ẏebeṭi ho tāta karṇṇa tumbhara dekhante
nabasahasa rājā muṁ māili ẏeka rathe | 104 |
arjunaṁku na dekhi tumbhe mattagarba kaha
keuṇa kāḷe arjunaṁka chamure tumbhe raha | 105 |
dhanu āmañchana kari nuārila paṭāra upare | 106 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya kr̥pāchāryya bhūri
lājapāi sabhāre basila lākha binddhata nuāri | 107 |
pitā mohora arjuna mahālākha binddhale yetebeḷe
para śirī dekhi nuāri pātila mahāgoḷe | 108 |
kebaṇa abasthā tumbhanta na dilāṭi pāṇḍaba bibacche | 109 |
lg.note: raṇayāga kari sehu samare śaraśayyā kale |(ṭha, na, ga, gha, tha, ca, jha, ca,)
śirahiṁ cchedanti nā dekhanta sabuhiṁ |(ga, jha, ca,d ha)
kebaṇa prakāre jiṇi nuārile bibatse |(ja, ñja)
lg.l: bhīmasena thākure tumbhanta dile ratharu pakāi
prāṇe na māriṇa ey tumbhanta gale ḍeiṁ | 110 |
ẏekā rathakeṇa caṛhi ailā citraratha bidyādhara
rājāra keśa dhariṇa se bānddhanelā rathara | 112 |
rājāṁka maitra hoi bhaṇḍi sarba khāa
bhaẏe droyodhanaku bidyādhara lakṣe yojanuṁ chaḍidilā | 115 |
śare śarapantha bānddhale mora pitā pāṁlaguni
yujheṣṭhaṁka pādataḷe paḍile driyodhana nija kāẏā gheni | 116 |
nilaja ātmā gheni ẏetekāḷa acchi brati
tumbhe uburiṇa he tāhāṁku beḷe beḷe dia śāsti | 117 |
sohodrā bibhāhoi gala ye baḷarāmaṁka bole
ẏekā arjuna tumbhantaki abasthā na kale | 118 |
birāṭa rājyaku gala ye godhana haraṇe
saburi prāṇa harilā ẏekā arjunara raṇe | 119 |
śahasranta tiāri boilā ẏehāṁkara prāṇa ye na ghena
śira na kāṭi nele mukuṭa śrībhūṣā
nilaja ātmā gheni jībanaku tumbhara bharasā | 121 |
lg.note: tumbhara buddhibaḷe tāhāṁkara ẏeḍe śāsti |(ṭa, ḍa)

lg.l: tāhāpāiṁ kete tumbhe na kala samara | 122 |
ẏekā arjuna ye āborile kumara śāmba
bhīṣma droṇa bhūrisarba śalya kete na kale sāṁgrāma | 123 |
māriṇa pāṇḍabe samastaṁku kale khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
cheḍanta rakhiṇa muṇḍile tumbhara sabuṁkari muṇḍa | 124 |
kahante na sarai tumbhara mānuṣyapaṇa kathā | 125 |
āhohā tu ho pitā mote kemante boilu sāna
mohora piara nuhanti ki se pāṇḍaba arjuna | 126 |
mohora hāthe nidhana ye kauroba sakaḷa | 128 |
āho karṇṇa kṣatrī hoi, hāde guṇa bidyāthile
ke tāhā sāna kariba samare paśile | 129 |
kiñchita agni hāde saṁsāra dahi pārai
biṣara sūcīmū ne ki prāṇī na hārai | 130 |
śrī bāsudeba sāna janmi debakīra koḷe
āho karṇṇa hāde muhiṁ garuḍa tumbhe samaste ahi
ke āja śasra dhariba mohora āge rahi | 133 |
āho karṇṇa apāra indūra ye hoanti palapala
se rahi yuddha karibe ki mañjārīra tula | 134 |
lg.note: ke tāhā sāna boliba samare paśile |(ṅa, gha, ga, dha)
lg.l: tumbhe indūra pala muṁ aṭai mañjārī
āho karṇṇa tumbhe ye boila kurusāgara baḷa ẏehi
samasteheṁ tumbhe sāhera muṁ ye aṭai agasti
āho karṇṇa tumbhe ye boila ẏe kurusāgara sanyabana
prāṇatyāja bahani muṁ samasta karibi dahana | 138 |
tūmbhe ho karṇṇa saṁcaẏe harāila buddhi
kointāṁkara bacana meṇṭila ẏebe haraila sakaḷa sampradhi | 139 |
lakṣe rājāṁka śiromaṇi huantā tumbhara pāṭa | 140 |
mote bāṭa na chaḍile tumbhara jībana kṣaṇe | 141 |
tumbhe mohora jyeṣṭha tāta boliṇa muhiṁ ye śuṇili
gurura guru boli ẏete beḷa prāṇadāna dili | 142 |
āho karṇṇa yadyapi parbate aṭanti atuṭai
bajra prahāre puṇa sabuṁkari kāẏā phuṭai | 143 |
lg.note: –āhe karṇṇa yete tumbhe acha kurubaḷa<lb/>citāgni sama muṁ dahya karibi sakaḷa |(kha, na)
“lakṣe rājāṁka śiromaṇi huantā tumara paṭa” | ehi pādānta pare tha o ṅa pothidvaẏare pāṭha :–
kaurobaṁka baḷe paśi tumbhe hoila ẏebe hata
gurura guru boli ẏetebeḷa sahili |(cha, ña, ṭha, na, tha)
bajra prahāre puṇa sabuṁkari kāẏā tuṭai |(ka, ta)
lg.l: āho karṇṇa tumbhe mote sāna ye na bola
chatrīpaṇaku muṁ tote aṭai meru samatula | 144 |
ātreṣiṇa chahiṁlā puṇa nārāja dhanure pūroi
boilā tote māranteṇa re yaśa pauruṣa mote nāhiṁ | 146 |
kopeṇa rādheba ye kalā nārāja br̥ṣṭi
samasta nārāja cchedilā se sohodrāra tanu | 148 |
sahasre nārāja binddhalā ye roṣa bahi | 151 |
āho lāghaba yuddheṇa se rādheba prajjvaḷita
andhatkāra ghora śara binddhalā karṇṇa mahābaḷī
kiraṇa arka śara ye māilā kumara
karṇṇara andhāra śara se kalāka nārakhāra | 155 |
lg.note: kṣetrīpaṇaku muṁ aṭai tora tula |(ña, na, tha, ṭha)
puṇa pesilā pāñchaśata nārāja aguḷi |(ṭa, cha)
–dinamaṇi śara ye binddhalāka bāḷa<lb/>karṇṇara ghora andhāra śara hoilā niṣphaḷa |(ka, cha)
lg.l: se śara biartha dekhi karṇṇa mahārathā
sehi sārikṣe nārāja bighāteṇa bhāñji harila karṇṇara darpa | 158 |
sāṣṭāma hoiṇa karṇṇa puṇa dhanu dhari
haẏa sārathi sahite ratha cchedilā tāhāri | 161 |
sohodrāra nandana ye śara āsanteṇa jāṇi
karṇṇara sahasre śara dhūrahuṁ bege pakāilā hāṇi | 164 |
rudhire jara jara karṇṇa paḍiṇa moha yāi
ākāśe byāpilā ye abhimanyu śaṁkha dhuni
jāḷandhara byūhe thāi tāhā śuṇile catrapāi | 167 |
lg.note: –hāboḍā śareka abhimanyu ye peṣilā<lb/>karīru uttāna hoi karṇṇa ye paḍilā |(tha,na)
lg.l: hr̥dagate cinti tāhā jāṇile debadhi debarāja
śarīru bhaẏa na chaḍi deba ye acyuta
jāḷandhara kūṭa kapaṭa kahita ki pāri | 170 |
tahiṁki gyāna nāhiṁ abiśrāme samara karai dhanurjaẏe | 171 |
bāhai tetana sārathi ratha ye dhabaḷā | 172 |
caturtha dvāre miḷilā yāi arjunara suta | 174 |
pañchāśa koṭi yoddhā tule rāẏeguru śalya
dekhiṇa abhimanyura ye na phurai kicchi
dekhile dvāre ye pañchāśa koṭi rathī

lg.note: samare kumara prāṇatyāga hoiba āja |(tha, na)
samare abhimanyu nohicchi prāṇatyāja |(cha, ta, ga, ca)
manaru se cintā nohibāru dūrībhūta |(na, ṭha)
byūhabheda na huai achanti kapata kari |(ka, ña)
lg.l: nārāja br̥ṣṭi dekhiṇa se kumāra abhimanyu
dibase andhakāra ta na diśai bāṭa | 183 |
nauceta ratha muṁ bāhai gagana gati | 184 |
aśvanta sambhāḷi ẏebe ratha mora bāhā
muhiṁ mahāchatrī tu na bola mote ẏehā | 186 |
abhimanyu niṣṭhura bacana śuṇiṇa ketana sārathi
ẏe ne(?) bichārante se ratha bege caḷi
sannidhye prabeśa hoilā ratha ye dhabaḷī | 193 |
guṇa ṭaṁkāra nāde kampai ye gaganamaṇḍaḷa | 194 |
ẏeka jaḍita hoi phuṭainā nārāja paḍante | 196 |
nārāja na lāganti se dhabaḷī rathaku | 197 |
āho caitana satyabara boli ẏekai rāẏe
re re kāra kariṇa se abhimanyuku ogāḷile | 203 |
nabasahasra yoddhāṁku ẏekā nārāja binddhai abhimanyu | 205 |

div.note: –gokṣīra śveta samāna tāra aśvamāna<lb/>maṇḍi hoichanti nānā ratana bhūṣaṇa |(kha, ṭha, na)
kaṇaẏa chaẏeṇa se pabanuṁ bege bājī |(gha, ṅa)
gagana kṣepi pāranti pabanuṁ bege bājī |(ca, ḍa)

lg.l: gahaḷa dekhi kr̥tānta śara kalāka ādhānu
kr̥pa ācharyye boile re rathī kāhāra kati
śalye boile ye abhimanyu āmbhara nāti | 211 |
bāḷutaputra hoita ẏe samare dilā jhāsa | 212 |
uprodha chaḍiṇa se nārāja binddhaleka dhūru | 213 |
agni nārāja upare yahuṁ barasile jaḷe
puṇa sahasre śākhā ye nārāja kare dhari
binddhale nārāja kr̥pe śrī narasiṁha sumari | 218 |

div.note: praḷaẏagni samāna ye uṭhilā tāra teja |(kha, ṭha, na)
sahasraśikhā bahani prāẏe uṭhile bahani |(ca)
kr̥pa āchāyye boile re rathī kāhāra santati |(ña, ḍa, ṅa)

lg.l: sehi sādri śeṇa ākāśuṁ asai nārāja sasradhāra | 219 |
parbata śr̥ṁgamāna ki abā paḍuacchi bhāji | 220 |
sārathi boilā ho sambhāḷa tora ratha
deba śahasra bindha ho tebe se hoiba hata | 221 |
garuḍā śareka gheni abhimanyu prahāra kalāka dūruṁ | 224 |
kr̥pe praśaṁsanti abhimanyu jībana tohora dhani
kr̥pe śalye duheṁ puṇa bindhanti śasra gheni | 225 |
kr̥pe puṇa sahasre nārāja binddhaleka rāge | 227 |
chāri aśvanta se ye chārisasra bāṇa
binddha binddha bimukha hoile beni yodhī

div.note: –himādri o meru girikhaṇḍamāna ki abā paḍuacchi bhāji |(bahu pāṭha)

lg.l: se śara gheni abhimanyu kopeṇa binddhalā | 233 |
puṇa nidrāgha bāṇa yahuṁ binddhalā abhimanyu
aneka nārāja binddhale rāẏe śalya guru
parbatā śareka ye binddhale śalya mahārathī
abhimanyu bajraśare tāhā dhūruṁ ye nipāti | 241 |
rome rome gaḷita bhedilā tīkṣamunā bāṇa

div.note: –raṇe birathī hoile yahuṁ mahārathī |(gha, tha, na, ña, ṭa)

lg.l: āho caitana bhūa bhediṇa abhimanyu jiṇilā ẏekārathe
pañchama dvārara ẏebe śuṇimā yuddhara kathā
kehu śate kehu sahasre ṭaṁkāri bāṇa māri
ke kete bindhanti bāṇa tāhā kaḷita nuāri | 249 |
bindhante bāṇa abicchanne dibi bhmabi kampai | 251 |
śira cchiḍi nācanti kabandha raṇa madhya | 255 |

div.note: –pañchamadvāra āborile bhūrisarba<lb/>aśilakṣa yoddhā tule se dutī maghabā |(bahu pāṭha)
kaḷebara cchiḍipaḍi nā canti kabandha |(ḍa, dha, ka)

lg.l: pādānti baḷa ābara ke kahiba gaṇitā
raṇaraṁga manthana kalā se arjuna sutā | 259 |
ẏe sarba saini hele chagaḷa prakāra
sahiṣṇu paṇaku tu aṭu ho abanī | 266 |

div.note: –“rakate karddana sarbe hoile māṭimiśā |”<lb/>ehi pādāṁśa pare “cha” re adhikā pāṭha :–
pabana ghāte yenhe paḍai paṁkuphaḷa
āditya draśane yenhe gaṅgaśiuko phula |
ẏekāẏe abhimanya teḍe baḷa manthi
hāboḍā śare paḍanti ratha mattahāthī |

lg.l: 263|2–baḍimāpaṇe tu ye meruhuṁ acaḷa |(ña, ta, cha)
ẏeḍe baḍa yoddhāku asāhā hoilā thāṭha
ẏekā jaṇake sabu mukaḷa kalā bāṭa | 271 |
ẏekamukha hoi hāde beṛhi śara binddha | 273 |
śate nārāje tāhā abhimanyu kalā naṣṭi | 275 |
daśasahasra rājānta samara karai ẏekā jaṇe | 276 |
nakṣatra madhye yenhe candramā teja diśi
apāra sanya sagara ye gahaḷa dhandoḷa
nārāja br̥sṭire na diśai ākāśa maṇḍaḷa | 278 |
bhāra nibāraṇe jāta se saubhadrara suta | 279 |
aśva sarathi rathī āu kāhiṁ keṇe acchi | 283 |
bhāḷai abhimanyu na caḷai yahuṁ ratha
sārathiki na diśai ratha chāri ye bārāsa
aśve abā nāhānti boli uḍilā sāhāsa | 288 |
uḍile chāriaśve ye hele gagana gati | 290 |
abhimanyu dekhilā ye haẏe sarathi ratha
raṇabhūmi chaḍi kimpe mo ratha kalu śūnya | 292 |
kisa bola bolibe mote pitā mohora śuṇi | 293 |
lg.note: –rathīki na śubhai aśva sārathi śabada |(jha, ja)
–ki boli bolibe mote kr̥ṣṇa pāṁlaguni |(cha, ja, ca)
lg.l: samara kāḷe yebaṇa chatrī piṭhi dyanti
kopa na kari śuṇa pārthiba santati | 295 |
aśve na diśile mora uḍilā sāhasa | 297 |
samara abhimukhe kara ratha mora nei | 299 |
sanyara sammukhe ratha kalā nei dhāti | 300 |
tini marbhmata yoddhā se gheniṇa jānughaṇṭa nr̥pati
paśupatra śare gaja yoddhānta lakṣe hāṇi | 304 |
teṇu kari bāṇe tini sahasra rathī pāḍilā | 305 |
bhājile samadaṇḍabaḷa chamure na rathile kehi | 306 |
ratha aśva gaja yoddhā uḍile gagane
tāhāra tule thile dui sahasra pāridaṇḍa
nārāja bighāte se hoile khaṇḍa khaṇḍa | 312 |
pabana āpāte ratha bege galā jiṇi
tiriśi sahasra yoddhā gheni bhūrisarba mahārathī
dekhiṇa abhimanyu dūre thāi rathare pariṇāmi
ẏe dvāra chaḍi apasari yibāka debasvāmī | 315 |
apāra kāḷara tumbhe aṭa ho kuḷabr̥ddha
muhiṁ bāḷuta mohora tule kisa tumbha yuddha | 316 |
muhiṁ apayaśa dekhili tumbhara dhanu dharu | 317 |

lg.note: –muhiṁ āśrija hoili dekhili tumbhara dhanu dharu |(gha, ñja, tha,)
kumara uparaku binddhale bege dhāiṁ |[dha, ṭa, na, tha, ṭha]

lg.l: pañchaṣaṭhī śare abhimanyu tāhā sarba hāṇi | 322 |
puṇa nirghāta bāṇa ye binddhalā kumaramaṇi
kośaḷa rājāra tule tiniśata yoddhā pakāilā hāṇi | 324 |
beni sahasra rājā paḍileka tāhāṁkara dekhante | 325 |

lg.note: –pañchuśara ṭāṇi binddha abhimanyu tāhā hāṇi |[ṭha, ṭa, ña]
–dakṣiṇa kośaḷara ye māna arajuna<lb/>pacchima kośaḷara ye paḍile samasta rājāmāna |(ṅa, ḍa)
lg.l: ratna maṇi mukuṭa ye toḍhara bāhuṭi
pāñchasahasra gaja sātabr̥nda bājī ye chokhāra | 338 |
nāna śahasra māriṇa tā nuāranti khaṇḍi | 339 |
sahi na pāriṇa kope arjuna kumara | 340 |
pāñchasāta yojana ye ẏeka ẏeka śaiḷa | 344 |
dhanya tora pitā mātā dhanyare kumara
tāha dekhi abhimanyu bāruṇā śara peṣi
saptama duāre ratha ogāḷile guruṁka nandana | 354 |
abhimanyu nibārai pratiśara kari tāhā hāṇi
dūrahuṁ dekhilā se dhabaḷī nāme ratha | 366 |
nārāja gahaḷe āu na diśai ratha | 368 |
puṇihiṁ peṣilā se ye mudgara śakati
dhabaḷī ratha bāhi galā se tatakṣaṇa | 372 |
re re bāḷuta mānaba ẏeḍeka bharasu
dekhuṁ dekhaṁ jalantā anaḷe kehne paśu | 377 |
ẏekāẏe jiṇiṇa muṁ aili kete rathī
droṇa karṇṇa jadyaratha kr̥pa śalya bahu chatrī | 379 |
tu ẏebe ẏehikṣaṇi hoibu prāṇe nāśa
amāsyā dine yehne andhāra ghora niśi | 381 |
driyodhana rājā tule chanti daśasahasra rājana | 392 |
bindhante śūnya na yāi se abhimanyura bāṇa
paḷābanti gaja aśve ye hoiṇa mukuḷā | 404 |
abhimanyu samara mahimāṁ ye debaṁku agocara
ratha gaja aśva sabuṁkari kāẏe bhedi
ẏekā rathīke śate śate baṇa binddha | 407 |
senhā phuṭi nārāje bhedanti rome rome
āho caitana nabasahasra rāja tinisahasra pāridaṇḍa
ghaḍika samare abhimanyu kāṭilā ẏete muṇḍa | 411 |

lg.note: –rathīṁka deharu radhira karai ye keḷi<lb/>paḷānte aśvagaje medamedā māṁse dhūḷi |(ja)

lg.l: bhagnabaḷa gheniṇa abhimanyaku beḍhile sarbe yāiṁ | 416 |
daśabiṁśa tiriśa śara samaste beḍhi binddha | 417 |
bindhai nārāja se kheḷantā siṁgha jāṇi | 418 |
kandhu cchiḍi mauḷi ye loṭanti mahītaḷa | 419 |
kāhāra bhmaja cchiḍi kāhāra kaḷebara loṭi
muṇḍābr̥kṣa prāẏe nacanti kabandha koṭi koṭi | 420 |
ẏekāẏe bhārā nibārilu bāḷuta aṭu tanu | 421 |
se āsi śūnye lāgile abhimanyura pāśe | 422 |

lg.note: –debe praśaṁsā karanti kumāra dhani dhani<lb/>ẏekā bhārā nibārilu dhanya to jananī |(ga, ca)
cabhake cakita ye bicchannapañchabhūta |(gha, ja, ṭa)
lg.l: āho baibasuta manu ye pucchile agastiṁki
bihantā puruṣe kimpe aile abhimanyura katiki | 425 |
kahanteṇa asaṁkhya anta na yāi sarbathā | 426 |
se ādi abatāre mātā ẏehāra bhairobī ugratārā
māẏe poẏe hoi se nibāranti mahībhārā | 430 |
ẏehāra mātā janama hoi nandamahākhuḍa ghare
kaṁsa kachaḍilā nei ghaṭaṇa śiḷā upare | 431 |
ẏe mātā putraṁku gobinde āṇile satya maṇāiṁ
tumbhe duheṁ mr̥tupure upujiba mohora pāiṁ | 432 |
ādiki boile tu sohodra garbhe janama hoibu
se ādi boile muṁ svargarakṣā karai
tohora bacana muṁ na bhāṅgibāra arthe
cauda baraṣahuṁ adhika muṁ na rahaiṭi pr̥thīgate | 435 |
sehi raṇabhūiṁre māribiṭi tote pitāra sahite | 437 |
keśaba boile muṁ yeuṁṇa dine hoibi jāta
sedina beḷa tinidaṇḍara madhye svargaku āsiba tora māta | 439 |
se se bhairobī ugratārā nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane
śrīkr̥ṣṇa jāta hoibe mathurāre basudebaṁka nandane | 440 |
kaṁsara ḍare basudeba nema putraku pālaṭāi
āpaṇā putra dei kumārī āṇilā sehi | 441 |
se duhitāku kachaḍilā ghaṭaṇa śiḷāra upara | 442 |
kapaṭakūṭa kale hari jāḷandare abhimanyura bhaẏe
arjunaku bhāratha yuddhe ubhākari nuārile jagannāthe | 445 |
arjuna raṇe thile na paḍai abhimanyu
sedina samare na paḍile māriba se kr̥ṣṇa pāṁlaguni | 446 |
se āsiṇa caudabaraṣa ākāśa kalāka bhaganasta | 447 |
kebaṇa dige megha pāḷi na pāḷilā | 449 |
brahmāẏe boile indraku āji svargaku naile

div.note: dhāta boile indraku ādi svargaku aile<lb/>udekabandha nāśayiba tāhāra yuddha kale |(jha, ṭha)

lg.l: bhāratha yuddhe abhimanyu thiba yetedina pariyante
ẏe bhāratha yuddhe uprodha na chaḍiba bīrapātha
kaurobaṁka saṁge abhimanyu yuddha kari bratibā paryyanta | 455 |
putrakaṣṭe māriba se sakaḷa kauraba baḷa saini | 456 |

div.note: ubhākari–ṭhiākari |
“putrakaṣṭe māriba se sakaḷa kauroba baḷa saini” :–ehi pāṭha<lb/>pare “cha” pothire adhika pāṭha :–
abhimanyu male teṇe jāḷandhara jiṇime
kaurobe maribe ye ajunara tame |
ẏemanta bhiāṇa hari āgahuṁ se kari
br̥haspatiṁka chamure bāsaba pachāri |
bho guru udekabandha svarga kala jūra
āmbhe tāku raṇe sari nohu debāsura |
ye duṣṭa drapiṣṭa āne kemante mariba
br̥haspati boile kahibā tahiṁra bhāba |
ādi janma hoilā ye se hodrā garbhare
bihantāpuruṣa peṣi tāhānta gheniāsa
se ādi udekabandhaku karibaṭi nāśa |
āja yadi na āsiba amara maṇḍaḷe
kāli kr̥ṣṇa arjunaku māriba samare |
ẏehā śuṇi surarāẏe hoile uṣata
takṣaṇe peṣidile bihantā puruṣanta |
āhe bihantā puraṣe yahuṁ kale kūṭakapaṭa
nārāja bindhante hoilā akāṭa apuṭa |

lg.l: ẏe saneka sañchita ye kale debaloke
āho bihantā puruṣe yahuṁ kale kūṭakapaṭa
ẏeteka sanya gheniṇa se bhānumatīra baḷā
trailokye ẏeka hoile nāhiṁ tāku jiṇantā | 462 |
bhūa jaẏe karilā se daśadvāra bhedi
daśa sahasra rājā sāta marbhmata rathī
amāpata sanya hata hebāra se dekhi
mahābhāratha yuddhe tāhā chamure ke miḷantā | 467 |

div.note: ẏeḍe kr̥tyakalā hāde bāḷuta tanaẏe |(ka, tha, ña, ja)

lg.l: duheṁ samare ye nohanti kehi occha
tāhāṁkara chamure ke rahilā dhanu dharu | 472 |
asaṁkhya śara ye bindhanti beni rathī
puṇa bāṇa binddhaṇa se droṇara santati
dinakara śare tāhā cchedilā kumāra pañchāṇa | 482 |
āditya teja na diśai gagana maṇḍaḷa | 484 |
bāḷeka hoi tu śahasra baḍa cihnu | 491 |
āna rathī ke miḷiba tohroa chamure | 492 |
ẏeḍe dhanurddhara tu śaṁkā nāhiṁ kicchi | 493 |
ẏehāku manthana kalu hoi tu mandara | 497 |
kauroba baḷa āja yānte kire bhale | 499 |
abhimanyu boile ẏebe samara kara tāta
āja kauroba baḷa muṁ karibi nipāta | 500 |
ẏete boli ahibrate śara ye baraṣi
aśastamā pañchadaśa bāṇe tāhā sabu kaṭi | 502 |
puṇa kopeṇa binddhalā ye bāsabara nāti
ẏekā tahiṁ dhabaḷīratha rahilā se bhale | 506 |
baḍai durāpada ẏe aśastamā abhimanyu beni rathīra yuddha kathā | 507 |
samara kariṇa se duheṁ hele bhaṁga
kṣatrībr̥tte sampūrṇṇa se aṭanti beni aṁga | 509 |
beḷe beḷe se samara karanti roṣabahi
badanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu rājā
samara dekhi driyodhana pāilā baḍa lajjā | 511 |
śuṇa ho caitana abhimanyura yuddha kathā
aśastamāra ratha sārathi āsa bege māri | 515 |
sambhāḷare abhimanyu tu āmbhara ye putra | 519 |
aśastamā aṁge paḍi hāthī ye bināśi | 523 |

div.note: –mahābāte yenhe paḍai br̥kṣa bhāñji<lb/>pāñchayojana māḍi sanya paḍile nimajji |(ka, ṭa)

lg.l: ketana sārathi dhabaḷī ratha ye bāhilā
hāṭhī rathī aśva ke kariba gaṇitā | 526 |
aneka deśara achanti se bahuta ye rājā
aneka rājā tahiṁ ye kaleṇi prāṇatyajā | 527 |
raṇe cchedilā se aneka chatrīṁkara dhanu | 528 |
asaṁkhya saini ye kaḷanā na galā | 529 |
ẏeteka yoddhā ki paḍile mohora raṇe
nohile ki bhūabhedi ailā ẏekā jaṇe | 532 |
mote beḍhilā āsi laṁkā gaḍara bāẏe | 534 |
bho daiba bolikari kapāḷe kara dhinda | 535 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna nāhiṁ bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba
ẏekā bāḷuta kr̥ta mote baḍāi asambhaba | 536 |

div.note: –mote se bāhilā niṣādapura bāẏe ||(ka, ta)
–robai daiba daiba boli kapāḷe kara dhinda |(ka, ta)

lg.l: rājāra mukhuṁ śuṇibe yahuṁ aniryyāpa bāṇī
tinilakṣa yoddhā kunta prahāra kale āṇi | 539 |
rathe prahāra kale kunta parigha śakati | 540 |
dhāmai śara pūroi se mantrī ye śaṁkuni
dhanu nārāja guṇa cchedile bege tini | 542 |
khaḍaga phaḍi dhari se rathuṁ ḍeiṁ paḍilā turita | 543 |
bitrama siṁgha jāṇi se karai pādagati
asipatra gheniṇa cchedila śate śate rathī | 544 |
khaḍaga kunta karabāḷa parigha guruja jāṭhi
khaḍaga phaḷā gheniṇa se sārathi rathībeni
pādagati kari yuddhe pāḍile rāuta śata tini | 457 |

div.note: –“adharma yuddhakari beḍhile bāḷuta tanaẏe” ehi pādāntapare “ña” o “ṭha” re adhikā pāṭha :–
anekaśasra binddhale rājā driyodhana
ẏekā yuddha karai se kumāra abhimanya |
śuṇa ho caitana dvāpara yugara kathā
bāḷekaku sodara dianti abastā |
ke deḍhutāke khuḍutā ke ajā mātuḷa huanti
ẏekamukha hoi se samara karanti|
–pahaḍanti–pahañranti |

lg.l: āho guruja bulāi ye piṭilā durmanu
piṭante phaḷā ye āḍilā kumāra abhimanyu | 549 |
samare śūnya hātha hoilā paṇḍu rājāra nāti | 552 |
puṇa āreka beḷa gada prahāra kalā toḷi
asthi carma māẏeṁsa sabu hoilāka dhūḷi | 555 |
raṇa jaẏa kari bāhuḍilā se gāndhārī dulāḷa | 556 |
dhika dhika mānagobinda boli boile debaloke | 557 |
indre āgyāṁ dile ye mātaḷiki rāi
ādiki āṇa yāho puṣyeka rathare basāi | 558 |

div.note: ātreṣiṇa gadābara prahāra kalā śire<lb/>hoilā asāṣṭama se paṇḍaba kumāre | (ṭa, cha)

lg.l: indre boile tuhi ẏe amarapuraku ẏekājaṇe
dibya abatara hoi yāa yā kabandha māraṇe | 562 |
kabandha nāśakalā mora ẏehi amara bhmabana
tora hāthe se niceṁ asura hoiba nidhana | 563 |
indra boile mahībhāra uśvāsa kalu basudhā nimante
ādi boilā mora ketana sārathi ratha ye dhabaḷī
trijībī sārathī mora ratha haẏe chāri
tebe se dānababaḷa muṁ pārai saṁhāri | 567 |
indra boile ketana yibānā ratha gheni
sajahoi yāiṁ tu asura māra bega | 570 |

div.note: “koḷe basāi aneka ucchaba karanti |” ehi pāṭha pare “cha”<lb/>pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
kiraṭī mukuṭa ye bāhuṭi jagadaḷā
hr̥daku padaka ye kaṇṭhaku ratnamāḷā |
indra boile bābu kumāra ādi śuṇa
aneka yuddha kalu kabanddha maẏaṇa ||

lg.l: ādi boile se ratha sārathi aile karibi sinā yuddha
yahuṁ se pratagyā kalā bāḷuta tanaẏe
bijaẏe ketana yāi chāri bhāiṁkara kati | 574 |
ātmā bisarjana se sārathi mukha chāhiṁ
tu ẏekā ailu bābu āmbhara abhimanyu kahiṁ | 576 |
aneka guṇa sumari ye bāuniṇa kāndi
chatrībr̥tta chaḍiṇa keśabāsa ye na bānddha | 581 | [890 + 581 = 1471]

div.note: gataātmā prāẏe hoile śūnye ratha chāhiṁ |(tha, ña)
–sahadebakaiṁ boile mahīpati<lb/>hāribā jiṇimā se kṣatrīṁkara br̥tti ||(ca, ga)
div.head: {@sañjaẏa dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅkara kathopakathana<lb/>o<lb/>arjunara aśubha darśana@}

lg.l: āho teṇe jaẏaśaṁkha dhuni kariṇa hastinā paśanti kuruthāṭha
jaẏeśaṁkha maṁgaḷa ta śubhai ghora dhuni | 2 |
śatr̥jita pātāṅga uḍai sabuṁkari rathara upare
bhīma paḍilā ki āho ājara samare | 3 |
teṇukari utsaba se hoikinā āmbhara thāṭha
jadyaratha ye sebā karithilā deba kāśī
arjuna na thile chāripāṇḍabanta pārai se naśi | 5 |
nicaẏe jadyaratha nāśa kalāṭi chāri pāṇṭabaṁku | 6 |
jadyaratha nāẏeṁ śubhmacchiki jaẏe jaẏe bāṇī
ẏemanta śubhayoge jadyarathakaiṁ muṁ dilāiṁ kumārī
kāḷe mote hoilā se parama hitakārī | 8 |
sañjaẏe boile śuṇa ho bicitrabīryyara santati
arjunaku gheni hari gale bhūa jāḷandhare
iśvara bara prasāde se chāripāntabanta ogāḷilā | 12 |
duja dvāra jiṇi ẏekā galā abhimanyu
ratha nāma dhabaḷī sārathi nāma ketanu | 13 |
nārāje koṭi koṭi pādānti yoddhā cchedi | 19 |
ẏekā ẏeteka dhaṁsilā se bāḷuta puagoṭi | 21 |
kapaṭa yuddhakari beḍhi māile bāḷuta kumare | 22 |
samaste beḍhi bhīmāku pārante yebe māri
nicaẏe pañchu rājye ho hoantānā adhikārī | 23 |
prāṇe na mārai ẏekā se uprodha karai tumbhaṁku | 25 |
mohaśare bindhai ye prāṇe na mārai pāṭha
bolai ẏehākara male andha pitāgoṭi hoiba anātha | 26 |

div.note: chatradhara bādyakāra paḍile pāñchakoṭi |(bahupāṭha)
chattāra–chaatāra biśiṣṭa bādya biśeṣa |

lg.l: ẏeteka uprodha tohroa puaṁku thilā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
ẏebe moha chaḍiba pātha putrara nidhane
ājhuṁ aputrika hoiluṭi jāṇithā tora mane | 28 |
sañjaẏe boilā mohora bichāraku na yogāi ẏe utsaba
mote diśuacchi sabu ẏe biccheda svabhāba | 29 |
bāḷuta putraku māri mora poẏe manare ẏeḍeka uṣata | 30 |
rūpa bāunanti robanti ki samudra ghoṣaṇe | 33 |
hr̥dagate bichāra se karai puṇa puṇi | 34 |
jāḷandhara bhūa teṇe bhedile kr̥ṣṇa pāṁlagunyu | 37 |
rakatabīryya prāẏe sanya mārante na sarile | 40 |
māẏadhara puruṣa na jāṇai abā kāhā | 42 |
hr̥dagate bighasu mora śrīkr̥ṣṇa śuddha jyoti | 43 |
akāda sagata saṁsāra ẏe mohajaḷa pāṁśi
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe mohora śatasahasra daṇḍa pariṇāma | 46 |
svāmī abhāba saṁsāra muṁ dekhili anīti
jība hou ki ajība hou tohore paramagati | 47 |
nāśakara daṇḍaru nātha tuhi se uddharantā | 48 |
yadyapi bhajili nātha mana bacana karttabye
ẏe nirāpekṣa dvandaru mote pārikaribā bāsudebe | 49 |
na dekhili na paḍhili na śuṇili na bhābili mamahr̥de
kiñchita bhābaku muṁ ye pāili śabade | 50 |
taba padmapāde mor aśira kamaḷa loṭi | 51 |
nīḷa utpaḷa jiṇi ye baṇa kandara

div.note: –buḍilā saṁsāra ẏe mohajaḷe akāraṇa<lb/>bakyadebīra bhaṇḍāra muṁ kalāiṁ bidhvaṁsana |(ña, ja, tha)
ẏe bhaba saṁsāra nātha saẏaḷa janacintā |(ka, ña, ṅa, tha, jha)
durāpada dvandaru nātha tuhi se uddharantā |(ka, ṅa, tha)
nīḷasundara nāma yebaṇa kandara |(ṅa, na, ṭha)

lg.l: hr̥dagate bhābuthāi mohora śrīrāma śrīkr̥ṣṇa nāma | 53 |
tuḷusāra ballabha śrīcaraṇa hr̥dagate mama dhyāna
sātukīki chahiṁ āgyāṁ dle dharmaṁkara tanu | 55 |
tu mohora bacana śuṇasi hāde bābu
na puṇa bāratā tahiṁ pāi pāṁlaguni
putra bināśa boli yemante najāṇu kirīṭī
na puṇa indra praśastaku naāsai leuṭi | 59 |
bho dharmadebatā kehi na kahu arjuna āgare
sehi bāṭe napuṇa pātha paśai samare | 60 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ trodhita se dharma mahīpati
ha hā nandana boli paḍi mohayānti kṣiti | 61 |
tu mohora nandana re prāṇara pañchabhūta
budilāka baṁśa mohora ke kariba rakṣā | 63 |
kebaṇakati chaḍigalu re bāḷuta kumara abhimanya | 65 |

div.note: –somabaṁśaku dhāraṇa bābu tuhi se kalpataru<lb/>buḍilā somabaṁśa kehi nāhiṁ uddhāru |(ka, ña, tha)

lg.l: abaśya prāṇa bisarjibi muṁ khāibaiṁ biṣa | 67 |
poḍu poḍu ātmā mohora ẏehikṣaṇi yāu
bhāira āsibā yāẏe prāṇa mo śarīre nathau | 68 |
celika pua mora nāśagalā mohora dekhante
kisa boli arjuna āsi bolibaṭi mote | 69 |
jaḷu ẏe śarīra boli pāṣāṇe śira koḍi | 70 |
bho daiba puruṣa mora jaḷu beni ākhi
muhiṁ nirlaja rahili tohora bināśa dekhi | 72 |
kisa śabada śubhiba ẏe sāṁsārikā dharme
karate kāṭi muṇḍa prāṇa bisarjibi ẏehikṣaṇi | 74 |
kiṁpāiṁ rahichu re ẏe nirlaja pañchabhūta ātmā
śarīruṁ chaḍi bege yāasi ho mahātamā | 75 |
kemante prāṇa dhariba śuṇile mo bhāi kiraṭī | 76 |
nakuḷara trodha ye kahita ki pāri
pāṣāṇa upare nei nija ura śira tāḍi | 77 |

div.note: –celika–theḷantā śiśu |

lg.l: bābu āmbhe tote ghenigalu mukuṭa yoddhāpaṇe
tote se dei āmbhe ailu chārijaṇe | 79 |
bābu kisa kāraṇare āu jībana āmbhara
bāḷuta putra marāi āmbhe bratilu pāmara | 80 |
bāhāreṇa sāṣṭama ye bhītareṇa baḍa bathā
anamite dvandare paśilu rājyabhāra poḍu poḍu
śūnya bhmabana tejiṇa gale daśadiga pāḷe | 87 |

div.note: –kṣetrī kuḷaku dūṣaṇa baḍalāja<lb/>jana mukhe apakhyāti kuḷeṇa hīnabīryya |(keteka pothi)
–putra kaṣṭa dekhi prāṇa kimpe ho na chaḍu |(ka, ṇa)

lg.l: pr̥thibī dīpa prāẏe putra yahuṁ nāśagalā
svamī āja ye makaramāsa śakaḷa traẏodaśa tithi
nija rūpa dharita na diśilā niśāpati | 93 |
reṇu uḍanteṇa gagane na diśile digapāḷe | 95 |
aneka brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa ẏekayoge raṇe mari
pāpa bādhā basai dharmayuddha yahuṁ sari | 96 |
hari kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷaku mora ratha bāhā | 98 |
dekhanti ratha, gaja, aśva, pādāntiṁkara piṇḍa
cchidraprāẏe hoi cchiḍi paḍichanti khaṇḍa khaṇḍa | 100 |

div.note: –reṇu uḍanteṇa na diśile dibākare |(gha, ṭa)
–aneka brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa raṇe dhvaṁsi<lb/>hatyāra doṣa ye śarīreṇa diśi |(ṭa, ña)
–tahiṁ nimante ẏemāne diśanti āna dr̥ṣṭi |(ja, ga, jha)
–cchinnachantra prāẏe hoi paḍichanti khaṇḍa khaṇḍa |(ja, ṭha)

lg.l: brāgha bhāluka śrīkāḷa kāka śāguṇā ulūka
medinī dala dalita laha laha jihvā matuāḷī
arjuna bolai svāmī śuṇimā yadukuḷa nāhā
pachāribā samare ke māilā kāhā kāhā | 107 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna duheṁ chadile raṇa bhūmi | 108 |
maṅgaḷata na diśai mote ẏe tini jagata | 110 |
adabhūte naẏanu mo bahai aśr̥ bāri
trodheṇa gāṇḍima dhanu muṁ nuārai dhari | 112 |
kebaṇa māẏā bhiāṇa karicha ho mahatamā | 113 |
catrabhūa kūṭa kapaṭa ki kale gurudroṇe | 114 |
hari śukhilā kāṣṭha dāḷa upare basikari kāka
bikaṭāḷa karita āge diai ghora ḍāka | 115 |
gobinde boile yadyapi āsanti brahmā rudra indra
kūṭe bañchāi āsanti śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye gheni | 119 |
paṇḍabaṁku biyoga deba āsa bege leuṭi | 120 |
agyāne arjuna tahā ye maṇita na galā | 121 |
indrapraśaste yāiṇa prabeśa ye hoile tatakṣaṇa
uṣata ullāsa ye kāhāri nāhiṁ kicchi | 124 | [1471 + 124 = 1595]

div.head: {@pāṇḍabādiṅka biḷāpa@}

lg.l: ratharu ohlāi ye gamanti kr̥ṣṇa pāṭha | 1 |

div.note: –apāra biparīta diśai asuārtha |–bahu pāṭha |

lg.l: svāmī catrabhūara kathā kaha kebaṇa upāẏe | 3 |
arjuna boile ye prathama dvāre thile gurudroṇe
tāhākaiṁ jiṇimaku ke sāmaratha hoilāka raṇe | 7 |
duja dvāreṇa ye thile rāẏa jadyaratha
pāṇḍabanta jiṇima boli bara deichanti biśvanātha | 8 |
ke āne jiṇilā karṇṇa, śalya, kr̥pa, bhūrisarbaṁku | 9 |
abheda catrabhūa dekhi āmbhanta na puṁrilā kicchi | 10 |
abhimanyu boila ẏehā pārai muhiṁ bhedi
kr̥ṣṇa arajuna āsi huanti sinā roḷe | 12 |
duja dvāreṇa samara ye jadyaratha tule
ẏekā kumāra se galā ratha bāhi
tijadvare ho hāde karṇṇa acchi rahi | 17 |
aneka yuddha bābu ho kalā tāhāra tule
śalya kr̥paku jiṇilā tohora ye tanu | 19 |
bhūrisarba aśastamā aḷambuṣa somadatta kāśī kauśika
ẏeka ẏeka nārāje koṭi koṭi hāṇi | 21 |
ẏeke ẏeke samareṇa yahuṁ nuārile jiṇi
mukhare śītaḷa jaḷa ye cchiñchanti acyuta
hā hā nandanare mora jagu sodara bābu
āre kebaṇa pātaka muṁ karithili pūrbe

div.note: –adharma yuddhakari sanddhale śara āṇi |(ka, tha, ṭa)
–prasāde–saṅge |

lg.l: muhiṁ tohore putrare na gali niuchaṇā
somabaṁśa uddhāraṇa re mora kuḷara dulaṇā | 30 |
puṇa puṇa arjuna ye paḍai bajra ghāte
arjunara trodha dekhi deba ye ananta
bābu yadukuḷa candramā re ke nelāka hari
kebaṇa bāpuḍā mora janme janme bairi | 33 |
nanda yāśodāṁka mukha muṁ chāhiṁbi kemante | 34 |
ye deba māẏāẏeṇa sakaḷa jana prabodhi
arjunara trodha ye kahile na sarai
bābu śarada pūrṇṇimā candra jāṇi tora mukha
siṁhikāra nandana ki tote dhaṁsila pratakṣa | 39 |
kebaṇa pātake putra re tora na pāili āśā | 41 |
āre tohora bihune mora pañchaprāṇa yāu phuṭi | 42 |

div.note: –māẏātrodha karanti se debakīra suta |(ga)
–śokajaḷe bhāsi ākuḷa pañchu bhūta |(cha)
–munigaṇa hr̥de chāhānte madanabāṇe puṁṭi |(ca, ka, ta, ṅa, dha)

lg.l: tohora apāda putrare paḍu mohora hr̥dagati | 43 |
bābu jhaṭakanti kuṇḍaḷa śobhanti beni karṇṇa
mukui prāpata nohilu putra poḍu mora karma | 44 |
atulāita putra re bāunimi tora kāhā | 46 |
rakata kumuda jāṇi tohora beni karasthaḷī
muhiṁ tohora apāda gheniyāi re abhimanu | 52 |
rakata kumuda jāṇi tohora pādataḷi kānti
hāthe padma pāẏe padma lalāṭe śuddhamaṇi
ẏete lakṣaṇaku bidhatā bipada kala āṇi | 54 |

div.note: –suḍhaḷa sundara diśe tohora ye piṭhi |(jha, ḍha, gha)
–saṁkīrṇṇa majhā ki kr̥paṇara dhana<lb/>kehḷantā siṁgha jāṇi jagujana mohana |(gha, ḍa, dha, ṭa)
–(laha–nakha)

lg.l: lakṣe lakṣaṇa gheni upujilu re mohora bābu
ẏete lakṣaṇa gheni upujilu re dulāḷa
bābu bāḷuta baẏasare tote pāḷibāku hoili
bīrabara pratagyāṁ re tohora dekhira nuārili | 59 |
bhīmasena mukha chahiṁ pātha bolai bikaḷa | 60 |
bīrabara brikodara pratagyaṁ nāma tuye bahi
yama āsana tejai tohora kāḷebara gada chāhiṁ | 61 |
trailokye śaṁkā paḍai ye tohora dhaile gadadhanu
āre bābu nakuḷa abhimanu ye tohora gaḷāra kaṇṭhi
kenhe sata baḷilā re chaḍi ailu bāḷuta putragoṭi | 63 |
