bābu sahadeba re tu ta bhūtabhabiṣya jāṇu
abhimanyura maraṇa kenhe tadanta na bakhāṇu | 64 |
sugyāna kari yebe kahantu mora āge
kimpe putra muṁ chāḍanti ẏeheneka yoge | 65 |
tāhāku chaḍibāku sata tora baḷilā kemante | 66 |
kāhāku abhagata aṭai abā mora bāḷa
tāhāku chaḍibāku kenhe satabaḷilā re chāṇḍāḷa | 67 |
niropi chahiṁlā ye pāṭha yujheṣṭhidebaṁkara mukha
kemanteke putra mohora jiṇilā kurubaḷa saini | 70 |
tu ye ratha bāhuthilu mohora putra tule
nicaẏa kari kaha tāku ke ke gheriṇa māile | 71 |
dusaha samara kathā kahite śakya nāhiṁ mote | 72 |
droṇa jadyaratha aḷambuṣa karṇṇa śalya kr̥pa
ẏeka ẏeka nārājake bhāṁgilā sabuṁkari darpa | 73 |
ākāśe praśaṁsā ye kale sakaḷa suragaṇa | 74 |
lakṣa lakṣa yoddhā samare nohile yahūṁ sari
aneka yoddhā gheni mānagobinda āsi beḍhi | 75 |
ẏekāẏe poẏeka mora baḷa nipāta kaẏe | 77 |
dūre thāi ẏekamukha hoiṇa aneka nārāja baraṣi | 78 |

div.note: –robai sarbasacī sañchupāṇa puṭi |(ka, ta, dha)
–ākāśe praśaṁsa kale sakaḷa suragaṇa :–<lb/>ehi pādapare ‘ta’ ‘o’ ‘dha’pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
karṇṇa droṇa bhūrisarba nohile yahuṁ sari
bhūabhedi galā ye lakṣe lakṣe yoddhā māri |
bhaẏe yoddhāẏe jaṇe kehi na rahile kati
padmakeśara bhitare yāiṁ paśilu taḍati |
catrabhūa bhedi jaẏaśaṁkha bhāṣi
aneka yoddhā tule kurupati beṛhilāka āsi |

lg.l: kehu cchedana kalā dhanura ye guṇa
rtha gheni aśve ye hoile antarīcche
muhiṁ samara ghora kali thāiṇa tāhāra ye pache | 81 |
khaḍaga phaḷā cchedana kale yahūṁ beṛhi
yābaḍe prahāra kale catra bhūṣaṇḍi yāṭhi | 84 |
cinha barṇṇa na rahilā samasta ẏeka oḷi | 85 |
śuṇiṇa mohagate paḍila se pāṇḍaba pañchāṇa | 86 |

div.note: –“muhiṁ samara ghora kali thāiṇa tāhāra ye pache”<lb/>ehi pāda pare ‘jha’ pithire adhikā pāṭha :–
mote kopakalā putra se tohora
kṣatrīkuḷaku lajjā karāilu mora |
tāhāra bacane muṁ bāhaḍāi bāhili ratha
kurubaḷa thāṭhe puṇi paśilā turita |
dekhi mānagobinda gheni samasta daṇḍadhārī
beṛhile tāra ratha śatepura kari |
turite khaḍhaga phaḷā kaleka cchedana
śūnya hāthe dhamai putra abhimanyu |

lg.l: putra putra boliṇa se paḍile mahīloṭi | 88 |
raẏaṇī na śobhai yenhe candrara abhābe
puruṣa abhābe yenhe stirī ye bidhade | 89 |
ghaṭaṇa pratimā putrare kebaṇa ṭhābe loṭi | 90 |
kāhiṁ abā dekhibi muhiṁ prāṇara pañchabhūta
kāhāra āge kahibi ke saṛiba mohora santāpa | 92 |
ke mohora putrakaiṁ nāśilā kaha ẏehikṣaṇi | 95 |
se yebe āmbhanta na ogāḷantā yāānte
sehi se pāṇḍabaṁkara śirī sampada sārilā | 99 |
hr̥daẏa bhūṣaṇa mora kehu ga(?) gheni | 100 |

div.note: –rajanī na śe bhai candrara bihune |(ca)
–stirī na śohai puruṣa nidhane |(ca)
–śaraṇa sambhājaṇare thāṭhaku ābaraṇa |(ña, ṭa)

lg.l: hā hā daiba boli kapāḷe kara dhinda
parama paṇḍi bhigyaṁ hoi tu na jāṇilu kicchi | 102 |
aneka puṇya kale ye ākāśeṇa basi
puṇyaśeṣa hoile mahī maṇḍaḷe janma āsi | 103 |
dhārmika bibeka boli āmbhe samaste tote kahu | 104 |
mātā raja pitā bīryya saṁgama yetebeḷe
jība gheni biśrāma karai garbhara maṇḍaḷe | 105 |
nabadaśa māse sehu putra jāta hoẏe | 106 |
aneka apāde tāku chāhiṁ nuārai yama ye debatā | 107 |
na bichāri bīryya yadyapi diai pitāmaha
ẏethe bīryya dile nirutānta āẏuṣa bratī | 109 |
ẏethe bīryya dile rogī aḷapa āẏuṣa bratī | 110 |
ẏethe bīryya dile karma hoẏe hīna | 111 |
ẏethe bīryya dile santāna hoai hāni | 112 |
ẏethi bīryya dile aḷapa āṣya bratī | 113 |

div.note: nirutānt–nitānta |

lg.l: abichāre bīryya dile aḷape yāi nāśa | 114 |
andha kuṣṭha kaṇākūjā pāṅguḷa hvanti ẏethe bīryya dyante | 115 |
āpaṇā mandapaṇa na bichāru tohora doṣa
karme putra nāśagalā bhāinta karu roṣa | 116 |
ẏe mr̥tumaṇḍaḷe ho pr̥thīra nāma tatu
pāpa puṇya bhogābhoga ke āga ke pacha
ẏethakaiṁ santāpa ho na kariba baccha | 118 |
muṁ ẏehā bujhuacchi pathukī jana prāẏe | 119 |
tehne akāraṇa ẏe mānaba jībana goṭā | 121 |
yesaneke pathukī parabase ẏekā biśrama karai
jaṇe jaṇe ẏekā kehi kāhāra nuhai | 122 |
hātharu paḍile se huai khaṇḍa khaṇḍa | 125 |

div.note: –yesaneke prabāsī biśra karai ẏekā<lb/>kāhāra kehi nuhai kṣaṇe kṣaṇe dekhā |(ḍa, ña)
–pathukī śrama pāi ẏekasthāne miḷi<lb/>kāhāri kehi nuhai jaṇe jaṇe caḷi |(ca)

lg.l: abhoga liṁga hoi karma tāhara hīna | 127 |
arjuna boilā hari putra mora abhimanyu
nirddoṣa guṇa lakṣaṇa bāḷuta mohora tanu | 128 |
gobinde boile ho akāraṇa ẏe saṁsāra
ati guṇabanta hoile aḷapa āṣya huai tāhāra | 130 |
ẏehā prameṣī tu ho bujha hr̥dagate
tu kāhāra bāpa, se kāhāra baḷa
bairatā paṇakari se buḍāigalā tohora bheḷā | 134 |
ke kāhāra sodara ke kāhāra bandhu
sugyāni loka hoi rājapatha kimpe nindu | 135 |

div.note: –āpaṇāra doṣe ye nāśapanti jana<lb/>abhoga liṁga hoi karma tāhāra līna |(ka, ña)
karma = aprārabu karma |
bairatā = bairatā, śatr̥tā |
–ke kāhāra sodara ke kāhāra bandhu<lb/>sugyānī loka hoi ẏemanta kimpe nindu |(cha, ṭha)

lg.l: hajila galā paḷāilāku na bhāḷanti kehi
bhasma na āṁkorai malā loḍile na pāi | 136 |
tu tāhāku malā malā bolu akāraṇe | 137 |
ihaloke paraloke se tārai puruṣa koṭi koṭi | 139 |
mohora mohora boli ho lobha mohe boli
ke āga ke pacha ke āja, ke kāli | 141 |
svarge nei tāku ṭhāba dianti surapati | 142 |
ghora narke śāsti dianti tāku yamagaṇa | 143 |
bābu galā kathāku pātha tu nakara śocanā
yatane puaku mora marāile bhāi chāri | 145 |

div.note: –hajilā padātha ẏeḍi dila pāṇi<lb/>malā lokaku loḍile pāiki hāde puṇi |(ka, tha, ña)
–mahāśauryya maṇanti ubhaẏabaḷa thāṭha |(na)
–‘ta’ o ‘dha’ pothidvaẏare “saṁsāra sāgara ẏe daiba<lb/>racanā” pāda pare adhikā pāṭha :–
raṇayagyaṁ kari ho paḍilā tora suta
sādhu abhimanyu boli śubhilā jagata |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: hari yebaṇa kāḷebara mūranti dekhi yama karai śaṁkā
ta hākaiṁ ogāḷibāku ki chara jadyaratha ẏekā | 147 |

div.note: (pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
yebaṇa prāṇīṁki jane karanti dhani dhani
pāteka tejiṇa se na yāi sañjībanī |
yebaṇa janaṁku ho śubhai apacchāti
dharmatejyā karai se basai yamakati |
ẏethu anantare ho śuṇa bilaṁka ādhipati
kr̥ṣṇara mukha chāhiṁ bolai ketana sārathi |
mohora dekhante ho malā pāthara suta

lg.l: ābara kisa arthe mañcheṇa muṁ thibaiṁ jībita |
lg.note: indra boile ratha nei ādiṭhāre gacha |
ketana sārathiki dekhi haraṣa hoile ādi
ratha caḍhi asura tule raṇa se ācchādi
kabandhara yuddha ye kahante na sarai
ẏethu anantare tu ho śuṇa nr̥pasāiṁ |
kr̥ṣṇara bacane se kebaṇa kr̥ta kari |
ẏethira carita mote kaha baibasuta manu pachārilā |
bolanti agasti tu śuṇa ho rājana
lg.l: hari sañchitakari marāile mohroa bāḷuta putragoṭi
ẏe chariṁka śira muṁ tiraṇa pramāṇe pakāibi kāṭi | 148 |
na puṇa pāṇḍabanta nāśa karai binā yuddhe | 149 |
gobinde bolanti arjuna ẏethe kāhāri nāhiṁ doṣa
debatāẏe ākāśa tejile se chāṇḍāḷara trāse | 151 |
aneka samara kale rudra indra brahmā
puṣyeka rathe basāi nelā tāhāra nāti | 154 |
aneka ratna aḷaṁkāra basana aneka śahasra dilā
beśa beśana hoi abhimanyu yuddhaku galā | 155 |
citta mora samprate karai tumbhari bole | 156 |
puṇa bolai arjuna hari muṁ na yāi saṁprate
mohora putrakaiṁ hari dekhāa nei mote | 157 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna śūnya bhedi miḷile debatāṁka tahiṁ | 158 |
dūre thāiṁ dekhaṇḍi tāha pātha debakīra tanu | 160 |
jaṭī baṭara taḷe kr̥ṣṇa arjuna hoile ubhā
arjunaku abhimanyu boilā āḍo āḍo mahātamā | 162 |
asuraku abicchanne muṁ śara karai br̥ṣṭi
prāṇe nāśa yibaṭi tumbhe mānaba duigoṭi | 163 |
se tote na cihnai tu kisa tāra tāta | 165 |
bāḷuta kāḷahuṁ hari muṁ pāḷilai ẏehā | 166 |
muṁ ẏehāra piara hari ẏe mohora putra
dibasaka antara sinā na cihnilā āmbhanta | 167 |
gobinde boile tu ye boilu mora baḷā
māẏā moha saṁsāra ẏe akāraṇa bheḷā | 168 |
arjuna boile hari ẏesaneka bichāra yebe svarge
niprohi bhmabana ẏeṭi ẏethuṁ chāla yibā bege | 169 |
āsanti kr̥ṣṇa arjuna madhya ye jagata | 170 |
hari arjunaku dekhi kointā dropatī sohodrā uttarā
kointāẏe boile bābu śuṇa śuṇa janārddana
tote āśrā kari yebratanti mora poẏe
ante buḍili ta ẏebe trodhajaḷa mohe | 173 |
hari somabaṁśe abhimanyu ta saduri gaḷāra kaṇṭhi
tume uburi aila deiṇa mohora bāḷuta putragoṭi | 174 |
tohora kisa doṣa mohora karmara ghaṭasūtra ẏe | 175 |
kandamūḷa phaḷa bhakṣiṇa susthe niante dina | 176 |
hari tohora sāhā dekhi rajyaku kaḷe icchā
gata āgata ẏebe buḍāila hoila kupurukṣā
budilā baṁśa ẏebe nuāila kari rakṣā | 178 |
loẏeṇa dhārā śrābaṇa bahai beni ākhi
abhimanyu abhimanyu boli uñcheṇa ḍāka dei
bābu āstāne basi ki tulāuachu naḍapa niyogamāna
gaja aśva niyoga ki karibu morjana | 181 |
ki abā yamunā nadīre pagi karucha srāhāna
debe bipre dukhījane deuchu ki dāna | 182 |
ki abā ṭike cināẏe ghenuachu sañjā | 183 |
babu sujana jana prabodhana re paradukhe dukhī
trodha abastā ye bandī bandhana dekhi | 184 |
daṇamaṇḍaḷa pararāṣpe putrare yāhāra nāma dhari | 185 |

div.note: –kupurukṣā–kupuruṣā
–loẏeṇa–lotaka |
–lotaka dhārā ye bahu beni ākhi |–bahupāṭha |
–ki abā śoka karuachu paradukha dekhi | tha, ṭha, na
–trodha abastā dekhi bandī bandana chaḍāi deu sukhī | ca
–jagujana sodara putra tu jagata hitakārī | ka, ṭa, dha
–brahmāṇḍe bīramarddana nāma bikhyāta tohori | ga, ca

lg.l: biśahasr ayoddhānta putrare na maru tu raṇe
ātmāru adhika kari dekhu ye paśanti śaraṇe | 186 |
bābu lakṣe rājā abhimukhe yāra biradhū raṇaraṁkā
nabadvīpa sapata sāgare yāhāra nāme paḍai camakā | 187 |
dukhī saṁghāta bābu mohora kuḷara dulaṇā
tote na dekhi babu houcchi panthabaṇā | 188 |
abhimanyuku raṇe dei kehne aila banamāḷī | 189 |
sādhu sādhu kaurobe re jībana tumbhara dhani | 191 |
arjuna piara yāhāra mātuḷa hari baḷarāme
dropatīra trodha ye na sarai kahante
hā hā nandana boli nandana nandinī paḍai bajrāghāte | 193 |
acebana hoi sohodra ye paḍilā asāṣṭame
ki aba pañchabhūta ātmā tāhāra harinelā yame | 194 |
sohodrāku kointā dropatī toḷi dhaileka koḷe
mūkhe nīra siñchi ālaṭe biñchanti tāra kati

div.note: bābu somabaṁśa uddhāra mohora dulāḷa<lb/>dukhīra saṁghāta mohora kuḷara suḍhaḷa | ta, ña, ka
sabu rūpe thilu mora kuḷaku bhūṣaṇa<lb/>to bina kipari mora rahibare prāṇa | kha, ṭha, na
naghoṣa baṁśa uddhāraṇe tu mohora bāpa<lb/>dukhīra saṁgāta tu mo kuḷara kuḷadīpa | tha, dha

lg.l: kāhiṁ basiachu bābu mohora madana mūrati | 197 |
aceṣṭa ātmā śarīre prāṇa na thila ye kicchi
tote na dekhi muhiṁ ẏebe nirīmācchi | 198 |
muhiṁ ye garbhe tote dhaili daśamāsa
bāḷutabhāba chaḍi tu ye hoilu yubābaẏasa | 199 |
abhābaku bhāba tu asajjanaku suhu dr̥ẏe
apaṇḍitaku paṇḍita tu ripujanaku maitra parāẏe | 201 |
hari baḷe pradāna kale baṁśarakṣā karibāku | 202 |
ẏe madhya svargakaiṁ somabaṁśahiṁ se mūḷa
ẏethi putra upujile udita hibaṭi kuḷa | 203 |
ẏete bichāri mote pāṇṭabaṁku dile bhāi
samaste acha ẏekā putragoṭi abhimanyu mohora kāhiṁ | 204 |
arjuna ye pūrbe tote hari jiṇilā samare
se rage putra gotiki mora marāilu dāmodare | 205 |
abhimanyu mātā boli jagate mote bhākhi

div.note: –munigaṇe dekhile tote paḍanti mahīloṭi |
–abhābaku bhābanā tu asajjanaku suhr̥daẏe<lb/>yogījane bhābana tu binaẏa tora hr̥de |(bahupāṭha)
–toho dvārā hoithāāntā udaẏa kuḷa | kha, ṭha, na
–bhākhi-bhāṣi, kahi |

lg.l: mohora maraṇa kimpe nohilā tohora āge
kapaṭa kūṭa jāḷandhara bhūa maẏāẏeṇa rañchi
tohora upare muṁ maribi toṭi kāṭi
hā hā nandana re kuḷara śreṣṭhasāra
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna samāne tohora ye teja
yadu bhoja baṁśaku tu sundara mora bābu
ke samaratha hoilā brahmā indra rudra jiṇimāku
āditya debatā ke ude karāilā pacchime | 217 |
kṣīrodhamanthana karibāku ke sāmaratha ẏeka jaṇe
se se mohora putraku jiṇilāka raṇe | 219 |

div.note: –kemante deha dharibi muṁ putrara biyoge |(ṭha, ta, cha, ja, dha)
–ke se samaratha hoilā mohora putra jiṇimāku |(bahupāṭha)
–amara āstāne basibāku kāhāra manīṣā |(ṭa, ja, ḍa, gha)

lg.l: ẏekā pādake ke pr̥thī pārai re māpi
ẏeḍeka dacche kebaṇa puruṣa hoai adyapi | 220 |
ẏeḍeka pacha hoi kebaṇa paruṣa upuji
se se mora putraku māilā raṇamajhi | 222 |
bābu sajjana sodara re guṇe guṇanidhi
bāḷaarka prāẏe birājai tohora teja bīryya | 225 |
aneka beśa beśana gaḷāre puṣye śobhā aṅga
rakate karddana ẏebe hoilā tora aṅga | 226 |
haṁsulī tuḷī trapūra dhūḷi upare śeya supāti
tahiṁ tote nidrā na māḍai niśārāti | 227 |
rakata karddana bhūmire bābu śoilu kemante | 228 |
ālaṭa chamara gheni tote khaṭanti sahasreka bāḷī
preta bhūta pichāśaṁka tule ājara raẏaṇī | 230 |
apāra śoka samudre galu mote thoi
śamaśāne śutilu baḷāre nicinta ye hoi | 231 |
kāhāra mukha ye chāhiṁbaiṁ āja toḷi | 232 |
bho daiba puruṣa tu aṭu baḍa naṣṭā
abhimanyu abhimanyu boliṇa uccasvare rodana kari
āśā dekhāiṁ muṁ kāhākaiṁ kalaiṁ nirāśa
teṇure putra tohora ye na pāili āśa | 237 |
teṇu se upekṣā karigalu kire bāpa | 239 |
akhaṇḍita puṣya dei muṁ na dāhili hara
ẏe madhya baẏase nirāśa ye hoili tohora | 240 |
kahiṁ abā putra mora nāṭa kheḷuacchi
āsi mora koḷe basu kinā bāḷabacchi | 241 |
kākhare basāi tote bulāi kinā dāṇḍa
pūru mohora āśa śītaḷa hoi piṇḍa | 242 |

div.note: –na chaḍilā nillaja ātma daiba sumari | ṭa, cha
–chāḍiyānilajja ātmā daiba sumari | jha
–mukhe jaḷasiñchi hari phukanteṇa kāna | ta, dha
“teṇu se upekṣā karigalu kire bāpa”–pādapare<lb/>‘ta’ o ‘dha’ pothi dvaẏare adhikā pāṭha :–
chāḍilaiṁ pitāmātā tohora dekhante
mote chaḍi galure tu gagana pathe |
–celika baẏase muhiṁ nirāśa hoili re kumara |(ta, dha)

lg.l: nija prāṇa chaḍila ki sohodrā mukha chāhiṁ | 247 |
ẏe mohora mukhe svāmī lagāilu kāḷī | 249 |
hā hā ballabha mohora nija prāṇanāhā
anāthara nātha muhiṁ karibai puṇa kāha | 250 |
svāmī guṇasāgara nātha mote kṣaṇeheṁ na chaḍu
jaḷu mohora ātmā karma mohora poḍu | 251 |
moho tahuṁ pāpiṣṭhī ta nāhiṁ āna nārī
ẏe baẏase bidhabā muṁ hoili dubhāgī pāmarī | 252 |
svamī bāḷabhāba chaḍiṇa muṁ hoili nabayubā
ẏe mohora toṭi kāṭi keṇe galu abā | 253 |
ẏe mohora bāsa kalu adhā apantarā | 254 |
prāṇahuṁ adhika kari dekhithāu nātha mote

div.note: –robai sohodrā ye hoiṇa digāmbārī |(ja, ga, ca)
–robai trodheṇa ye birāṭara bāḷī |(ja, ga, ca)<lb/>robai sohodrā ye yesane kurarī
–uttarābāḷīra trodha kahile na sari |(cha)

lg.l: bhūmire na basāu mote dharu hr̥dagate | 256 |
raẏaṇī na aṇṭai nātha keḷira nānārase | 257 |
candra sūryya pabana ẏekattve tu sahasra kaḷānidhi | 258 |
dhanurddhara samāne nātha kehu tula tate
bhīṣma droṇa jiṇilu nātha bhāroimalla tu bhārathe | 259 |
dhānukī catra cūḍāmaṇi saẏaḷa pr̥thī bhedī | 261 |
śalya somadatta śakuni ye hārile kr̥pabrahmā | 262 |
ẏe bhmabibhmabana madhey nātha nāhiṁ āna yodhī | 263 |
bhaẏeṇa āsana tote chaḍai yama ye debatā | 264 |
ki abā muhiṁ debāḷaẏe dīpa na dili akhaṇḍa | 266 |
kāhāra sampūrṇṇa ghare muṁ jūi lagāili | 267 |

div.note: –kāhāra puṇya ghare joi lagāili |(ja, ṭa)

lg.l: svāmī stirīkuḷe janamiṇa muṁ hoili mahāpāpī
ki abā muṁ śatajanme na kalaiṁ bārabrata oṣā
bho daiba puruṣa tirī janama bolikinā bihu
ke kāhāra bhārijā ke kāhāra prahu | 271 |
bho daiba puruṣa tirīboli kalu yebe jāta
para duhitā para putraku kalu ghaṭasūtra | 272 |
sukhe hou ki dukhe hou yibaṭiki dina | 273 |
abheda ātmā mora ki lāiṇa bhañju
hatabhagna dekhilā ye āpaṇāra kāẏā ghoṭi | 275 |
apāra aḷaṁkāramāna ta na śohai muku
svāmī sinā aḷaṁkāra ẏekā nārī śarīraku | 276 |
kimpāiṁ svāmī ẏekāẏeṇa galu pantha bahi
mohora tahuṁ suhr̥da āna tora nāhiṁ | 278 |
ẏe aḷaṁkāramāna ye na thou bakṣasthaḷe | 279 |

div.note: –sukhī lokakaiṁ dukha dei kāme darpa gañju |(kha, na, ṭha)
–hatabhagnasthānare hataśirī–(ga pothire)
–hatabhagna–bahupāṭha
–hatabhagna–hatabhaga<lb/>bhaga–eiśaryya, bidhabāṅkara eiśaryyahāni |(ca, kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: svāmī hr̥daẏare hr̥daẏa na lāgai boli
ẏe mohora baẏasa kāhākaiṁ galu dei
svāmī gajadanta beluri khaṭa haṁsulī ye tuḷī
puṣyara pākhuḍā tathi upare trapūrara dhūḷi | 283 |
ālaṭa chāmara dhari ḍhāḷanti ahibrateka nāẏikā
ẏemāna tejyā kari śmaśāne śoilu ye ẏekā | 284 |
svāmī tohora rūpaguṇa sumari muṁ bāunibi kisa
śarada candramā jāṇi tora badana parakāśa | 285 |
aṇḍira kokiḷa jāṇi mr̥du tohora bacana rīti | 286 |
aḷapa baẏase tohora bahuta guṇa svāmī
trodha abastā hoi svāmī kisa bāunimi | 287 |
ẏeheneka bichāra na karanti yebaṇa prāṇī
bhikṣāpātra goṭi mora ke nelā uchuḍi | 289 |
svāmīra piṇa āṇi mote karāa citā āropa

div.note: –svāmī hr̥daẏaku tumbhara antara heba boli<lb/>paridhāna basamāna pakāu ye peli |(ca, ga)
–haṁsali tuḷi upare trapūrara guṇḍi<lb/>upare candātapa puṣyareṇu maṇḍi |(ga, ca)
–māḷatī pākhuḍā pare trapūrara dhūḷi |(dha, ña)
–br̥kṣe uṭhāi nātha kāṭilu niśuṇī |(ṭa, tha)

lg.l: yebaṇa stirī svāmīra saṁge na karanti agnijhāsa
yebaṇa nārī dahana hoanti svāmīra tule
tirīkuḷe janama hoi muṁ karibi svāmīkāryya | 293 |
muhiṁ gabana karibi hoi bahani saṁyoga | 294 |
ke kāhāra gauroba mānitī āra kāhiṁ
ẏe madhyamaṇḍaḷe māgo achai yamara dāṛhe
ẏethu ke uturiyiba māgo manuṣya jībana gāḍhe | 299 |
deśantarī pathukījana loḍile āra kāhiṁ pāi | 300 |
māgo mr̥tyu maṇḍaḷa aṭai ye bhmabi
ẏethi upujile hāde ke nohai trijībī | 301 |
gobinde boile māgo tu ye na jāṇu bāḷuta
pitāmātā thāuṁ putraku harai ẏehi se ayugati | 303 |

div.note: –mātukuḷa pitr̥kuḷa svāmīkuḷa uddhārai bhale |(e pāṭha madhya samīcīna)
–(ohokuḷa–svāmī o pitr̥kuḷa)

lg.l: bāḷutaputra marāi na pāilu kimpe lajjā | 305 |
chāḍilaiṁ trodha muhiṁ deba tumbhara bacane
gobinde boile māgo kemante karibu agnijhāsa
tu parama sādhebī tote taribi kisa | 308 |
mago tohora garbhe acchi yebaṇa putragoṭi
soma baṁśara uddharaṇa hoiba tora batsi
se tohora trodha nibāriba go nabhāḷa tu kicchi | 310 |
bāhuḍi abhimanyu prāpata hoiba ki tote | 312 |
sabukaṁri hr̥daẏe se gyāna rūpe parakāśa | 323 |
teṇu se māẏādhara puruṣa tāra nāma | 324 |
samasta abikāra nātha cira āṣya sañchi | 316 |

div.note: –muṁhita śuṇili tora garbha benimāsa |(ṭha, na, kha, dha, ta, cha, gha)
–muṁhita śuṇili tora garbha pāñchamāsa |(ca, ga)
–samasta ākāra nātha cira āṣya sañchi |[ja, cha, ña]

lg.l: aparāpara saṁsāra ẏe miche micha baṛhā
kaḷikāḷa dhvaṁsana nātha māẏāmoha mote chaḍā | 318 |
tāraṇa uddāraṇa nātha tuhi se aṭu sabu
durāntaka nāśana nimante bāmakare yāra kambu | 319 |
paśili agāda jaḷe manuṣya janma hoi
kisa mohora hetumati tohora māẏā kahi | 321 |
svāmī muhiṁta bidyā aṇaabhyāsī aṭai ẏehu janme
svāmī jāta karāu puṇi antahiṁ karāu
saṁsāra carita muṁ bujhili ati hetu heḷu
samasta saẏaḷa tu amaḷiṇa satya heṭi | 325 |
prāṇāpāna samāna uddāna byāna pañchu ātmā
ẏe māẏāmoha bañchāibi nātha taba parasāde | 327 |
saṁsāre nimagna muṁ ye trodhajaḷe bhāsi
ẏethuṁ uddharantā nātha tuhi se hr̥ṣīkeśī | 329 |

div.note: –saẏaḷa jana uddharaṇa basilu baṭapuṭi |(ca)
–namāmi nārāẏaṇa abhaẏe gyānamudrā |(ca, ga, jha
–yogājana tāraṇa abhaẏe caubargadātā |(kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: svamī mr̥tuṇḍaḷe upujile pr̥thīki hoẏe bhāra
svāmī kuṭumba deiṇa nātha mote trodha ye na kara | 330 |

div.head: {@kr̥ṣnaṅka sahita pāṇṭabaṅku mantraṇā o jadyaratha badhartha<lb/>arjanara pratijñā@}

lg.l: sohodrā uttarāra trodha prabhma karāile śānti | 1 |
boile raẏaṇī arddha ye hoilāka asi | 2 |
kisa tumbhara jībana kisa tumbhara sampada | 3 |
dvandare paśile aba putra sahodra kāhiṁ
ke paḍilā ke malā śoka ẏethi kāhiṁpāiṁ | 4 |
rātra pāhānte puṇa yibānā samara kari | 5 |
tu abā sāṁgrāmaku na yibu putratrodhe
se yāi bāratā kahibe mānagobinda agrate | 7 |
daṇḍa gheni kaṭake na puṇa bedhanti se āsi | 8 |

div.note: –bhāba kemante kaurabe ẏebe maribeka raṇe |(ṭha, ca)

lg.l: arjuna boilā hari srāhāna mora loḍā kāhiṁ
jadyaratha māribā pariyante bhojana mora nāhiṁ | 12 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe muṁ kāṭibi tāra tanu | 14 |
tāhā muṁ upekṣā kalaiṁ bhagnīra nimante | 15 |
muhiṁ tāhāku bandhupaṇe pāḷili śirachedana ṭhāru dhari
putra mohora nāśagalā tāhāra hetu kari | 16 |
muṁ yebe tāhāku na mārai kāli
kisa mora kṣatrīpaṇa muṁ kisa daśanamaku bahili | 17 |
na caḍhibi nandighoṣa na bahibi gāṇḍiba dhanu
bije kapiketana bāna bāsudeba sārathi se rathe
putra mohora hatagala ẏete baḷa thaānte | 19 |
yadyapi āboribe brahma indra kobera hara
abaśya jadyaratha māribai satya satya mohora | 22 |
debata drabya haraṇa karanti yehu lobhe | 24 |
śakya pramāṇe ye na dianti dāna
kujana jana tule yāhara ye goṣṭhī
tāra abasthā dekhi ye na karanti daẏe
svāmī gurulokanta dekhi ye nohanti nirbhaẏe | 27 |
muhiṁ gaṇitā ye hoibi ẏete loke
harihara pāṣāṇa na dekhi ye karanti bhojana
dātabya lokanta ye bāranti debāra kāḷe
āpaṇāra karme nare hoanti ye bhogī
bipatti na jāṇi ye pare bairāgī | 32 |
go pantha bhūmire karanti ye kr̥ṣi
yadyapi jadyaratha muṁ na mārai samare
āpaṇāra jībante pare rati yebaṇa bhāriyā | 35 |

div.note: –“paradrabya haraṇe yāhāra manīṣā”:– ehi pādānta pare “da” pothire adhikā pada :–
yathā– kuḷatirī chaḍi ye āborai beśyā
paratirī haribāre yāhāra nirantare manīṣā |

lg.l: śarīre gyānathāuṁ ye na karanti kuśaśayyā | 38 |
ẏeteka laṁghai kāli na chedibi yadi jadyarathara beka | 39 |
yebaṇa jana leñchare bīryya tā ḍhāḷai | 40 |
yebaṇa bipra adhikāra gheni pramāda arajanti | 42 |
mattagarba bhābe ye deba bipra na ārādhi | 43 |
dāna gheniṇa yebaṇa bāhmaṇa bratanti sarbathā | 44 |
ẏete lokaṁkara tule mu hoibi ẏekajaṇe
yadyapi jadyaratha mūṁ na mārai kāli raṇe | 45 |
go śāsra hariṇa ye deba bipranta na thāpi | 46 |

div.note: –amābāsyā saṁtrānti ẏekādaśī dvādaśī<lb/>tuḷamāsare yehu āmiṣa bhmañjibasi |(cha)

lg.l: asajjana lokaṁka tule ye huanti dvandī
aniryyāpa kariṇa ye prāṇīṁki karai bandī | 48 |
ẏe lokaṁkara tule muṁ bratai sarbathā | 50 |
sarbada lekhibā mote ẏete lokaṁkara tule
atithi māgile bhikṣā na pābanti yāhā ghare | 53 |
citta aśuddhe ye jane dianti dāna | 57 |
bela kāṭhe yociṇa ye ṣaṇḍaṁku karai haḷa | 59 |
śaraṇa paśile yebaṇa jaṇe na karanti rakṣā | 60 |

div.note: –kujana ge ṣṭhīre huanti ye dvandī |–(ga, dha, ṭha)
–dibase upekṣā ye na karanti rātribāsa |(jha, na, tha, ña, dha
–pāñcha daśa, pañchāśa dina bahu pothi pāṭhāntara |

lg.l: biṣṇu bāsara śibarātri janma rabi candra grahaṇa grase
samare paśiṇa yebaṇa kṣatrī hoanti nisatti
brāhmaṇa hoiṇa yebe śītaku karai bhīti | 62 |
samare paśiṇa yebaṇa kṣatrī hoanti nisatti
brāhmaṇa hoiṇa yebe śītaku karai bhīti | 63 |
tirī hoiṇa yebe agniki hāde ḍari
se pāpī janaṁka saṁge aṭai muṁ sari | 64 |
svadārā upekṣi ye haranti parara ramaṇī | 67 |
se loke gaṇitā muṁ yebe na marai sindhu mahīpāḷe | 69 |
dhana gheniṇa ye bikanti āpaṇā gr̥habāsa
pare chāṭu kahi ye haruthānti dina
baḍaśī thopa pakāi ye jaḷare māranti mīna | 71 |
yebaṇa jane na karanti bārabrata oṣā
kanyā tuḷe pitr̥nta ye karanti niāśā | 72 |
brāhmaṇa kṣatrī baiśya ye śūdra chārijāti
ẏethi jātahoi ye madirā pāna karanti | 73 |

div.note: –stirī gabhanī bāḷaka karanti ye nāśa<lb/>ātma gha te maranti yebaṇa nārī puruṣa |(tha, na)

lg.l: paraku nindi ye kahai ātmabaḍimā kathā | 74 |
khaṇā khoḷiṇa ye kaṇṭā pakābanti bāṭe
mote gaṇitā kara ẏete lokaṁkara tule
yadyapi jadyaratha muṁ na mārai kāli dekhile | 76 |
apūrba padārtha pāi ye kuṭumbalokanta bañchi
śraddhāẏe śrāddha ye na karanti sañchi | 77 |
yati bhagabant ajane ye karanti jhiṁghāsa | 78 |
tuleṇa kaṇṭakari na yāānti yebaṇa jana
kāli sindhurājāku yebe na mārai raṇa | 81 |
gobinde boile ho apāra pātaka acchi
arjuna boilā hari tribāra mora satyi
kāli yebe na mārai muṁ dr̥śilāra pati | 84 |
rabiude aste ye chamure basanti bāḍi
se doṣe patita muṁ hoibi catradhārī | 85 |

div.note: –para nindākaraṇe sarbadā yāra mati |(ṭha, tha, na)
–“kāli yebe na mārai muṁ dr̥śilāra pati” :–pāṭhapare ta o dhare adhikā pāṭha–
rabibāra dina ye ghenai aẏaṁḷā
pitr̥śrāddhe ye āge bhmañjābanti śaḷā |

lg.l: pitr̥loke tarpaṇa karai tāhā āṇi catrapāṇi | 87 |
muhiṁ yadi jadyarathaku na mārai kāli
tu hari ẏekā mote na chaḍibu sāhā
brahmāṇḍa bhitare muṁ na gaṇai kāhā | 91 |
gobinde boile durāpada pratagyāṁta kalu dhanañjaẏe
tohora dr̥dhabrata śuṇi lāgilā mora bhaẏe | 93 |
tāhāṁkara mantra śahasre tumbhe ye śakatā | 95 |
trijībī yoddhā se tāhāku trāsa karai bedabrahmā | 96 |
bāḷakāḷe nārāje ye binddhalā aniḷa parbate

div.note: mora satyabrataku tumbhe sākṣī hoithiba |(ca, ga)

lg.l: hāthe dhanu dhaile muhiṁ karai bhaẏe
śalyaṁka chamuku muṁ yāi nuārai pāẏe | 101 |
tumbhara sodara se rādheba bīra karṇṇa
ḍare basudhā lāñcha diai śatebhāra subarṇṇa | 102 |
pr̥thīre āṇṭahoi pāda paḍile śroṇita bahai
bharathe bhāroimalla tā chamure kehu rahi | 103 |
ẏehāṁkara dhanu dharante ye kampai medinī | 106 |
bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā mahāmantrī ye śaṁkuni
dibya gakṣure chāhiṁle tāku diśai brahmāṇḍakhaṇḍa tini | 107 |
bīrabara bīra ye nirjhara rāja bhūamanu
gata āgata katha kahanti mantrī ye sañjaẏe
kaḷiṅgasena rāja catrabatī jāṇai bahr̥ta upāẏe | 110 |
ẏeka ẏeka bhrāthara tule marbhmate rathī hāthī | 111 |

div.note: bīrabara śodhā śuddha bīrabara |

lg.l: āho arjuna dr̥śiḷāra balabha se ye aṭai jadyaratha
pināka samāne dhanuẏeka acchi tāra kara | 114 |
āho arjuna tāra pratagyāṁ pratakṣe ta jaṇu
tumbhara chaḷe mohora bacane se ye śaraśayyā kalā | 116 |
tohora bacana śuṇi mohora na puṁrai kicchi
tu mātra hari mote hoithibu saṁpakṣa | 118 |
yebe na māribi jadyarathe agnire paśibi ẏe mohora satye satye | 120 |
brahmā rudra kobera yama pabana indre
ẏemāne rakhile māribi jadyaratha hari he tumbhara parasāde | 121 |
jadyarathaku kāli ke rakhantā nāhiṁ bhmabana tini | 123 |
gobinde boile yadyapi ṭhāba na karipāribu pāṁlagune
catre māribi kāli mora bhaṇañjāra abhimāne | 124 | 1926 + 124 = 2050

div.note: –“catre māribi kāli mora bhaṇañjāra abhimāne” ẏehi<lb/>pādāṁśa pare kha, ṭha, na pothire adhikā pāṭha :– [pāṭha parapr̥ṣṭhāre]
div.head: {@droṇaṅka śakaṭabyūha nirmāṇa@}
div.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
ẏehā kahi pātha kara dhariṇa jagannātha
kapidhvaja ratha duheṁ kari ārohaṇa
kaiḷāse gale yahiṁ haraṁka bhmabana |
pārbatī sahite basichanti biśvanātha
dekhi kr̥ṣṇa arjuna hoile tāṁku praṇipāta |
yoḍahāthe śrīkr̥ṣṇa kahanti tustibāṇī
deba deba mahādeba deba śūḷapāṇi |
samudra manthane ghora anaḷa uṭhilā
sakaḷa saṁsāra se dahana karuthilā |
sr̥ṣṭi nāśa dekhi debagaṇe kale stuti
debagire sadaẏa hoiṇa paśupati |
gaṇḍuṣe tā pānakari rakhili jagata
se yaśa saṁsāre taba hoilā ghoṣita |
sr̥ṣṭisthati praḷaẏara tuhi se ādimūḷa
nibedana kare nātha hua anakūḷa |
gobindaṁka tusti śuṇi deba gaṁgādhara
mr̥du hāsye tāṁku deba kaleka uttara |
mohora bidhātā tumbhe biśvara pāḷaka
ye najāṇe sei kahe nandara bāḷaka |
bhūbhāra nāśane tumbhe hela abatāra
arjunaku gheni sukhe karucha bihāra |
yāhā āgyāṁ kariba tā muṁ karibi pāḷana
ki kahucha kaha śīghra deba nārāẏaṇa |
gobinde boile deba kara abadhāna
kauroba pāṇṭaba yuddhe nuheṁ samādhana | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
–anaḷa–garaḷa arthare likhita |
–debagire–debakaṁ bākyare |
[pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
anyaẏa samara kari abhimanyu bīre
beḍhikari māile ye kauraba pāmare |
bipakṣa bināśe pātha kariachai ye paṇa
kāli na mārile nice hoiba dahana |
ẏeṇu āmbhe nibeduchuṁ śuṇa ho gaṁgādhara
jadyarathe jaẏa pātha kariba samara |
śaṁkara boile hari śuṇa sābadhāne
arjuna bijaẏī heba jiṇi śatr̥gaṇe |
ajunara sahāẏa muhiṁ hoibaiṁ raṇe
nicaẏeṁ nidhana kariba kāli kurugaṇe |
praṇapatya hoiṇa ye pārbatī debīṁkara caraṇa
aneka tustiye kale kr̥ṣṇa arajuna |
pārbatī boile śuṇa ho kr̥ṣṇa dhanurjaẏe
mohora bare kara yāi śatr̥ kuḷa kṣaẏe |
iśvara pārbatī bara pāiṇa kr̥ṣṇa arajuna
hoile uṣata yehne dukhī pāẏe bahudhana |
sehisari mahanande praphulla antare
praḷamba hoile duheṁ śaṁkarī śaṁkare |
prabeśa hoile yāiṇa sehu nija pure
ratha aśva rakhi puṇa ye yāhā ṭhābare |
tisirā pahara yahuṁ hoilāka niśi
arjunaku śaẏana ye karāile ruṣikeśī |
yujheṣṭhiṁki praṇamya kale deba hari
trodha karante deba dharma hoibaṭi apahāri |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bhmaja dhari saṁbodhanti nārāẏaṇa
kr̥ṣṇara bacane deba chaḍile byathāmāna |
bhīmasenakaiṁ boile hari śuṇasi māruti
uṭhi śoka śāntikara niśārāti | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: jadyarathaku māriba boli ye pratagyāṁ kalāta pāṁlaguni
dusaha pratagyāṁ karante prabhāta hoilā raẏaṇī | 3 |

div.note: [pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāra]
candra sūryya ādi huanti ye apahāra
ẏethaku śocana na kara brikodara |
nakuḷa sahadebakaiṁ prabodhi debahari
bhīmasenaku bacana kahanti tiāri |
mahāśokabhara hoiachaiṭi arajuna
putrara chaḷe na puṇa rātre karaiṭi sāṁgrāma |
nibāri nuāriba daibara kala kr̥tya
dr̥ṛha kari rātre jagathibaṭi bīra pātha |
āmbhe yāuachuṁ ye dvārikā bhmabana
rātra na pāhuṁ āsi miḷibu bahana |
samastaṁku prabodhanā kariṇa ruṣikeśī
ubha hoile svāmī bāhāra pure āsi |
nandighoṣa rathe dei chariaśva yoci
dāruka sātukīki duāre rahāi śirībacchi |
āho arjuna dukhita hoicchi mahātrodhe
na puṇa rātre ẏekā uṭhiṇa yāi raṇa madhye |
bāhāra hoile āmbha rāṇa pakāi basāiba nei rathe
dhīra dhīra kari ratha bāhuthiba rātra pahibā pariyante
beḷa ghaḍike prabeśa hoibaṭi bhūadvāre
mohora aile paśiba samare |
bhīmasena nakuḷa ye sahadeba bhāi tini
dujadvāre rahile nijabaḷa gheni |
bainetra piṭhire bijaẏe jagabhūta
bijaẏe jagamohana dvārikā bhmabanantā |
rukmiṇī ye jāmbabatī kāḷandī satyabhāmā
arghya dei praḷamba hoile charibāmā |
svāmī apāra biḷamba ta kala āja rāti
jāḷandhara bhūara bāratā kahile śirīpati | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
[pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra paṭhāntara]
arjunaku gheni āmbhe galu jāḷandhara bhūa raṇe
catrabhūa kapaṭa ẏeṇe kaleguru droṇe |
daśasahasra rājā māilā subhadrāra tanu
kapaṭa yuddhakari beḍhi māile abhimanyu |
apāra guṇa tāhāra kahile catrapāṇi
śuṇi śokakale satyabhāmā jāmbobatī rukmiṇī |
gobindeboile tumbhe najāṇa rukmiṇī śatrābatī
kāli jīiṁthile abhimanyu mārantā hari arjuna āmbha duhinti |
ẏesaneka acchinā ākāśara pūrbabāṇī
purandara ye svargaku nelā tāhā jāṇi |
svāmīku apacaẏa śuṇiṇa sarbasatī
chāḍileka trodha hoileka sarbe śānti |
samasta br̥ttānta kahile debarāẏe
aruṇa prakāśa pūrbadige hoẏe |
daibakī yaśodā ye abhimanyura hata śuṇi
karanti trodhe rodana uccasvare bāṇī |
robanti mahādebī ye śire kara tāḍi
subhadrāra putrakaṣṭa abhimanyu guṇa sumari | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
pr̥ṣṭhā 1–“jāḷandhara bhūara bāratā kahile śirīpati”–ẏehi pādapare<lb/>“cha” pothire bhinma pāṭha :–
arjunaka gheni ātme galma jālandhara rūa redi
sakaḷa amuragaṇa samare pātha chedi |
catrabhūa kapaṭe rañchile droṇa guru
abhimanyu senāpati hoile hantakāru |
nabadvāra jiṇi galā mubhadrāra tanu
kapaṭe beḍhi māile kumāra abhimanyu |
apāra śokadhuni pāṇḍaba pañchabīre
kontī dropatī subhadrā loṭanti bhūiṁre |
ẏehānta prabodha karuṁ uchura raẏaṇī
abhimanyu hata śuṇi śokakale śrīkaṣṇa pāṭarāṇī |
[pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
go nda boile trodha chaḍasi go māẏe
kṣatrīkuḷe jāta hoile paḍai bahuta apacaẏe |
debatāẏe peṣile ye kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni
bhārā nibāraṇa arthe āmbhe upujilu mānuṣa deha gheni |
mahābhāratha yuddha ye hoilā yugate
arjuna mohabaśa hoilā kuṭumba dekhante |
arjuna boilā bhīṣma mora ajā bhūrisarba paṇaajā
droṇa mohora guru mātuḷa śalya mahārājā |
karṇṇa mohora jyeṣṭhabhrātha sodara aśastamā
mātuḷa mohora śakuni paramaguru kr̥pabrahmā |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa nandana gāndhārī śate putre
jyeṣṭha kaneṣṭha ẏe sodara mora samaste |
samaste sahodara māribi kāhakaiṁ raṇe
ẏe bhāratha yuddha muṁ kali akāraṇe |
samara na karai na bindhai śara
sarge cintā basilā samasta debatāṁkara |
kaḷaha hakāri pesile padmayoni
kauroba pāṇḍabanta karāa anyoanyi |
abhimanyu paḍile se pāthara hoiba trodha
putrachaḷe se kaurobanta karibaṭi badha |
gobinde boile mātā go tumbhe na kara śocanā
bhārā nibāribā arthe ẏehā debatāṁka rañchanā |
āmbhe trodha kariṇa karibāka kisa
ẏe mr̥tumaṇḍaḷe thile debatāṁkara hoi baśa |
yeuṁ deba māẏāre sakaḷa jana bodhi
sabunti bodha karāile catrakūṭa buddhi | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: gupate mānagobinda rājāra pāṇḍabaṁka tahiṁ thile chāragaṇa
lg.note: pāṇṭabanta gheni deba yamunā jaḷe paśi
nabakoṭi saṁsāra deba tuhi se svāmī sañchi |
teṇu se koṇāarka nāma ye tumbhari |
svamī pr̥thibī īśānyakoṇe udaẏe nāme giri
dineka pratikṣaṇa tahiṁ nitye nitye kari |
koṭi kiraṇa cchedilu patnīra mana bhānti |
svāmī mahāraśmī bhārābhara kehu tāhā sahi
kundeṇa chedana kari sahasre kiraṇa rahi |
binatānandana aruṇa rathe sāhā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
lg.l: bolanti abadhana hoibā deba mānagobinda catrabratī

lg.note: śaśīṁkara sodara nātha nirmaḷa deba bhānu |
kisa mahimāṁ kahibi mānuṣa janme janmi
kāḷadaṇḍa bhaẏaru mote uddharī dhari svāmī |
śūdramuni saroḷā dāsa tumbha caraṇe śaraṇa |
āho bilaṁka deśara rājā baibasuta manu
kahasi mahābhigyaṁ muni mote mahā bhrahmabettā
jadyaratha māriba boli pratagyāṁ kalaka phālaguni
nīḷaarka sundara māgo rasāṇī yāra bapu
basudhāra abhābe māge dānabaṁka tule yuddha |
prathame caṇḍamuṇḍa dvitīẏe śambu ye niśambhu
tr̥tīẏe bīraghaṇṭa caturthe chāmara bemāḷa sabu | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-ananta koti mr̥tiki dhari kalu tu dahija |
nabame andhaka, bhāskara daśame birūpākṣa dhūmralocana |
tiniśata yojana uccharga kaṇaẏa nāme giri
tathipare kāḷāntaka baṭa utsarga yojana chāri |
daṇḍa sahodara bandhu nāśagale kehi nāhiṁ sakhā
-nabadvīpā pr̥thī ghotilā ẏekā se maṁṣāsurara kāẏe |
kaṇaẏa giri parbata pakāilā śiṁge ṭaḷi | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-anantakoṭha mr̥ttidhari go kalu grāhaja |(dha, ca, jha, ña)
-se baṭara ḍāḷe basi jaṭāmura samādi |(ca, ṭa)
-“nabadvīpa pr̥thī ghoṭilā ẏekā se maṁṣāmurara kāẏe |”<lb/>ehi pādāntapare “gha” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
nija kāẏā bikāśi garbhma bāhāra hoẏe dhāti |
bāmakare kaṭāra ḍāhāṇa kare paraśu pāṁśi
jhaṭa jhaṭita raṭita maṭa maṭita dantapāṭi
laha laha jibhyā bhamai kāḷa anaḷa dr̥ṣṭi |
yojane praḷamba jāṇi pañchakośa uccharga achārgaḷa |
dekhiṇa śūḷeka gheni prahāra kale mahāmāẏe |
se beni pāṭi kāmuḍilā maẏeṁṣāra gaḷā |
cauṣaṭhī koṭi ye gnī nabakoṭi kāntānī
pañchu padma ḍākeṇī śatapadma pichāśuṇī | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
ugratārā tripurā kāḷī kaṁkāḷī betāḷī māheśvarī |
ke śate ke duiśate ke yojana pañchaśate
ke sāgare paḍile ke paḍile parabate |
kāhāra caraṇa cheṭā kāhāra kara kempā
kaṭi bāṁka hāde kāhāra bikaṭa kuja piṭhi
ke heṭhamuṇḍa hoi paḍilā kāhāra andhadr̥ṣṭi |
-uṭhi nuāri rahile ghenile tahiṁ pūjā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-chāti pariyante potāhoile mahībhāge<lb/>siddheśvarī rūpe pūjā ghenile se ẏebe |(ña)
-bho rājana bacana prastābe to ẏemāna kahu hāde
śūḷa na chaḍanti deī nuāranti sambhaḷi |
bimukha hoi debī bhāḷai pañchu mane
chāḍibi maẏeṁṣāsura se yāu ẏe gagane |
ẏemanta kari debe asuranta dianti bara |
daśanaha mukhe bhari rakhaboli ḍākanti debaloke |
rāgeṇa buddhi na puṁrai atīẏa kopānaḷe
-śuṇaho caitana prastābe tote kasaṁ<lb/>debīmāne batra hāde hoile ka tahuṁ |(ta, ña, dha)
tu mātā na chaḍa go maẏeṁṣāsura dānabaku |
-ẏehāra badha nimante debatāẏe tote kale jāẏe
maṁgaḷā boila maẏeṁṣā tapakalā ye pitāṁku
biṣṇure bhaẏa boli maẏeṁṣā jāṇai ādikāḷe
tu go mahāmāẏā ulagnaśāhī hoilbunā ẏebe |
ẏesaneka buddhi yahuṁ kahile debī sarbamaṁgaḷe
thana jānu durgāṁkara ulagna ye śāhī
mohe baśa maẏeṁṣā durgāra jānu yaubana chahiṁ |
boilā debīra bhage yāi biśrāmu mora pañchu ātmā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-mahā biśr̥rūpe byāpile nabasr̥ṣṭi |(ga, na, ṭha, jha)

lg.l: boilā jadyarathaku na māile kāli paśibi bahani | 13 |
lg.note: muṁ tāha dekhili ye ẏehi mohora bhāgya |
durgāra bhaga dekhi moheṇa baśa galā
pañchu bhūta ātmā ye maẏeṁṣā chaḍilā |
śūḷeṇa māḍi basile debī narāẏaṇī rūpe
debatāṁka uparaku dhāiṁle chāmaṇḍā rūpe kope |
ẏemante kari asuranta debataẏe dianti bara
bhakṣibi debatānta ye na thoibi svargapura |
mahā bhaẏāṁkāra dusaha nirāśa rūpa dekhi
lāṁgaṭa bhr̥ṁgaṭa hoi hari karanti nr̥tya
tohore śaraṇa muhiṁ tuhi se iṣṭadebatā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-biśvambhara rūpa dekhi paḷāile bhaẏe<lb/>sabhiẏeṁ jaḷaśāhī tetiśakoṭi debatāẏe |(ca)

div.note: āpada khaṇḍaṇī go jagatamāta tuhi
māra ki tāra go to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ |
kārpuṇya bacana śuṇi toṣa jagatamāẏe
manāile bikaḷe khaṇḍilu apacaẏe |
bara māga jaṭiāre hoili tote śānti
ye mane bāñchā māga bara debaiṁ satyi satyi |
karapatra yoḍiṇa bolanti debarājā
bho durge tuhi mohora hoibu bhārijā |
durga boile muhiṁ ulagna tuhi bibasanaśāhī
prabhma bhārijā prāẏe duheṁ cuhāṁcuhiṁ hoi |
prabhma bhārijāṁkara ẏeherṇṇeka kathā
bichāri iśvaraṁkara koḷe bijekale jagatamātā |
koḷakari sadānande dhaile hr̥dagate
jaṭā ghoḍāile durgāpare deba biśvanāthe |
yahuṁ ẏeka āsane umā maheśvara
tridaśa debe āsi draśana kale chamura |
-jaẏatu āpāda khaṇḍaṇī nandara nandanī
sura siddha munigaṇe yāhāra caraṇe daẏinī |
abhaẏe māheśvarī go śrī sarbamaṅgaḷe
muhiṁ tohora caraṇa kamaḷe ārdhanā karai sarbakāḷe |
ādi sambhūta ye durgāṁka bakṣasthaḷu
debatāṁka apāda khaṇḍilu buddhibaḷuṁ | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-rakha abā bhakṣa go to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ |(ña, cha, ca)
-jaẏatu āpāda khaṇḍaṇī ānandanandinī |(jha, dha, cha)
-jaẏatu āpāda khaṇḍaṇī anādi nandanī |(gha, ja)

lg.l: boile ẏesaneka pratagyāṁ kalāka pāṇḍaba kirīṭī | 15 |

div.note: [169 pr̥ṣṭhāra 124|2 pāṭhāntara]
durgā ye bodhagale tohora satya bole
namaste kāntānī māgo sarbamaṅgaḷe |
jaẏatu durgā go jagata tāriṇī
saṁsāra āpāda khaṇḍu tu kariṇa bhramaṇi |
maṅgaḷabārare mātā go ye tote ārādhi
sarbamaṅgaḷe go tāhāra sarbakāryya siddhi |
caturmukha gheni ye anādi mahātmā
se barṇṇi nuārilā māgo tohora mahimāṁ |
muhiṁ mānaba mātraka go kisa mora buddhi
draśane prasanna go sakaḷa kāryya siddhi |
janme janme bhābili go tohora padmapāde
labhili paramagati go taba parasāde |
maudadhi uttara pāruśe jambudīpa mahī
-bhrathakhaṇḍa oḍarāṣṭra āgameṇa kahi |
subidhāna kaṭaka yāja nāme nagri
baṭukeśvara dakṣiṇa koṇe bijaẏe śākāmbherī | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
-“bhrathakhaṇḍa oḍarāṣṭa āgameṇa kahi”–ehi pādānta pare “ṭha” pothira pāṭha :–
sambalaurare samalāi tu bolāu
seṭhāre rahiṇa māta nānā pūjāpāu |
ẏe ehirūpe pūjāpāu rahi ketesthāne
ki śakti mohora māta to guṇabarṇṇane |
bahai īśāna koṇe bhāragabī nadī
ābara citrautpaḷā āsanti ẏe redi |
bijaẏe māheśvarī se nadīra kūḷe
abhaẏa bara dāẏinī śrī caṇḍī sāroḷe |

lg.l: muhiṁ jāṇaiṁ arjuna yiba ki maraṇe

div.note: [169 pr̥ṣṭhāra 124|2 ra pāṭhāntara]
pūrbadiga īśānyakoṇe jaṅkhera pūrabāsī
praśurāmaṁka pāṭaṇā kanakābatī nagrī bhāsi |
bahai īśānyabhāgī candrabhāgā nāme nadī
-citra utpaḷā saṁgamuṁ īśānya bārānidhi |
bijaẏe māheśvarī se nadīra kūḷe
abhaẏabara dāẏinī śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷe |
kr̥pājaḷa nandinī narmadā sarasvatī
-r̥ṣira śāpyuṁ se rudhira draśane tr̥pati |
-yebaṇa bhāratha muṁ rañchili śiḷoka yoge
mote ki agocara śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷa anurāge |
iti śrī droṇapaboṅg catrabhūa kathā
bedamantra śāhāsra purāṇa saṁhitā |
muhiṁta mūrkhajana na jāṇai akṣara
na dekhili na śikhili na bhābili śuṇibāku agocara |
abhaẏe heṁguḷāra caraṇe anubrate
muhiṁ tāhā bhābili saṁsāra janahite |
āhe budhajana muhiṁ nuhaiṁ paṇḍita
śrīkr̥ṣṇa nāma laẏekari hr̥dagata |
-kiñchita nāthahiṁ nānāhi saṁgīte
munijane yāhākaiṁ bhābanti anubrate |
mahā brahmabettā agasti brahmabāḷe
bārādhi gaṇḍū ṣakale ye kheḍara kutūhoḷe |
śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷa caraṇe daẏinī
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa granthika śūdramuni |
-citra utapaḷā saṁgamuṁ uttara bārānidhi |(cha, ña)
-r̥ṣira śāpuṁ se rudhira pāne tr̥mati |(ca, ta, ga)
-r̥ṣira śāpyuṁ se rudhira māṁse tr̥mati |(dha, ḍha)
-śiḷoka–śloka | 4-kiñchita laẏe nāma saṁketa |(ca, dha)

lg.l: muhiṁ bolai sindhu rājā samare na thāu
samaẏe bratu ẏe pañchurājya chaḍiṇa paḷāu | 18 |
ki heba pratagyāṁ kalāka pāṇḍaba kirīṭī | 19 |
āgyāṁ debāka bho guru uddāḷeka gotrī
yahiṁki hāribā tahiṁ kisa ye sāṁgrāma
adoṣe nāśa karāibā ki āmbhara tattva gyānuṁ | 22 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ trodhita se hoilā kururāẏe
bhāradvādaśaṁkara nandana ye jadyarathaṁkara kaṣṭa dekhi
trodhabhare aśr̥ ye pūrita beni ākhi | 25 |
abhimāna chaḍi ho rājā trodha kimpe karu | 26 |
naśanta kāḷaku bidhātā biparīta buddhi diẏe | 27 |
śateka pārtha gheni āsantu kinā hari
āja jāṇīmā ho arjunara keḍeka kaicchā
ohobaḷa thāṭhe muṁ jadyarathakaiṁ karibiṭi rakṣā | 29 |

div.note: –ẏe ta arjunaku sama nohiba sāṁgrāme |(ca)
–naśanta kāḷaku bidhātā biparīta kalāka upāẏe |–adhikāṁśa pāṭha |

lg.l: trailokya hoile ẏekatva jadyarathakaiṁ ke kariba nidhana | 30 |
driyodhana ẏekāṁga rājā hoiba arjuna nāśagale | 32 |
kṣaṇeheṁ bratibe ki ābara chāri ye pāṇṭaba | 33 |
kicchihiṁ na bola guru samaẏeke bratithāu jadyaratha mahātamā | 34 |
catra gheni abaśya ẏehākaiṁ maribe debarāja | 35 |
tuhi se jāṇunā ẏehāṁkara rakṣaṇe yeuṁ buddhi | 37 |
brahmā rudra indra hoile jadyarathaku samare nāhiṁ jiṇantā | 38 |
droṇe boile jadyarathakaiṁ gheni caḷa ho karurāja
ye yāhāra daṇḍa gheni hua bege saja | 39 |

div.note: –droṇaṁku gupte pucchanti kr̥pa āchāryya aśastamā |(kha, ṭha, na)
–kesane bolibi guru he kisa tumbhara baḍimā |(ḍa, ca)
–arjuna hāthe yebe nohiba prāṇatyāga |(tha, ña, ka)

lg.l: trailokye ke aba tumbhanta jiṇipāriba baḷe | 42 |
nānā bādya bājai ye śubhai ghora dhuni | 43 |
śakaṭa ākāra kari guru bhūẏeka rañchilā
prathama duāra ābori rahilā gāndhārī nanda | 48 |

div.note: –“prathama duāra ābori rahilā gāndhārī nandana”<lb/>ehi pāṭha pare “cha” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
tiriśa sahasra aśva chāḷiśa sahasra pādānti
nabasāgara ratha marbhmateka hāthī |
ẏeteka sanya gheniṇa bharadvādaśa nandane
duja duāra ābori rahile āpaṇe |
tr̥tīẏa dvāre rahile śalya mahārathī
caudakoṭi ratha bārakoṭi hāthī |
pāñchakoṭi turaṅgama marbhmateka baḷa
ye yāhāra śastradhari rahile sarbabaḷa |
caturtha dvāra ābori rahile se kr̥pa
tāhāṁka saṅge rathī achanti asaṁkṣepa |
ratha gaja aśva pādānti akaḷanā
pañchama dvāra ābori rahile aśastamā |
tāhāṁkara saṁgatere sehnā lakṣa chāri
ratha gaja sanya tadanta ke kari |
ṣaṣṭhadvāre bhūrisarba āpaṇe rahile
daśa marbhmata senā achanti tāra tule | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: tiriśa sāgara aśva chaḷiśa sāgara pādānti | 49 |
biṁśapadma rathī ye chāḷiśa padma hāthī
pāñcha ahibrata ṭamaka niśāṇa bīratūra ḍhola
śakaṭa bhūa tijadvāra āborile kr̥pa ācharyya bīra śalya | 52 |

div.note: (48|2 ra abaśiṣṭa pāṭhāntara)
saptamadvāra ābori rahile bīra karṇṇa
tāhāṁka saṁge achanti tinipadma sanya |
nabaphaḷare nabalakṣa yoddhā rahi
beni kāṭhi ābori sāgare sanya tahiṁ |
beni cake aḷambuṣa somadatta bīra
tāhāṁka saṁte rahile daśalakṣa niśācara |
akha madhya jagiṇa rahilā aḷāẏudha
aneka niśācara baḷa āne nāhiṁ sādhya |
sāhāṭa muṇḍe rahilā lakṣmaṇa kumāra
daśa sahasr asanya saṁgare tāhāra |
śakaṭa bhūa madhyare padmabhua kale
śate pākhuḍā kari padmaku sañchile |
padmanāḍa ābori rahile driyodhana
sakaḷa bhrātā saṁge saturī koṭi sanya |
pākhuḍāke rahile daśa daśa nr̥pati
sahasre ahibrateka gheniṇa sanya kati |
padmabhūa bhitare keśara bhūa kale
nabalakṣa rathī gheni śaṁkuni jagile |
keśara bhūa madhyare sūcībhūa kalā
dhr̥tirāṣṭara tule bidura sañjaẏe rahilā | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: āpaṇe tūryyadvāra akha ābori rahile rājādhi rājadeba | 53 |
tini tini sāgara baḷa ẏehāṁkara tule śāhī | 55 |
daṇḍa gheni āborile droṇi pañchama dvāre śakaṭa bhūara dvādaśa phaḷī | 56 |
pāñchasahasra rājā gheni ṣaṣṭhadvāre rahile benicaka | 57 |
nabasahasra rājā gheni ogālile saptamadvāra beniodhi | 58 |
ẏeteka sanya gheni karṇṇa rahile aṣṭamadvāre bhūa akhamadhya | 59 |

div.note: (48|2 ra abaśiṣṭa pāṭhāntara)
cauṣaṭhi koṭi sehnā rathī lakṣa chāri
dhr̥tirāṣṭi sūcībhūa rahile ābori |
sūcībhūa madhyare rahilā jadyaratha
sebhūa bhedibāku ke abā samartha |
kaurobe bichāra karanti mane mane
arjuna nicaẏe āja hoiba dahana |
arjunara nidhane śrīkr̥ṣṇa paḷāibe
prāṇa ki dharibe āu se chāripāṇḍabe |
tiriśa sāgara baḷa ẏehākaṁra tule sāhi |(kha, ca)
odhi = śagaḍa juāḷi muṇḍi |

lg.l: ẏe śakaṭa bhūara madhye padma ākāra kari
pākhuḍāke rahile ye śate śate bīra | 61 |
daśamarbhmata yoddhā gheni padmara nabama dvāre rahile śaṁkuni lakṣmaṇakumāra | 62 |
padmabhūa keśara daśadvāra ābori rahile mahabaḷī yoddhāmāna | 63 |

div.note: “daśamarbhmata yoddhā gheni padmara nabamadvāre rahile śaṁkuni lakṣmaṇakumāra |”<lb/>ehi pāda pare ṭha, na pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
sehi saptama dvāre senāpati droṇi
se dvāraku rakṣākale ẏete sanya gheni |
bahuta ratha gaja bājī senā agaṇanā
aṣṭame rahile karṇṇa gheni kurusenā |
ẏethi madhyare śakuni lakṣmaṇa kumāra
nabama dvāre rahile ẏehi dui bīra |

lg.l: maha araṇya bhitare yehne na diśai bāṭa | 68 |
āhe budhajane muhiṁ ẏethaku nuhai gyāṁtā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsara śira luḷu caraṇataḷe | 72 |
śūnyabhedi kahu nātha koṭi kalpara bāratā
śrī nirañjana gotrī se pratakṣe baradātā | 74 |
cintājaḷe paḍi mora gyāna ye buḍilā | 75 |
se brahmaruṣi caraṇa taḷe śaraṇa mo nitye
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa bhābai saṁsāra janahite | 77 | [2050 + 77 = 2127]

div.note: ẏe māẏāpaṭaḷuṁ mote uddhāra karasi |(tha, ña, ṭha)
luḷu–loṭu |
div.head: {@arjunaṅkara prathama o dvitīẏa dvāra bheda@}

lg.l: śrī mahābhārata ẏe śakaṭa bhūara kathā | 1 |
ati gupata kari yahuṁ rahile jadyaratha
bhūa dekhi droṇaṁku praśaṁsai dhr̥tirāṣṭara suta | 2 |
prathama yuddhe droṇe ye rañchile catrabhūa
arjuna dahana niścaẏa hoiba āja anaḷeṇa | 6 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba kehi ye na bartti | 7 |
ẏeḍe yoddhā thile ye bhīṣma mahārathī
aneka utsaba ye kauroba baḷa dekhi

div.note: ẏekāṅge droṇaguru dilāka aiśūryya |(ca, tha, ga)

lg.l: kauroba baḷa bāratā ailu deba jāṇi | 13 |
arjuna ṭhākure ye pratagyāṁ kale yetebeḷe
driyodhana chāra deba thile se niśākāḷe | 14 |
samasta sandeśa kahile se mānagobindara āge
rātra pāhilā arjuna pratagyāṁ karuṁ karuṁ | 17 |
kāli sāṁgrāma ho pache mohora hoilā | 19 |
debanta dulabha ye mānabe nuhai bhedi | 20 |
prathama duāra ye ābora rahilā dhuśāsana
ṣaṣṭhadvare aḷambuṣa aḷāẏudha saptame somadatta kaḷiṅgasena
svāmī śakaṭa bhūa bhitare padma bhūẏeka kalā
ḍagara mukhe ye ẏesana bārata śuṇi
prathama duāre dhuśāsana mohora hoilā adyāpi | 28 |
sehi se abhimanyuku prāṇe kalā bhraṣṭa
āja se pheibi dropatīra keśamukuḷa kaṣṭa | 29 |
svāmī bhāñjibi śakaṭa bhūa karibaiṁ sarba dhūḷi
akhacaka ādikari bhāñjibi daṇḍa odhi phaḷi | 30 |
ẏe mohora bhagare se hoile mahātamā | 32 |
śakaṭabhūa bhedibāku na bhāba deba kicchi | 33 |
śakaṭa bhūa bāraṇḍā mote kahichanti biśeṣi | 34 |
bhūaṁkara madhye jāḷāndhara bhūa adr̥ṣṭi aśr̥ti
tāhā taba prasade bhedi jiṇili sabunti | 35 |
svāmī ẏe śakaṭa bhūa muṁ bhedibi tohora bole
chari pāṇṭabe kehi na yiba mohora tule | 36 |
nathiba ratha gaja nathibe aśva yodhī
saini thile deba se bhūa na hoai bhedi | 37 |
dharmara nandana ye sāṣṭāma tāhā śuṇi
uccasvare śubhilā ye pañchajanya śaṅkha bāṇī | 38 |

div.note: śakaṭa bhūa bhedi muṁ jiṇimi sabunti |–(ka, ña)
“śakatābhūa bāratā mote kahichanti biśeṣi” pare–‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
uṇeiśa prakāre muṁ jāṇai bhūa bhedi
ẏe samasta br̥tta muhiṁ achai sampādi |

lg.l: aneka ratne deba nandighoṣa ratha sāji
śveta śaṅkha gokṣīra kāmapāḷa yocile charibāji | 39 |
ratha gheni bije hari arjunara pāśe | 40 |
ratha ṭekile hari arjuna pratagyāṁra beḷe | 41 |
āstānara taḷe deba ratha kale tejyā
dharmara nandana karanti bahuta kalyāṇa bāñcchā
tohora prasāde mohora pāṇḍaba baḷa rakṣā | 43 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ ye deba kaleka gurudroṇe
śakaṭa ākāra kari bhūẏeka rañchile āpaṇe | 44 |
tahiṁra bhitare padmabhūa, keśarabhūa, sūcibhūa ākāra
beḷa asta yāẏe napuṇa arjuna jadyarathaku nuārai māri | 46 |
ḍagara mukhuṁ deba śuṇili baḍāi durāpada
muhiṁ manyṣya janma kisa tiāribi tote
ke yuddha karibi rahi arjana chamure | 50 |
muṁ yadyapi nandīghoṣe thibi svāmī basi

div.note: –yemante jadyaratha sūryya aste mari |(ña, tha)

lg.l: lakṣeak baḷa ye gāṇḍima nāme dhanu
debadatta śaṅkha arjuna ghana ghana phuri
kauraba baḷa dhvaṁsa boli boile dharmaṁkara suta | 56 |
yemante jadyaratha āja paḍai tohora mukha
śubhe asa ẏethe bābu śatr̥ra darpa cūri | 58 |
hari pr̥thī āśre meru, hara āśre candramā
bijaẏe jagumohana sumari sarba ye maṁgaḷe | 62 |
tohroa yaśa kathā hari jāṇimi kemante | 63 |
mane muṁ triputi hoibi tohora śaṅkha śabada śuṇi | 64 |
nandighoṣa ratha caḷante pr̥thī daladalita kampai
ratha gaja aśva nāhiṁ saini pādānti
asaṁkhya kauroba baḷakaiṁ paẏāṇa ẏeka rathī | 72 |
pāñchalakṣa ratha gheni āsi nandighoṣakaiṁ ghoṭi | 74 |
gahana nārāja dekhi pāthaku pucchanti hr̥ṣīkeśī
āho pātha nirāpakṣa dhuśāsana hāde nārāja baraṣi | 76 |
rathī sārathi haẏe sabuṁkari dehe phuṭi | 78 |

div.note: pratikṣaṇa–pradikṣiṇa |
paẏāṇa–prasthāna |

lg.l: sainya bhagna dekhi se gāndhārīra pua
ḍāka diai kāhiṁki paḷāare ruha ruha | 80 |
ẏekā pāṇḍaba sinā samara mora dekha | 81 |
nācanti kabandha ye śira paḍanteṇa cchiḍi | 84 |
sanya bhagna dekhiṇa ye gāndhārīra śiṣa
āga hoi rahilā tule ratha tinisasra | 86 |
bindhante nārāja samastaṁkara ratha chaichāde phuṭi | 87 |
arjanara pratagyāṁ dekhi deba ye acyuta
praśaṁsā kari bolanti sādhu sādhu pātha | 89 |
rahi yuddha karai se samare niśaṁkā | 90 |
ohobaḷa thāṭha madhye dhūśāsana dhani dhani | 91 |

div.note: –ārambhe na rahi kimpe samara upekṣa | kha, na, ta

lg.l: keśa mukuḷa hoicchi pāñchāḷī cauda baraṣa pariyante | 94 |
svāmīra pratagyāṁ deba muṁ na mārai ẏehā | 95 |
birathī hoi āḍe hoilā gāndharīra suta
prathama dvāra jaẏekari bhitare paśile kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 97 |
saini samūha ye dutī samodra jiṇi
ratha gaja aśva ye pādānti gahaḷa
gahaḷa dhandoḷa dekhi paṇḍu rājāra bāḷa
ratha gaja aśva pādānti houchanti cūri | 103 |
paḷābanti saini ye raṇe hoiṇa bimukha
raha raha thāṭha sanya ḍākanti āśvāsi | 106 |
śrībhmaje śobhābana saturī sahasra baḷa dhanu
droṇaṁku dekhante ye rahile samasta rathī
ẏehāṁka yoguṁ nāśa galāṭi tora abhimanyu pua | 111 |
ohobaḷa madhye muṁ tote ẏehāku bheṭāili
uprodha yuddha napuṇa karu guru boli | 112 |
lāghaba yuddha tu bābu kale ẏehāṁkara tule
āpaṇe nāśagale guru sodara ye kāhiṁ
ātmarakṣā nimante pātha dharma adharma ye nāhiṁ | 114 |
bho guru abhimanyuku bahda karāila āpaṇe tumbhe thāiṁ | 117 |
tāhākaiṁ na māile maraṇa mohora niẏata | 118 |
ẏe mohora binaẏa gheni dvāra chaḍa guru
mohora bināśane tu pratagyāṁ kisa karu | 119 |
svāmī guru piara boli mohora nāhiṁṭi uprodhe
muhiṁ pratagyaṁ karicchi jadyarathakaiṁ karibi prāṇe | 121 |
debant adulabha ẏe śakaṭa bhūa bheda
arjuna boilā śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi yāhāra nandighoṣa rathe
ẏekā pāda ghāntike śakaṭa bhāṅgileṭi bāḷuta kheḍa mate | 123 |
muhiṁ ẏekā prahārake bhāñjibi odhi phaḷi
tumbhe āḍe hoile muṁ māri karibi sarba dhūḷi | 124 |
tumbhanta mātra mohora ẏeka kiñchite uprodha
āumānaṁkara tule aba kisa mohora yuddha | 125 |
pāthara pratagyāṁ śuṇi droṇa ye āchāryye
adhara puṣṭa kari pūroile parigha nārāje | 126 |
dekhiṇa pātha binddha chedila tāhā dūruṁ | 129 |
ratha dhvajare acchi kapi ye ketana
dhātikāre binddhaā pātha timbura śara śaẏe | 134 |
cūragalā droṇaṁka nārāja na rahila kicchi | 135 |
thāṭhe śubhila sādhu sādhu bīra pātha
droṇaguru śara chedane tu hoilu sāmaratha | 136 |
kiñchita mātrake droṇa śara pakāilu chedi | 137 |
puṇi sahasreka śara guru binddhale roṣe
kūṭa kapaṭa yuddha kalā droṇa ghoṭilā raẏaṇī | 140 |
ẏethakaiṁ pratikaccha bāṇa pātha tuhi sinā jāṇu
nārāja bindha andhapaṭaḷa bhāñju udaẏe hou bhānu | 141 |
tuhi se pratagyāṁ kalu āditya asta pariyante
tahiṁki kaṣaṇa āṇi droṇe bhiāile tote | 142 |
rāhuteja prāẏe ghoṭiachanti śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye pātha | 145 |
hāboḍā pañchuśara ye arjuna hāde grāhi

div.note: –guru tule sāṁgrāma karibāku tu hoilu sāmaratha |(ña, ṭa)
–kuhukā nārāja guru binddhaleka roṣe |(tha, ña)
–grāhi–ākarṣaṇa, grahaṇa kari |

lg.l: puṇa arjuna ye pannaṁgā śara binddha
droṇaṁka aśva sārathi sarba pakāilā chedi | 147 |
aniryyāpa bāṇa ye binddhalā pāha roṣe
ratha gaja aśva pādānti paḍile sarba loṭi
rathī sarathiṁkara śarīru śoṇita hoẏe br̥ṣṭi | 151 |
dekhai pātha ye sannidhye nāhiṁ sanya
svāmī ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭama ye hoile gurudroṇa
pāñchajanya śaṅkha śabada gaha gaha bāṇī
ṣaḍayojana antare yujheṣṭhi deba tāhā śuṇi | 155 |
manare sānanda ye paṇḍu rājāra bāḷa
uḍanti aśve sanya bhitare tesaneka bidhi | 157 |
dujadvāra jiṇi se yahuṁ nandighoṣa ratha galā
bhūa bhedi arjuna ye bhitare paśilā | 158 |
ratha gaja aśva ye gahaḷa pādānti

div.note: –manare haraṣa hoile śaṅkha śabada śuṇi<lb/>boiel droṇaguruku jiṇile kr̥ṣṇa pāṁlaguni |(tha, ña)

lg.l: jagujana bandhu tuhi se mote ẏethakaiṁ sākhi | 160 |
se thāṭha jiṇimāku ẏeka arjunahiṁ nirbhaẏe| 166 |
lakṣa lakṣa nārāca prahāra karai gheni | 167 |
praśu prahārante tehne cchiḍanti yoddhāṁkara śira | 168 |
ākāśa mañcha ye arjana śara ghoṭi
pāñchakoṭi yoddhāṁku ẏekā nārāja karai br̥ṣṭi | 169 |
rodhira nadī tahiṁ ye bahai ulloḷa
ratha gaja aśva upuciāiṁ hoile sarbaṭhuḷa | 171 |

div.note: –udaẏakāḷe yenhe diśai śaśāṁka | ṭa, ca, dha
–hiraṇya bidāre yenhe diśanti narasiṁha | (ṅa)

lg.l: sanya nirantare paḍanti kari hā hā kāra bobi
baikuṇṭha bhmabane pāuchanti sarbe śrīkr̥ṣṇa mukha chāhiṁ | 174 |
nānā hatyā pātaka bimocana labhanti mokṣagati | 177 |
samare paḍanti ye śaṅkha catra cinha dekhi
jaẏatu nīḷendīdaḷa locana nīḷautpaḷa yāhāra barṇṇa

div.head: {@kr̥pa, śalya, aśvatthāmā sahita arjunaṅka yuddha@}

lg.l: mahā brahmabettā agasti muni ye bakatā
śakaṭa bhūa samare dekhili muṁ tāhā | 2 |+
ke prānta kariba tāhā lekhana karante | 3 |
daẏā uprodha nāhiṁ abicchanne bāṇa binddha | 6 |
pañchamarbhmata yoddhā gheni pāthe ogāḷile kr̥pāchāryye | 9 |
subarṇṇara chaẏeṇī rathe śārddoḷa laṅguḷara cinha
sahasra sahasra bāṇa gheni jābaḍeṇa binddha | 12 |

div.note: ẏe kurubaḷa sanya yenhe cūtaphaḷa seṭi |(dha, ṭha, ca, ga, gha)

lg.l: sanya dekhi sānanda ye deba banamāḷī | 13 |
asaṁkhya samara hoilā ho sambhāḷa sambhāḷa | 14 |
na jāṇi pratagyāṁ ho kalu anamite
boilu ye kaurobanta muṁ jiṇimi kiñchite | 15 |
rakatabīryya prāẏe puṇa puṇa ẏehu goḷa | 16 |
kṣaṇe biśrāmi thāa mohora yuddha dekha | 17 |
pañchamarbhmata yoddhāṁkara chedilā dhanu śahasranta gheni | 19 |
mahābāta bighāte ye samaste gale uḍi
sanya biartha dekhiṇa kr̥pa ye āchāryye
āsante śahasre ye śūnya bhmabaneṇa ghoṭi
puṇa parbatā śahasre dhari kr̥pa āchāryye māri
puṇi kr̥pabrahmā ye nirghāta bāṇa peṣi

div.note: –boilu jadyarathaku muṁ jiṇimi kiñchite | tha, ña
–gandharbā śare tāhā arjuna nibāri |(ṭa, cha, gha, dha, kha, na)

lg.l: gobinde boile ẏe droṇaṁkara śaḷā kr̥pa
lāghaba yuddhe na bhāñjaiṭi ẏehāṁkara darpa | 28 |
nārāẏaṇa bacane pātha sūcīmunā śara binddha
kr̥pa āchāryyaṁkara se dhanu guṇa chedi | 29 |
khaḍaga phaḷā gheni ratharu aileka dhāti | 31 |
rome rome rodhara ye hoilāka br̥ṣṭi
pāñchajanya śaṁkha śabada kale bege ṭāṇi | 35 |
duhiṁkara tule pañchamarbhmata chokhāra ye haẏe | 44 |
re re kāra śabadeṇa ẏekamukha hoi uṭhi | 45 |
konta yāṭhi bulābante dekhilā gāṇḍima cūḍāmaṇi
bābala śare se chedilā sabuṁkara pāṇi | 49 |
rāga darpe kari rahiacchi sabu tanu | 52 |

div.note: –saini nirantare droṇameghe jāṇi |(ṅa, ña, tha)
–bābaḷa bāṇeka ye binddhalāka ṭāṇi |(ña, tha, ṅa, ja)

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇa praśaṁsanti yoddhāṁkara dr̥ṛha āsana dekhi
dui dui khaṇḍa hoiṇa rahichanti sabuṁkari kaẏe | 54 |
puṇa arjuna binddhale kāmyeka nāme śara
kaṭākṣa naẏane chāhiṁ adhare danta chāpi
ādrābaḷī sama dhanu dhariṇa kr̥pa āchāryye
ratha gaja aśve na rahile śahasre teja kari
yojane pariyante jana manyuṣya kehi nāhiṁ
kr̥paṁkara ratha nandighoṣa ratha duheṁ chanti rahi | 64 |

div.note: –pañcha marbhmata yoddhāṁkara ẏekai sarūpa<lb/>dekhiṇa āśrija ye hoileka kr̥pa |(adhikāṁśa pothi)

lg.l: kr̥paṁka salaghanā śuṇi arjuna baḍa caḷi
bahuta praśaṁsā tumbhe kala he banamāḷa | 68 |
gobinde boile tu ki agyāna dhanañchaẏe
nandighoṣa ratha tora meru tulya prāẏe | 69 |
rathadhvaja upare tohora hanumanta achai ābori | 70 |
aśeṣakoṭi brahmāṇḍa gheni muṁ tohora rathare sārathi
śaṁkhacatra gadā gheni mohora narakeśarī mūrati | 72 |
ẏe rūpa dekhi mohora śaṁkanti bedabrahmā
taḷaku na thilā uparaku ta nohiba
sādhu sādhu mahimāṁ tora bolanti bāsudeba | 74 |
āho caitana kr̥paṁkara salaghanā dekhi pātha mahākopī
guṇaghr̥ṣṭa kariṇa kare nārāja gheni kṣepi | 75 |
haẏa sārathiṁki ye pāñcha pāñcha śara
ābara pāñcha nārāja ye rathakaiṁ yoci
sārathi benikhaṇḍa hoi bhedilā kr̥paṁkara sehnā | 78 |

div.note: –ābara pāñcha nārāja rathakaiṁ prāñchi |(ca)

lg.l: raha raha pātha boli badaẏanti janārddana | 80 |
kr̥pe bhūmigata upareṇa kr̥ṣṇa gale ratha bāhi
beni odhi bhedi bije bhūa madhye yāiṁ | 83 |
biśāśate rathī gheni śara bindhanti ye toḷi | 85 |
aśi sahasra rathī tini marbhmata hāthī

div.note: –jadyanika barṇṇānika suratha rukamaḷi |(dha, ña)
–bhmaamadhye sanya ye atiẏa gahaḷa<lb/>samudraghoṣa yehne śubhai mahāgoḷa |(ña)
–mahāaraṇya yenhe śāḷa br̥kṣamāḷa<lb/>ratha gaja diśanti tesane gahaḷa || (kha)

lg.l: ẏekaku āreka ye na kahanti uttara
andhāra ghora śareka māilā śākalya deśara rāẏe
bāraṇa na galā puṇi para ke āpaṇā | 95 |
bandhu sahodra ke kāhāku nuāranti cinhi | 97 |
puṇa pañchaṣaṭha nārāja gheniṇa śalya mahārathī
ṣāṭhiẏe ṣāṭhiẏa bāṇa gheni binddhaleka dhāti | 100 |
begeṇa bindhanti śahasra ye dharma kari tejyā

div.note: –kopeṇa nārāja ye binddhalā koṭitini |(dha, ṅa)
–palakā paṁkaja, phena tinibāṇa |(ṭha, ca, ḍa, na, kha)
–andhāra ghora śareka māilā dhanurjaẏe |(tha, ṅa, ka, gha)
–arjuna uparaku binddhaleka jhāti |(jha, ta)

lg.l: ratha sārathi haẏe ye na diśai kicchi | 103 |
baraṣā br̥ṣṭi jāṇi bāṇa paḍanti gaganuṁ
se śahasamāna giḷai kapi ye ketanu | 105 |
puṇihiṁ parigha śareka binddalā arjuna ye gheni
sātakṣauṇī baḷa ye thile akha cake
manabhedī nārāja ghāte na uburile jaṇeke | 109 |
rudhira nadī bahilā mr̥tyu kaḷebara hoilāka bheḷā bheḷā | 113 |

div.note: –se sarba śahasramāna chedai bīra phālagunyu |(tha, ña, ja)
–rakate karddana ye sabuṁkari kaẏe |(tha, ṅa)

lg.l: raṇa chaḍi paḷāi loḍanti pāiṇa bimukha | 115 |
mana dr̥ṛhe yoddhāẏe bolanti raha raha re bābā
ẏe maraṇa sulabha bhāratha yuddha kāhiṁ pāibā | 116 |
nisata hoi paḍibā ki sateheṁ dia jhāsa
śrīkr̥ṣṇa mukha chāhiṁ male pāibā baikuṇṭhe bāsa | 117 |
puṣyeka ratha gheni rahi achanti debagaṇe | 118 |
dharma adharma na bichāri ho ẏethi lāgichanti ripubaḷa
dhara dhara māra māra śubhai gahaḷa | 119 |
keśarī lāṅguḍa cihna ratha dhvajare uḍāẏeṇī | 123 |

div.note: –“ẏe maraṇa sulabha bharatha yuddha kāhiṁ pāibā”–pādāṁśa<lb/>pare “cha, ka” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
dekha nandighoṣa rathe bijaẏe debahari
kareṇa śaṅkha catra kaumodī gadā dhari |
ẏethire paḍile ho labhibā sarge bāsa
nisata hoile āmbhe hoibā narke bāsa |
–puṣyaka ratha gheni dekhuachanti biṣṇu gaṇe | jha, cha
–keśarī lāṅguḍa cinha ratha dhvajare uḍai puṇi | jha, ta
–śrīindradebatā śaṁkā karanti yāhaṁka dhaile kodaṇḍa<lb/>hākeṇa mahī kampāẏe bharatha kuḷa ṣaṇa(?) || (tha, gha)

lg.l: puṇī rāge sahasre bāṇa ghenilā rāẏe śalya
nindighoṣa uparaku binddhale se bhāroi kuḷa malla | 126 |
puṇihiṁ śateka se ye pūroiṇa śara
hāthara byagre śahasranta dekhi ta nuāri
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile tu śuṇa ho phālaguni
arjuna boilā hari āhuri prahāra se karu
bindhu śahasranta ye dui troṇuṁ saru | 132 |
gobinda boile ẏethaku mohora se cintā
jadyaratha bheṭa na paḍai boli mohora baḍa bhaẏe
tu tāhā kiñchite prāẏe bujhuchu dhanañjaẏe | 134 |
arjuna boilā hari śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi yāhāra rathe
īṣita mātra prāẏe muhiṁ bujhai jadyarathe | 135 |
ẏehu praharaka bhitare yehu miḷai mohora chamuṁ
yuddha śeṣa hoilāni śakaṭa bhūa sāṁgrāmuṁ | 136 |

div.note: –madhyasthānaru baḷilāṭi āditya debatā | ṅa, ja, ḍa, dha, gha
–iṣita–akleśare, sāmanya mātra |

lg.l: se pañchuśara pātha kāhākaiṁ ādhāna kari ye na thilā | 137 |
śalyaṁka uparaku ātreṣi binddhalāka bicitrabīryyaṁkara nāti | 138 |
śahasraṁkara teje ye ratha galā phāṭi
śalyaṁkara śarīre paḍi bajrasenhā galā phuṭi | 140 |
rome rome bhedi tahuṁ bahai śoṇita
sohodra mātuḷa ẏe samaẏe thāntu brati | 144 |
antarīkṣe ratha mora bāhā ho śrīpati | 145 |
dhātikāre śūnye ratha bāhile ye bega bega | 146 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile tu śuṇa ho phālaguni

div.note: –pachī pramāṇe ye bāṇa phuṭilā śarīre | ña, ḍa
–ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭama se icchābatīra bāḷa | cha, ṭha, na, kha
–ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭama se śākalya bhmaapāḷa | ca

lg.l: ātreṣi pr̥thibīki ye binddhalā pātha bāṇa
tr̥ṣāre ātura hoithile gaja aśva saini
karanti jaḷa āpyāna ye yāhā baḷa gheni | 153 |
ẏe mahābhāratha yuddhe mahimāṁ tora dhani
sādhu tohroa piara sādhu tohora jananī | 155 |
sata rakṣaṇa nimante sodrimā tohora guṇa
āmbhara āṣya gheni brata pañchukaṭake nicaḷa bhoga hou rājya | 157 |
sāṣṭama hoi śahasra dhaile sarba bīre
puṇi aborile āsi ye yāhāra dvāre | 159 |

div.note: ātreṣi ākāśaku ye binddhalā bīra pātha<lb/>phuṭiṇa jaḷadharā bahila kurakṣetra |(tha, ña, kha, na)
f suśītaḷa subāsita baraṣilā nīra<lb/>abirate jaḷabr̥ṣṭi sāṁgrāma bhūmira |(tha, ṅa)
–br̥ṣṭi hoi bahibāru dharaṇī upara |(ṭha, gha)

lg.l: raṅgabasra pariharaṇa kāhāra keśa khāṁkara kehu śireṇa lāṁgaṭā | 162 |
maẏeṁṣā badha kaḷe yenahe ḍākanti bhairobī | 163 |
raha raha boli samaste āsi nandighoṣakaiṁ ogāḷi | 165 |
pañchama bhūa dvāra ābori rahichanti aśastamā | 166 |
andheka badha kāḷe yenhe diśanti tripurāri
subarṇṇara kaḷasa upare khañjita aṣṭa ratnamāna | 169 |
dvāra abori aśastamā rahicchi ẏeka rathe
ratha dhvaje bikāśai kapi ye ketana

div.note: –phaḷā āḍaṇa badāu jānure bīraghaṇṭi
–raṅgabastra ābharaṇa śire mandāra māḷagoṭi | ga, ca,
–padmabhūa dvāre ābori rahichanti aśastamā | (ga, gha, ña, ka, tha, ṅa, ṭha, na, kha)

lg.l: śakaṭa bhūa bhedi ẏebe ailā kapidhvaja
pāñchakoṭi sanya gheni dhuśāsana thile prathama duāre
sehi kṣaẏe galāni ẏe ailā ẏekasare | 173 |
daśamarbhmata yoddhā gheni dujadvāre thile droṇe
tija dvāreṇa ẏe bhārathe bhārathakuḷa mala | 175 |
ẏekā jaṇake chedilā ki sabuṁkari muṇḍa | 176 |
nāhiṁ bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba nāhiṁṭi śrīkhaṇḍi
ẏekā yoddhāke chedilā ki sabuṁkari śirakhaṇḍi | 177 |
śakaṭa bhūa bhedi ailā ẏekā rathe
mote jiṇi ẏebe bhūa bhitare paśante
sañchaẏe nāśa ẏebe ta gala dr̥śilāra kānte | 181 |
puṇa boilā droṇa prāẏe pitā nāśa gale
kr̥pa ācharyya śalya dhuśāsana prāṇa dile | 182 |
sākhā sahodra guru ye samastaṁka maraṇe
śrīkr̥ṣṇa ādikari āja na thoibi kāhākaiṁ | 184 |

div.note: –māribi pāṇḍabanta jībana gheni kehu yāi |(tha, ṅa)

lg.l: ke sahi pārai āja jāṇimā aśastamāra śaraghāta | 185 |
niprohi hoiṇa se āpaṇe kale yuddha | 186 |
ajaṅga sarikṣe kare acchi nausasra dhanu
sanya samudra ye aṭai bhāratha yuddha

div.note: –ohāri ubhāri, ṭhiā kari |
–kurubaḷa saini ye dutīẏa sāgara<lb/>tahiṁki setubandha ye droṇaṁka kumara || (ga, tha, ṅa)

lg.l: senhā phuṭiṇa aśastamāra śarīre yāi kaṇṭi | 200 |
garjiṇa parbate ye nandighoṣa rathakaiṁ nirodhi | 202 |
bajra śakati gheni arjuna tāhā prāñchi | 203 |
garjana nāda kariṇa ye āsanti uḍaṁge
meghā śahasreka ye binddhalā kope droṇi
garjiṇa uṭhile mehe jambu paṭaḷa jāṇi | 208 |
daśa diga andhāra kale megha ghoṭi

div.note: –mehe-meghe |

lg.l: svarga marttya pātāḷa ye ghoṭilā pura tini | 211 |
ābarttaka śara ye binddhalā bīra ṭāṇi
pitāuṁ adhika daśa sahasra baḷa dhanu dhari | 214 |
phiriki nārāja gheni tāha chedilāka droṇi | 217 |
ẏeka ẏeka yoddhāke ẏe pāranti mahī manthi | 218 |
ẏehāra tohora yebe aṭai sari yuddha
muhiṁ jāṇaiṁ ẏebe jadyaratha nuhai prāṇe badha | 220 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacane se śveta ye bāhinī

div.note: –r̥dra śahasreka ye binddhalā medinī |(ja, ca)
–libi–libhi |

lg.l: tohora lāghaba yuddha dekhi mohora baḍa bhaẏe | 227 |
ẏemanta samara karante na puṇa āditya hoẏe asta
pratagyāṁ niṣphaḷa na puṇa tohora hoibaṭi pātha | 228 |
tohora naśante ye na barttai muhiṁ
abheda mantra se ye jāṇai aśastamā
abheda sehnāẏe bāṇa paḍiṇa na phuṭi
śarīre paḍiṇa ye nārāja guṇḍā uṭhi | 234 |

div.note: –paḍilā nārāja ye biartha uttamā |(ṭa, tha)
–paḍante na bhedai nārāja uttamā |(ña, ta)

lg.l: katurī bāṇa binddha arjuna tāhā chedi | 235 |
kodaṇḍe pūroi binddhale yahiṁ puruṣaṁka uttamā | 236 |
puṇa puṇa pañchabāṇa gheniṇa ye droṇi
śuṇa ho rājana guru putrara mahiṁmā
biṁśabāṇa paḍiṇa ye bhāñjilā droṇi ratha
chaḍa chaḍa nārāja paḍilā benijānura upara | 246 |

div.note: –surekhā sudeba prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntara acchi |

lg.l: asaṣṭama hoi paḍilā chaḍilā hāthu dhanu | 248 |
gobinde boile arjuna chatrīpaṇa tora dhani
kebaṇa yaśobaḷe tu bidyānta anakūḷa gheni | 250 |
ẏe mahābhāratha raṇe tu kṣatrkuḷa uttamā | 251 |
aśastamā uparaku ābara śara kara br̥ṣṭi
śarīre phuṭi nārāja se paḍu mahīloṭi | 252 |
aneka kāḷaru yuddha nahiṁ ẏehāra tohora
droṇaṁkara nandana se ye paḍicchi moha gheni | 254 |
dharma laṁghile samasta kāryya hoi sinā naṣṭa | 255 |
mohagalā kṣatrīki muṁ na mārai raṇe
dharma laṁghita muṁ karibi kisa ye kāraṇe | 256 |
birathī hoile muṁ na mārai rathī

div.note: –“droṇaṁkara nandana se ye paḍicchi moha gheni” ehi pādānta<lb/>pare “ña, tha” pothire pāṭha :–
aneka kāḷaru samara na thilā ẏehāra mohora
putra kaṣṭe paḍilā ẏe mohora chamura |
kṣatrīpaṇaku atulāita aṭai ye mahāmala
guruṁkara nandana ẏe guruṁka samāna
br̥ddhakāḷe aputrika hoibe guru droṇa |

lg.l: ẏethakaiṁ cintā tumbhe na kara jagunāha
sanande pāñchajanya śaṁkhabādya kale deba ghana ghana | 259 |
ye yāhāre dhanu dhari nārāja binddhale | 262 |
koṭiẏe śara pātha ādhāna ye kale
kare dhaile dhanu pañchastorī śahasra baḷa | 268 |
aneka nārāja se roṣeṇa kale br̥ṣṭi
pratiśara kari puṇa arjuna tāhā kāṭi | 269 |
puṇi peṣile kope parbatā śate śara
bihantā puruṣe na rahile gagana maṇḍaḷe | 274 |
bhūrisarbaṁka hr̥de paḍante se hoile agyāna | 280 |
dvāra chaḍi paḷāile na rahile ẏeka jaṇa | 281 |
śuṇa ho manurāẏe kahanti agasti tapobanta | 285 |
ẏekā pāñchajanya śaṁkha śubhmathiba jadyaratha paḍibā pariyante | 288 |
apāra śaṁkha śabada ta śubhilā mahāgoḷa | 289 |
hr̥daẏa ākuḷa mora manare baḍa cintā | 290 |
samare goḷakari abā kaurobe kale jaẏe
hā hā sodara re mote karigalu ẏehā
sañchaẏe śrīhari tote nohile ki sāha | 293 |
caḷa tu sātukī ho arjunara pāśa
sabya asabya bāratā jāṇi bege āsa | 295 |
āgyāṁ pāi sātakī se rathare bijekalā | 297 |

div.note: –pāñchajanya śaṁkha ta śūbhmathilā ẏetebeḷa<lb/>apāra śaṁkha bādya ta śubhilā mahāgoḷa |(jha, ja, ḍa)
–samare biartha abā hoilā arjuna |(jha, ja, ḍa, ca)

lg.l: tāḍa toḍhara jagadaḷā ye bāhuṭi kaṁkaṇa
jaẏemāḷā goṭi dile nei sātukī gaḷāreṇa | 301 |
kṣatrī hoi ke miḷiba satukīra kati | 302 |
tripura badha kāḷe yehne bīṇāẏeka mūrtti
tesaneka sañjāta ye diśilā sātuki mūrati | 303 |
mataḷi ratha prāẏe caḷai ati bege | 306 |
ẏeteka sanya gheni dvāre rahicchi dhuśāsana
sātuki śare samasta narāja galā kṣaẏe
binddhalā sātuki ye dhanu ādhāna kari | 314 |
ratha gaja aśva yoddhā ye pādānti
sahasreka rathī ye dui sahasra hāthī
bhajile yoddhāẏe ye na rahile kehi jaṇe | 317 |
dvāra chaḍi āḍe hoilā kumāra dhr̥tirāṣṭi
bhitare paśilā ye sātuki kariṇa śarabr̥ṣṭi | 320 |
bhūabhedi bhitare paśilā nirbhaẏe ẏeka rathe | 321 |
duja dvāre thāi tāhā dekhile guru droṇe | 323 |

div.note: –bāẏabā śareka gheni ākarṇṇa sari kari<lb/>sātuki uparaku kopeṇa puhāri |(ṅa, tha)

lg.l: ki ẏe indra debatā ki ẏe kubera ratha
dhatikāre droṇaṁku se kala śara br̥ṣṭi | 326 |
agni kaṇikā jāṇi pañchakoṭi bāṇa binddha
jaḷadhārā prāẏe kari sātuki sehnā bhedi | 330 |
ẏekā yoddhāke ye śate śate bāṇa māri
se pañchāṇoī rājāṁkara śarīra hoẏe cūri | 332 |
ratha camakāi sātuki aśve uḍanti mahāteji | 333 |
sātuki binddhalā ye lohāra daśabiṁśa bāṇe | 334 |

div.note: ra 331 madhyare keteka pothire bhinma pāṭha–
kiẏe kebaṇa debatā bijaẏe ẏekā rathe
ki abā śacīsāiṁ ki abā manumathe
puṇa bichārile ki abā āsile surarāẏe
mañchamaṇḍaḷe debaṁkara kisa kāryya hoẏe |
indra gobinda śaṁkā karanti mahābhāratha samare
ẏe kebaṇa mahātmā ailā ẏekasare |
–satyakara baḷā sthānare yaśobantī, śani, yaśodā, jambubatī,<lb/>yadubaṁśa baḷā prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntara acchi |

lg.l: puṇa tiriśa bāṇa pūroiṇa chabeṇa mādhabi
droṇaṁkara chāba śahasra se pakailā chedi | 340 |
biśahasra hoi droṇe āreka dhanu dhari
dronaṁkar aratha aśva bāṇa sarba hoilāka būri | 342 |
sādhu sādhu sātuki boli śubhilāka dhuni
sādhu tohora piara sādhu tohora jananī | 345 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sodara se arjuna prāẏe mahābaḷī
samare anibāraṇa aṭai aṇa ye uprodhi | 347 |

div.note: –chāba-chāpa |
–sādhu tora mātāpitā jībana tora dhani |(jha, gha)

lg.l: āśā sāgare nātha akaḷita sadaẏe sindhu | 352 |
nāma sumarante sarba dūrita hoẏe naṣṭa | 355 |
kaḷiyuga chārilakṣa batiśa sahasra baraṣa pariyante
apāra mahiṁmā deba kahite śakya nāhiṁ
mānaba matrake mote gocara acchi kāhiṁ | 357 |
na jāṇi mohajaḷe muṁ houacchi bhāsi | 358 |
cakṣu thāuṁ thāuṁ thoke houchanti baṇā | 359 |

div.note: –kṣatrīpaṇaku se ye samare śakatā |(ca, ga, jha)
–dyābā pr̥thibīre yāhāra nāma prakaṭi |(bahu pothi)
–amiẏa sāgare nātha akaḷaṁka indra |(ca, ña)

lg.l: lobha moha trodha nātha nuāranti uburi | 360 |
śrībiṣṇu purāṇaku kiñchite hoanti sehu śrotā | 361 |
naraka nibāraṇa jagannāthe karanti ye rakṣā | 362 |
janme janme mūrkha muṁ nārāẏaṇaṁkara bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa līna ho śrīkr̥ṣṇa padmapāde | 365 | 2311 + 365 = 2676

div.head: {@byūhabheda kari sātyakira yuddha@}

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇa aṁśe jāta ye tāhā bhedite śakatā | 2 |
pañchama dvāra bhedi pārile se pāiba ẏeka bāṭa | 3 |
se bhūa bhedibāku sātuki kisa yodhī

div.note: –śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna binā ke tāhā bhedite śakatā |(tha, cha)

lg.l: garuḍa rūpe pāṇṭabe haranti sarba darpa | 5 |
satuki se bhūa bhedita na jāṇaiṁ
māra māra boliṇa ye śubhilā cahaḷa | 11 |
ādhāna sandhana ye kaḷita na pāri
ẏekai troṇuṁ bāṇa āreka māranti chorikari | 13 |
sātukī bāṇa ye bindhai roṣa bhari | 15 |

div.note: –pañchasasra yoddhāṁku sātuki rathī ẏekā<lb/>yesaneke mandara sindhu manthai niśaṁkā |(ta, tha)
–upanesi–upanyāsa kari, tarkaṇā karibā |

lg.l: pāñchasasra yoddhā tule āsi ogāḷile kr̥pa | 19 |
kopeṇa binddhale se kr̥pa ye nārāja | 21 |
dhanu chaḍi kr̥pa ye paḍile acete | 25 |
bhediṇa śakaṭa se bhedai bhūa bhāge | 26 |
ratha gaja aśva ābara saini pādānti

div.note: –kr̥ṣṇara sārikṣe tejabaḷa br̥ddhi |(dha, kha, na, ca)
–kr̥paṁku binddhalā se yaśobantīra tanu |(ca, ḍa)
–kr̥paṁku binddhalā se jambobatīratanu |(tha, ña)
–ghāẏeṇa kohābai se nandara tanaẏe |(dha, cha, ta, ña, jha, ga, tha, ṅa, gha)
–sātukira śaraghāte hoile bikoti |(dha, na, kha, tha, ṅa, cha)

lg.l: juḷujuḷā poka jāṇi bindhanti śraa tīkha | 29 |
bhaẏeṇa yoddhāẏe ye laṁghi nuāranti sīmā | 30 |
samasta śahasra paḍiṇa śarīre honti cūra
tini marbhmata aśva dui kṣauṇī pādānti | 38 |
raha raha sātuki boli ogāḷile bāṭa | 39 |

div.note: –debanta dulabha ye sātuki raṇaraṅga |(tha, ṅa)
–kehi rahi nuāranti tāhāra chamura |(ṅa, tha)

lg.l: śalyaṁkara śahasra sātuki karai sarba nāśa | 41 |
sātuki chedila ye bege śalyaṁkara haẏe chāri | 42 |
puṇa chedila se śalyaṁkara ratha chāba | 43 |
khaḍaga phaḷā gheniṇa samare paśile mahāmalla | 44 |
śūnya hātha hoi śalye gajara piṭhi uṭhi
āḍe hoile śalya na rahile sātukira āga | 50 |
ratha gaja aśva saini aneka pādānti
pratyuṣa kāḷe yenhe āditya teja diśi

div.note: –niśita–tīkṣṇa |
–mādhabi sthānare mādheba śabda praẏoga karāyāicchi |
–bābala bāṇeka dhari binddhalāka sehi |(ṅa, tha)

lg.l: raṇe nisata hoi samasta yoddhā bhāñji
kāḷānaḷa bahani teja jāṇi sātukira teja
paḍante kaurobe pataṅge yesaneke hoanti dahija | 55 |
ghora śabada śuṇi droṇi sāṣṭama hoi uṭhi
mha teji aśastamā dr̥ṛha kari muṣṭi | 58 |
āreka arjuna bhūa bhedai ki puṇi | 60 |
kapidhvaja na dekhi se droṇaṁkara tanu
nārāja sūroilā bīra ajaṁga sama dhanu | 61 |
re re kaurobā boli uccasvare hāki | 63 |
dhanu āmañchana kari aśastamā chamure miḷe begi | 64 |

div.note: –matta keśarī yenhe dhāmaiṁ gaḷagāji |(ṅa, tha)

lg.l: baraṣā rutu jāṇi nārāja karai ye br̥ṣṭi | 66 |
aneka sanya māri se paśai keśara bhūẏe | 69 |
ratha gaja aśva ye saini gahaḷa
ẏemāne diśanti ki gahana ghora latā | 72 |
gaja aśva oṭa maiṁṣi śārddoḷa jībamane
jāta anaḷa teja ghoṭilā se kāḷānaḷa bahani | 74 |
pratāpa bahani ki se āpaṇe śrīhari pabana
anaḷa tule maruta dahilā gahana bana | 75 |
dr̥ṣṭi mātrake dahija houchanti gaja aśva ratha | 76 |
nirāśī yuddha karai bīra se na rakhai śaraṇa | 77 |
ẏeka nārāja bindhante daśa biṁśa pañchiśa phuṭi | 78 |

div.note: –raṇeṇa nirbhaẏe sātuki na nārāẏaṇa mūrtti |(ṭa, jha, ḍa)
–saṁghāri–saṁhāri |

lg.l: khecara bhūcara hoi nācanti raṇa madhya | 79 |
apāra bahai rudhira ye gabhīra ulloḷā
gaja aśva yoddhāẏe upuciānti hoiṇa bheḷā bheḷā | 81 |
se nadīki nāba ye nandighoṣa ratha
śakha śveta gokṣīra kāmapāḷa chāri haẏe
he mūrkha jane mohora na ghenimā doṣa
muhiṁ yāhā kahili tāhā janme janme mohora abhyāsa | 84 |
parama ātmāna puruṣa praḷaẏa kāḷa jitā | 85 |
mahā praḷaẏa kāḷe se biṣṇu garbhe paśai
anantakoṭi brahmāṇḍa se dekhai biṣṇu garbhe
praḷaẏa uttāre se lekhana karai ẏebe | 87 |
dhātubāda puruṣa se batiśa guṇe kaḷā
se munira parasanne mohora mati anargaḷā | 88 |
janme janme bhābili muṁ byāsadebaṁka padmapāde

div.note: –anantakoṭi abatāra se dekhai śūnya bhabe |(ḍa, tha)
–dhātubāda puruṣa se batiśa sahasra kaḷā |(ca, cha, ña)
–janme janme bhābili śrīkr̥ṣṇa padmapāde |(ca, ḍa)
–śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa muṁ bākya debīra prasāde |(ṅa, ṭa)
div.head: {@bhūrisarbaṅkara sātyaki saha yuddha o mr̥tyu<lb/>bhīmaṅkara byūhabheda@}

lg.l: padmabhūa bhediṇa arjuna keśara bhūẏe paśi | 1 |
droṇe kale ye padmabhūa śateka pākhuḍā
biṁśa paciśa pachāśa kari bindhanti tīkhakāṇḍa | 3 |
abicchanne nārāja bindhante gagana panthe goṭi | 4 |
kahante asaṁkṣepa ẏe mahābhārata yuddha kathā
se sāgara taribāku ẏekā arjunahiṁ sāmarathā | 5 |
padma pākhuḍā duāre rahichanti nabasahasra rāẏe | 6 |
ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe karṇṇa ye kapaca kuṇḍaḷa dānī
dinakara maṇimukuṭa śire sahasra kiraṇa jyoti
se śahasra dharithile jāṇi karṇṇa kāḷasarpa
dekhiṇa harai ye kr̥ṣṇa arjunara darpa | 10 |
dāneṇa śarīra kāṭidilā na kalā abagyāṁ | 11 |
śatr̥ darpa harai se dinakara tanu | 12 |
karṇṇara mūrtti dekhiṇa arjune badaẏanti mādhaba
ẏe dvāra ābori ye rahicchi rādheba | 13 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ ẏe saini achai ābori
oprodha chaḍiṇa samara kara tu sambhāḷi | 14 |
ẏehāku jiṇimā deba beḷa daṇḍa tini | 15 |
sambhāḷi ratha mora bāha ho janārddana
nimiṣa arddhamātre ye jiṇimi rādheba karṇṇa | 16 |
svāmī tohora prasāde ẏe chara aba mote kete
keśaba dekhante pātha nirāpakṣa śara binddha
nirghāta bāṇa yenhe paḍai giri bhedi | 18 |
bajra sama bāṇa yahuṁ satrodhe māile
raṇe apacaẏa pāi se bhajile saini
karṇṇa ogāḷilā āsi sahasreka yoddhā gheni | 21 |

div.note: –binddhalā abhimukhe nidrāgha pañcha bāṇa |(ṭa, ta)

lg.l: puṇa prahāra kalā mohanā śara bāṇa
paḍile samasta yoddhāẏe kehi nāhiṁ sākhā
raṇaraṁga dhandoḷa bhāroi malla karṇṇa karai ẏekā | 32 |
śara br̥ṣṭi kalā yahiṁ achanti mādhaba | 33 |
puṇa sahasre bāṇa ye binddhalā rādheba
nidrāgha bāṇa binddhalā kope bīra pātha
śuṇa ho caitana sātuki aśastamāra yuddha
bāruṇā astreka gheni aśastamā bege peṣi
bichārai sātuki ye andhāra ghora dekhi
padma bhūare paśilā se samara upekṣi | 43 |
sātuki na dekhi se bhāḷai biparīta | 44 |
kaṇaẏa ratha caṛhi āsi ogāḷile bhūrisarba | 48 |
śāẏentanuṁkara sodara se baẏase adhika mahārathī
katurī baṇeka ye binddhale rāẏe bhūri

div.note: –sātuki na dekhi se bhāḷai tāra citta |(ṅa, tha, ña, na, kha)
–cūtaphaḷa jāṇi loṭanti bhūmire |(ga, ca)
–pāṇḍabaṁkara ajāguru se samara na upekṣanti |(ḍa, tha)

lg.l: abichanne nārāja bhūrisarba bindhai ati rāge
sātuki bināśa tāhā karai ati bege | 52 |
sātukira rathe nei piṭile kaurobā kuḷadeba | 54 |
ẏeka kare guruja āreka kare yaṣṭi
mahā anaḷa jāḷā jāṇi uṭhilā bahati
yesaneke ketu maṁgaḷa diśanti beni mūrati | 61 |
satvare dhāiṁṇa sātuki ye piṭilā guruje
guruja parigha paḍitāḷe jaḷi uṭhai anaḷajāḷā
puṇa sātuki dhari nabaniśi kare yāṭhi
re re kāra kariṇa ye ātreṣiṇa uṭhi | 64 |
dekhiṇa bhūrisarba ye dhariṇa bajra konte

div.note: –yesaneke ketu maṁgaḷa diśanti ẏeka mūrtti |(ga, ca)

lg.l: śrībhmaje sātuki ghenilā khaḍaga ye phaḷā | 66 |
biśahasra hoi sātuki hoilā śūnya hātha
bāmakare keśa ḍāhāṇa kare khaḍaga jhuṇi
re re yādabā yama pāñji pocchilā ẏehikṣaṇi | 72 |
kuru sāgara boli ki tu manare na jāṇuṁ
sumara re gauḍā tora pitā mātā
sumara re gauḍā tora iṣṭa ye debatā | 74 |
uccasvare sātuki ḍākadila mote rakha catrapāṇi | 75 |
uddhva mukhe sātuki ye dilā yahuṁ ḍāka

lg.note: –“uccasvare sātuki ḍākadilā mote rakha catrapāṇi” pāṭha pare<lb/>“cha, ja” re adhikā pāṭha :–
kurāḷa catra prāẏe sātuki bulāi ye ākhi
prahāra kari nuārai bhūrisarba tāhā dekhi |

lg.l: samare birathī hoi ke ḍākai rakha ho janārddana | 77 |
puṇa puṇa mādhabi ye uccasvare dilā ḍāka
śaraṇa pañjara nātha arjuna mote rakha | 78 |
ratha pachakati keṭi arjuna rakha boluacchi | 79 |
puṇa puṇa ḍāka śuṇiṇa bīra phālaguni
śrībhmaje arjuna ye tīkṣamunā śara gheni | 80 |
prahāra karantā lokara pakā bhmaja hāṇi | 82 |
sātukira keśa lāgiacchi bhūrisarbaṁkara beni hāthe | 84 |
sātuki bāma hātharu bāḷa chaḍāi pakāi
ḍāhāṇa karu dhatikāre khaḍaga ghenilā cchināi | 85 |
dhāmaiṁ satuki ye bitrama siṁha jāṇi
keśara bhūa madhye yāiṁ bheṭilā catrapāṇi | 88 |
lg.note: –śrīhariṁka bacane se bīra phālaguni<lb/>śrībhmaje pārthiba manabhedī bāṇa gheni |(ṅa, ña, tha)
–kehu kāhāre prahāra karucchi baḷe |(tha, ña, ṅa, gha, jha)
–rahiacchi kaḷebara rudhire cakauti buḍi |(ga, ca, ja, ña)

lg.l: ẏekasare ailu kimpe tu ṭhākuranta upekṣi | 89 |
yujheṣṭhi deba bisarile tohora śaṁkha śabade | 90 |
pañchu janya śaṁkha yahuṁ na śubhilā debabādya
mote āgyāṁ dile puṇa sannidhyeṇa rāi
ki abā arjuna mora jībaneṇa nāhīṁ | 92 |
yāa tu sātuki bheṭa kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni
śubhāśubha bāratā bābu āsa bege gheni | 93 |
gobinde boile tote kehi nāhīṁ sākhā
droṇa aśastamā jiṇi ailu kenhe ẏekā | 95 |
āsante bhūrisarba mote kale baḍa śāsti | 97 |
tumbhara nāma dhari hari uñche ḍākili muhiṁ hāde | 98 |
sehi kaṭāra gheniṇa muṁ chedili tāṁka śira | 100 |

lg.note: –keśara bhūẏe tu bheṭa kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni |(ṅa, tha, ña)
lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile ho śuṇa tu arjuna
kimbhūta kāraṇe trodha basilā tora mana | 102 |
kimbhūta kāraṇe yujheṣṭhi ārambhile ẏeḍe yuddha
dharma tejyā kari bandhu sodaranta kali badha | 104 |
bahuta trodha se ye kalāka sarbasācī
gobinde boile ẏetebeḷe bichāra nohe kichi | 105 |
anta kaḷanā na galā kurubaḷa saina | 106 |
āpaṇe biartha hoi kuṭumbha kāhiṁ loḍi | 107 |
pāñchajanya śaṁkha śabada kale deba ṭāṇi | 108 |
pure sādhu sādhu dhuni utsaba karanti sakaḷa jana | 112 |
arjuna sātuki ye hoile beni rathī

lg.note: –biṣāda hoi basithile dharmara nandana<lb/>kr̥ṣṇara śaṁkha śabada ye śubhilā śrabaṇa |(tha, ña, ṅa)

lg.l: birathī hoiṇa karṇṇa karai śara br̥ṣṭi
āreka ratha upare dhatikāre yāiṁ uṭhi | 116 |
dhanu ādhāna kare bijuḷi teja jāṇi
śara baraṣai ye kakaḍā māsa pāṇi jāṇi | 117 |
sahasre nārāja ye peṣila rādhebara tanu | 118 |
phuṭanti loṭanti uṭhanti tuṭanti bīre paḍanti mohagate
ratha gaja pādānti yoddhāẏe hoile benikhaṇḍa
he budhajane asaṁkhya ẏe mahābhāratha samara
anta kari lekhibāku sakhya ye kāhāra | 122 |
parama sādhebīki ye mama mane icchi | 123 |
samara karante ye cauda ghaḍi beḷā
abheda mahabhūa ye na yāi saṁkhoḷā | 124 |

lg.note: –śara br̥ṣṭighāte ye na diśai (?) |(ña, dha, gha, ja)

lg.l: bābu cauda ghaḍi ye ẏebe hoilā dinakara | 126 |
arjuna naśayiba ābara beni ghaḍire jadyarathaku na māile | 127 |
pratagyāṁ sārthuka se ye kaicchā jagajeṭhī
ābara pātha ki mohora āsiba leuṭi | 128 |
yā yā brikodarare dekha yahiṁ achanti kr̥ṣṇa pātha
adharma yuddha kari jadyarathaku māṛu se sarbathā | 130 |
yemanta kāryya hoi tonta karantu śrībatsi
śatr̥ nibāraṇe karu hāde se sāṁgrāma
dibasahiṁ heu ki abā rātrahiṁ se heu
samare heḷā na kari pātha śatr̥ kṣaẏe yāu | 133 |
lohamaẏa ratha sājai ye jaẏasena sārathi | 135 |
yesane prātakāḷe aruṇa āditya ratha sāji
jaẏa durga sumara bije bīra rathe

div.note: –bābu traẏodaśa ghaḍi ye ẏebe hoilā dinakara |(ña, gha, ḍa, ta, ja, dha)

lg.l: kauroba baḷa dhvaṁsane caḷai ratha ati khare
miḷilā pāṇḍaba sohoḍa yāi bhūa prathama dvāre | 139 |
prathama dvāre tāhāṁkara tule tini marbhmata sanya | 140 |
rathara upare tāra brakodara bānā uḍi
chāgaḷa pale yenhe kṣepai matta brāgha
prathama dvāra jiṇi caḷai bhīma ratha
āge ogāḷile se guru uprodha upekṣi | 145 |
lohadaṇḍa dhanu dhari śara karai br̥ṣṭi dhāti | 148 |
droṇa peṣile kare amoha śara gheni | 149 |
se śaraku pratikaccha śara na jāṇai bhīmasenā
droṇaṁkara śare tāra ratha hoigalā cūnā | 150 |

div.note: –āge ogāḷile āsi dharma ye upekṣi |(kha, ña, ṅa, gha, ḍa, dha)
–bhīmasena āsanteṇa ogāḷile dūruṁ |(tha, ña, ṅa, jha, ta, ga)

lg.l: saṁjībanī nātha ki ẏe bijekale yama | 152 |
re re kāra śabada kari brikodara uṭhi
dhāiṁṇa māruti droṇaṁkara rathe gadābara piṭi | 153 |
gada paḍi droṇaṁkara ratha helā cūnā | 154 |
puṇa gada prahāra ye karai bīra bhīma
droṇaṁkara saṁge thile pañcha ahibrata rathī
bhaẏeṇa yoddhāẏe kehi na rahile chamure | 157 |
bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā bulāi beni hāthe
yoddhā ke chamurerahiba kāḷebara rūpa dekhante | 162 |

div.note: –naẏana bhramai kāḷacatra prāẏe |(bahu pāṭha)
–r̥dhire bilepana diśai pabana tanaẏe |(kha, na, jha)
–yoddhā ke chamure rahiba kāḷebara gadā dekhante |(ṭa, kha, na, dha)

lg.l: saini bhaṁgāṇa dekhi śalalya ābara kr̥pe
śate śate beḷa prahāra karanti nārāja
bhīmasena bajra aṅge paḍi samasta hoanti dahija | 168 |
giribare paḍi yehne kṣudra pathare honti cūnā
beḷa uchura dekhi bhīmasena bege uṭhi
śakaṭa bhūa bhedi se padmabhūẏe paśai
gahaḷa dhandoḷa ghāẏe na diśai bāṭa | 174 |

div.note: –sanyara gahaḷe paśiyibāku nāhiṁ bāṭa |(tha, ña, ṭha)

lg.l: gadā mudugara chela catra kunta yāṭhi
praḷaẏa agni jāṇi diśai cakṣu beni
medamedā māṁse karddana karai bhīma ẏekajaṇe | 179 |
asthi māṁsa ādikari samasta honti dhūḷi
rakha rakha pāṇḍabe boli pāḍanti boboḷi | 182 |
gaḷāre kuṭhāra kehu tiraṇa dhari dante
samare nisate ke rahiṇa śara binddha
daśa biṁśa pañchāśa kehu śara sanddha | 184 |
śaraṇa boile duguṇa goḍāi karai prahāra | 185 |
piti piṭi kauroba baḷa kalā anta

div.note: –praḷaẏa āditya jāṇi diśai cakṣu beni |(cha, ṅa, tha)
–pañchama bhūa dvāre ṭekilāka āṇi |(ṅa, tha, ṭa)

lg.l: keśara bhūa bhitare aneka samara karai bīra karṇṇa | 189 |
śrībhmaje śobhābana dhanuẏeka kodaṇḍa sārikṣeṇa jāṇi
śyāmaḷa meghe yenhe bijuḷi trāsa diśi
karṇṇakaiṁ dekhi se arjune badaẏanti debahari
bhūa jaẏa karibā yebe karṇṇakaiṁ jiṇipāri | 193 |
dekha ho arjuna karṇṇa uprodha upekṣi | 198 |
ẏekā prahārake arjuna ahibrateka bāṇa gheni | 199 |

div.note: –karṇṇara rathe ye bikarṇṇa sārathi |(ta, kha)
–yocilā haẏabara ye śārddūḷa mūrati |(kha, na, ṭha, jha)
–madhyāhna kāḷe yehne gagane dinamaṇi |(ña, ṅa, tha, ja)
–dhārmika bibekī bāṇa bindhai nirmitā |(kha, na)
–bhāratha madhye yāhāra asañchepa kathā |(ṅa, ña)

lg.l: bajramunā bāṇa pātha sahasre puṇa binddha | 200 |
mahāanaḷa jāḷā jāṇi karṇṇara ratha prācī | 201 |
hāboḍā śara bāji karṇṇara ratha bhāñji | 203 |
nirghāta bāṇa puṇa bindhai karṇṇa mahārathī
