arjuna binddhala bajra mudugara bāṇa dhari
puṇa āreka ratha ārohiṇa bīra karṇṇa
puṇa puṇa birathī hoi na pāu tu lāja
yā yā apasari tote maraṇa nāhīṁ āja | 208 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ kariacchi pātha jadyaratha nimante
nohile ki karṇṇa āja yāāntu jībante | 209 |
ẏete boli deba ye bege bāhānti turaṁga
dekhile mānagobinda rājāra saṅge aneśvata bhāi

div.note: –kāḷānaḷa jāṇi karṇṇa rathakaiṁ grāsi |(ga, ca)

lg.l: 211|2–aḷambuṣa, aḷāẏudha asure beni chanti rahi |(ña, tha, ṭa)
mahārāṣṭra bhopāḷa trihetrī bikhāta deśa uḍaṅga baṅgāḷa maṇḍaḷa | 213 |
dekha hāde ẏe dvāre rahiachanti mānagobinda rāẏe | 216 |
sandhu rājā jadyarathara ta cinhabarṇṇa nāhiṁ | 217 |
ẏe śakaṭa bhūa bhedibā deba bahuta dustara | 218 |
śate pakhuḍā antare keśara bhūẏeka rañchilā | 219 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇe boile muṁ bāhuthibi haẏe chāri
ripu bināśane pātha daẏā uprodha kicchi nāhiṁ | 223 |
lg.note: –trihotrī bicchatra deśa uḍaṅga maṇḍaḷa |(dha, jha, gha, ḍa)
–aśisasra mukuṭabandha yoddhā mānagobindara tule<lb/>keśara bhūa ābori samaste rahile |(tha, ña, ta)

lg.l: kiñchita kari bīra śateka bāṇa gheni | 224 |
caḷante nārāje diśanti juḷujaḷā poka prāẏe | 225 |
lāghaba yuddheṇa se paḍile aneka yodhī
puṇa puṇa arjuna ātreṣi bāṇa binddha | 227 |
mānagobinda āgyāṁ dile samasta yoddhānta rāi
ẏeke ẏeke ẏehāṁkuta jiṇantā kehi nāhiṁ | 228 |
dharma adharma boli kehi bichāra na kara
daśabiṁśa tiriśa pūroi beḍhiṇa samaste śara binddha | 230 |
gaja aśva yoddhā pādānti paḍile sarbe mahīloṭi | 234 |
romeke nārāja se bindhai ati bege | 235 |
ṭhābaru na caḷai se sehiṭhāre loṭi | 236 |
bahuta yuddha se ye karai ẏekasare
āho caitana ẏemantara samaẏe pāṇṭababīra bhīmā
āreka kare gāntima samāne ẏeka dhanu
trijībī bara māgilā se sebiṇa kāpāḷī | 241 |
debatāṁka samaraku se na karai gaṇanā | 242 |
teṇukari mukuṭa tāku na bānddhalā kururāẏe | 243 |
hākanti gurusuta bhīmāre āja hoilu nirekha | 244 |
dhuśāsana durjaẏe prāẏe ki mote bujhu
ẏe mahābhāratha yuddha tu ẏekā kenhe yujhu | 245 |
lg.note: –“āreka arjuna ki paśilā samare |” pādāṁśa pare “cha” re adhikā pāṭha :–
lg.l: aśastamāra bacana śuṇi śarīra kampāi bhīma
kāḷebara bulāi rathe prahāra kalā āṇi | 250 |
gadā paḍante aśastamāra ratha hoigalā masīguṇḍā | 251 |
rāge bhīmasenaku prahāra kala amoha śakati | 252 |
ghāẏeṇa birathī se ye pabana ātmaja | 253 |
bhīmasena bāma aṅge padi hoilā masīguṇḍā | 258 |
bhīmasena aṁge paḍi guruja guṇḍā uṭhi | 259 |
bhīmasena boilā tu prahāra kalu puṇa puṇi
guruputra boli muṁ ye apāra sahili
jyeṣṭha bhrāṭha boli muṁ ye lāgheba yuddha kali | 263 |
āho caitana utapāta kāḷe yenhe paḍai nirghāta
bhīmasena boilā ẏebe sustheṇa śoithāa bhāi
guruṁka jyeṣṭhaputra biśeṣe brāhmaṇa tote mārita na yogāi | 266 |
padmabhūẏe paśila brikodara kari jaẏe jaẏe raḍi | 267 |
ratha gaja aśva ye saini paḍante
asaṁkhya kurusāgare bhīmasena bhedai ẏeka rathe | 268 |
ratha gaja aśva yoddhā paḍanteṇa dr̥ṣṭi
yeteka uburai tāhā bhīmasena goḍāiṇa piṭi | 270 |
bhīmasena chamure ke samare rahite śakatā | 272 |
lg.note: –ye abā rathī acchi bhīmasena tāhā bheṭi |(ṭa, cha, ja)

lg.l: bhāñjanteṇa saini ye karṇṇa tāhā dekhi | 275 |
karṇṇara nārāja paḍante se pātilā bāmaaṁga
rādhebaṁka bāṇa paḍi hoilā sarba bhaṁga | 278 |
puṇa ādhāna kalā se rādhebara baḷā
tīkṣa nārāja gheniṇa se chedilā tatakṣaṇānti | 280 |
ārdrābaḷī gadā gheni bhīmasena rathe piṭi | 281 |
karṇṇara rathe nei kāḷebara gadā piṭi | 284 |

lg.note: –bhāñjiṇa karṇṇa ratha hoilāka padā |(ṭha, na, kha, ga, ca)
lg.l: puṇihiṁ āreka ye karṇṇa ārohila ratha
bhīmakaiṁ aneka nārāja bindhai radhebara suta | 286 |
sūcīmunā bāṇa se ye māilāka pāñcha
rome rome rudhira bahai ye gaḷi
puṇa ratheka caḍhi karṇṇa āborilā raṇa | 290 |
beni sahodre se ye aṭanti abhada
gadābara bighāte karṇṇa ratha galā bhāñji | 294 |
bhīmasena upareku kopeṇa śara kalā br̥ṣṭi | 296 |
katuri nārājeka bhīmasena bīra bindhai ṭāṇi

lg.note: –samara sambharbaye kahita ki pāri |(gha, tha, cha, jha)
lg.l: rāgeṇa karṇṇa chāhaṁi rakata kumuda dr̥ṣṭi
rome rome rudhira ye gaḷita brikodara | 300 |
re re pāntabā tora āja ghenimaiṁ prāṇa | 303 |
kauroba sāgara boli na jāṇu kire bhīmā
samasta yoddhā ẏethi ẏeku āreka baḍimā | 304 |
pacchima diga rājānta jiṇimā prāẏe bujhu
ẏe kurusāgare paśu tu ẏekā kemanta yujhu | 305 |
bhūa bhedi najāṇu re prāṇe nāśa yibu
harihara brahmā indra kubera āja tote ke rakhu
śarīra rakṣā hoi kire kāḷa garaḷa bhakṣu | 307 |
āre kr̥tānteka hāthe ẏebe paḍilā tora keśa
dusaha pratagyāṁ karai karṇṇa bhīmasenara keśa dhari
bāmakare keśa ḍāhāṇa kare khaḍaga ubhāri | 309 |
keśarī kṣepante kisa tāra bīra mūrtti | 311 |
byāghrara chamure ye kisa tāra baḷa | 312 |
se kisa rahi pārai mañjārī chamure | 313 |
ẏekā jadyaratha nāme dilu tu dūsaṇa | 316 |
sarbadā mithyā kahi bratanti yebaṇa prāṇī
satyabanta lokaṁku kahilure asada ye bāṭa
re re bhīmasena āja pūrilā tora kāḷa | 319 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa ẏe tini bhmabane
sura nara nāgaloka ke rakhu tinijaṇe | 320 |
ājhuṁ ẏe pañchu kaṭake mānagobinda catrabratī
sumarare bhīmā tora iṣṭa ye debatā

lg.note: –aneka prākarma ye karanti chagaḷe<lb/>ubhā hoiba ki sehi mañjārī chamure |(ṭha, na, kha, jha)

lg.l: tāhā ye mātā prārthanā karithile pūrbe
gyāna thāuṁ thāuṁ tāhā laṁghibi kesane mattagarbe | 325 |
paḷā yāre bhīmā kaha yā śrīkr̥ṣṇa pāthaku
ārabeḷe na paśibuṭi re mahābhāratha samaraku | 326 |
jyeṣṭhabhrātha sama pitā boliṇa tote kalaiṁ uprodha
nirāpakṣa sāṁgrame tu ki jiṇilu mote yuddha | 329 |
prāṇe na māri muṁ pāḷili sahodra | 330 |
kointāṁkara jyeṣṭhaputra boli muṁ samare pāḷai dharma
mātāṁka trodha hoiba boli tote rakhai sāṁgrāma | 331 |
karṇṇa boilā re yāhā upekṣā kali raṇe
mātā bākya na meṇṭiṇa chaḍili to keśa
puṇi yuddha kale mora dharma yiba nāśa | 334 |
ratnagiri parbata jāṇi bikāśai tāra kāẏe | 335 |
bhaẏeṇa galā karṇṇa se dvāra upekṣi | 336 |
lg.note: –śataśr̥ṅga sumari bhīma uṭhai gaḷagāji | ṭha, na, kha (apapāṭha)
lg.l: samasta yoddhāẏe dekhi bhaẏe paḷāile bhañji
karṇṇara āgare se aneka yoddhā māri
keśara bhitare se mārai aneka saini
rathare thai pārtha bhīmaku hoilā pariṇāmi
yujheṣṭhi debe bikaḷa huanti beḷa udyāna jāṇi | 344 |
muhiṁ aili kuśaḷa bāratā nemāra nimante | 345 |
āho caitana kr̥ṣṇa arjuna bhīmasena sātuki
brahmā rudra indra gobinda bijaẏe kale ki ẏethiki | 346 |
ki aja samara kari jiṇimāka roḷe | 347 |

lg.note: –ẏekā pāṇḍabake kurusanya kalā naṣṭa |(kha, ṭha, na)
–yujheṣṭhi debe bikaḷa huanti beḷa abasāni |(ṭa, na, kha)
–muhiṁ aili kuśaḷa bāratā jāṇimā nimante |(ṭa, dha, ṅa)

lg.l: paśāra bhitare hāde jadyaratha acchi luci | 349 |
ẏe bhūa bhedibāku tuhi se śakatā | 350 |
bhīmasena boile bābu tuhi se praḷaẏa antakārī
ādi madhya abasāne tuhi se sarba pheri | 351 |
jāta madhya abasāne tuhi se sarba bujhu
bhārā bināśana puruṣa tu samasta ātmare paśi yujhu | 352 |
sarbadā ẏekabhūta deba to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ
jaḷa sthaḷa pātāḷe tote dekhi sarbathāiṁ | 353 |
sarjana janaṁkara nātha tuhi se aṭu bandhu | 354 |
brahmakṣetrī baiśya śūdra chāṇḍāḷa sarba ẏekā
dusaha sāgara tāribāku tuhi se naukā | 355 |
mana bacana karttabye bhābili muhiṁ yāha
praḷaẏa anta nātha kr̥ṣṇahiṁ mote sāhā | 356 |
samaẏe asamaẏe yebe durgati dukha pāi
kāḷa akāḷa dharma artha kāma mokṣa
kāḷadaṇḍa nibāraṇa natha tuhi se pratakṣa | 358 |

div.note: –sarbajana sodara tu dukhījana bandhu |(gha, jha, ṅa)
–beṇī–beṇu arthare byabahr̥ta |

lg.l: hr̥dagate cintibi svāmī tohora śaṅkhacatra cihna | 362 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe loṭi | 364 |
āho caitana keśara bhūẏe yeteka rājāmāne thile
aneka śahasra gheni āsi arjunakaiṁ ogāḷile | 365 |
padmeka ratha tule pāñchapadma gaja aśva tinisāgara | 371 |

div.note: –śate bhrātha gheniṇa nr̥pati dhr̥tarāṣṭi |(ṭa, dha, jha)

lg.l: atianta gahaḷa thāṭha kehu pāribāka kaḷi
yojaneka bistāra se keśara bhūa aguḷi | 376 |
he budhajana śrīmahābhāratha kathā parimāṇi bujha
āṣya dhana putra kalyāṇa hoi br̥ddhi
agāda sāgara ẏe kaḷibāku mora kisda br̥ddhi | 378 |
saẏaḷa jane napuṇa na bujhanti gahana lekhante | 379 |
teṇu kahili muhiṁ ṭhika ṭhika bākye
siddha sāroḷā prasanne mote nihai asakhye | 380 |
abagata bākye se bañchāi dianti mote | 381 |
nikaṭe śāsana nāhiṁ na basili purāṇikaṁka tule | 383 |
śāstra pāṭha paṛhināhiṁ muṁ kāhāri tule
doṣa na dhariba mora ẏethi doṣa thile | 384 |
na kalaiṁ prārthanā muṁ na kalaiṁ sebā
adabhūte āgyāṁ dile tu śrīmahābharata kahibā | 386 |

div.note: –sabu sañchapi sāraḷā kahibāru mote<lb/>lekhuacchi tāhā muṁ sasaẏaḷa jana hite |(kha, na)
–janme pāṭha siddha nāhiṁ mora bhale |(jha, dha)

lg.l: śibapurāṇa mantrī nārada purāṇa ḍagara saṁjāta | 387 |
ẏe chāripurāṇa mukhyakari aṣṭādaśa purāṇa boli
ẏeteka bikhyāta karibāku muhiṁ se āgyāṁ pāli | 388 |
śrī caṇḍī sāroḷa debīṁkara bhr̥tyara muṁ bhr̥tya
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa bhābanti śrī tuḷusāra ballabha hr̥dagata | 389 | [2765 + 389 = 3154]

div.head: {@jaẏadratha badha@}

lg.l: lekhante anta ke kariba agāda sāgara | 1 |
samara sambharba ye na sarai kahante
ke śate duiśata chāriśata śahasra ahibrate
samasta śahasramāna paḍiṇa huanti ye bhaṅga | 6 |
yesaneke giribare kṣudra pathare paḍi honti cūnā
yoddhāṁkara śahasraku bhīma na karai gaṇanā | 7 |
ratha chaḍi brikodara ḍeiṁ paḍilāka bega
nirjība hoiṇa ye paḍile sarba thāṭha
mr̥tupiṇḍa loṭante gahale na diśilā bāṭa | 14 |
arddha ākāśa pariyante hoicchi śara br̥ṣṭi

div.note: –‘piṭante kaurobabaḷa samasta kalā padā’ ẏe pādāṁśa pare ‘ṭha’ re adhika pāṭha acchi :–
nārāja bindhante diga diśai andhāra
nirbhaẏare yuddhakare bāsaba kumara |
svabhābe pārtha aṭanti mahā dhanurddhara
tāṁka astre astra māri kari dyanti cūra |
–abasāna kāḷa beḷa hoi pañchadaśa ghaṭi |(ṅa, dha, cha)

lg.l: gobinda boile kiho tote diśucchi ki jadyaratha | 19 |
sūcībhūa bheda mote na diśai kicchi | 20 |
tu deba catrare sabunit pāru māri
gobinde boile muṁ rāma pāda dhari karicchi niẏama
kebaḷa rāma kopakaiṁ muṁ sarbadā ḍarai | 24 |
hanumāna boilā deba bichāra tora mane
hanumanta boilā deba tohora mohora saṁpakṣe pāṇḍabe gale nāśa

div.note: –tebe abā kauroba nirṇṇe kari |(jha, ṛa)
–“ābara jībane āmbhara pirojama kisa” ẏehi pādāṁśa pūrbaru “ga” re adhikā pāṭha acchi |
mote diśanti ẏe pimpuḍi yūtha prāẏe
muthe prahāribi ki bolibā debarāẏe |
ẏekā muthakaru benimuthaku mo nāhiṁ
arjuna maraṇa ki muṁ naẏane dekhibaiṁ |
yetebeḷe pātha anaḷe paśiba yāiṁ
kaurobe āmbhaṁku chāhiṁ hoibe khatāi |
bolibe hari arjune hoithile sāhā
rakhi nuārile se anaḷe hele dāhā |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: tu deba ananta abatāra deba catrapāṇi
saẏaḷa anta karantā tu samasta parimāṇi | 27 |
arjunaku gocara nāhiṁ kāḷacatraku āgyāṁ dile debahari
boile āditya debatāku uhāḍa daṇḍa chāri | 29 |

div.note: (pūrba pr̥ṣṭhā pāṭhāntarara pāṭhāntara)
kahuṁ kahuṁ marutira baṛhilāka koha
bāte rambha jaṇiṇa se kampāilā deha |
kr̥ṣṇe bichārile mahābhāratha nohiba
aṭhara dinaku ẏekā muthake nāśiba |
muthe prahārile na sahiba basundharī
na jāṇimāpaṇe muṁ āṇili ḍākikari |
tathāpi se yāhā bole nohe anucita
sītā anugrahe bīra duje buddhimanta |
ẏe yāhā boilā taba mohora dekhante
deha dharibā ki pātha anaḷe paśante |
rathe thāiṁ hātha baḍhāile hanumāna
śrī maha bhāratha yuddha āja hoiba sampūrṇṇa |
ẏeteka bichāri mane śrī madhusūdana
boile prārthanā tote bīra hanumāna |
aṣṭādiśa dinaru niūna ba beśi hele
mahābhāratha nohiba tohora kopakale |
māruti boilā tumbhe śuṇa catrapāṇi
cintāmaṇi nātha tuho bujhibā parimāṇa |
hanumantara bacana śuṇi daẏānidhi
rañchile upāẏa svāmī catrakūṭa buddhi |

lg.l: kauroba thāṭhe ye śubhilā jaẏe jaẏe
samara rahu boli āgyāṁ dilā kururāẏe | 32 |
karṇṇa kr̥pa śalya samaste hoile pucchāpucchi | 35 |
hā hā arjuna boli kapāḷe kara dhinda | 37 |
āre droṇaṁkara mahiṁmā tuhita bhale jāṇu
jadyaratha charaku tu kalu ẏeḍe pratagyāṁ
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka bacana tu kalu ye apagyāṁ | 39 |
mānagobinda bolai tohora prāẏe kṣetrī maribu bināyuddhe
kr̥ṣṇa yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba bañchanti ki tohora trodhe | 40 |
citā āropaṇa kara yenhe mohora brata
paśibi hutāśane ẏe mohora satya satya | 42 |

div.note: –apagyāṁ–abijñā

lg.l: dibasa yāhāra aṭai tāhāra sinā rāti | 44 |
rātra samare yebe jadyarathakaiṁ badhakari nuāri
karibu anaḷe jhāsa ke tote nibāri | 46 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile ho śahasra gheni samara kara pātha
thāṭha nibartta kale āmbhe loḍibā jadyaratha | 47 |
sanya gheni sajahua samara karibā rāti | 48 |
kṣatrīhoi yebe na pāḷibāka nija dharma
yogīhoi yebe yoga se na sādhi
sargare ṭhāba nāhiṁṭi ẏete jaṇa ye lokanta | 53 |
tu ye pratagyāṁ kalu āditya astayāke yadi na mārai jadyaratha
sehi raṇa bhūmire agnijāḷi maribi ẏe mohora satya | 54 |

div.note: –chāribeda ṣaḍaśāstra lekhana kalā prajāpati |(ga, ca)
–saptāṁga pāñjire lekhana kalā prajāpati |(ja, kha)
–dharmabanta hoi yebe nirddoṣe daṇḍai prajāṁku |(ka, ña)

lg.l: kṣatrīṁkara bacana ye pāṣāṇa rehā jāṇi
indra debatā yebe madhyapura na pāḷiba | 57 |
sajjana jana hoi yebe debatā brāhmaṇe nohiba bhagata | 59 |
sampada thāuṁ yebe pitr̥ṁku karai nirāśa | 60 |
tirī hoi yebe nohiba patire bhagatā
dhanabant ahoi yebe atithe nohibe se dātā | 61 |
beda śāhāsra mithyā ta hoilā dāmbodara | 62 |
ke ẏehā laghiṁba ho jāta hoiṇa medinī | 63 |
tu se mohor asodara praśaṁsai phālaguni
kr̥ṣṇa bhīma sātuki trodha hāde abasthā
arjuna boile kehi mote nohile agnidyantā | 66 |
mr̥tyukāḷe kāṣṭha agni yehu nuhanti sakhā
kuṭumba madhyare tāku na karibaṭi lekhā | 67 |

div.note: –sampada thāuṁ yebe bandhu se dare karai nirāśa |(tha, ña)
mr̥tukāḷe agni debāku kehi nohanti sākhā<lb/>kutumba saṁge tāṁku na kariba lekhā |(ca, ja)

lg.l: kāṭha kuḍhāile āṇi yesane ucca parabata | 69 |
baikulye hoi dhāmanti sakaḷa kauroba saini | 70 |
trailokyara madhye arjunara mahiṁmā sādhu sādhu | 71 |
agnire dahana ye hāde houcchi dhanurjaẏe | 73 |
daśa sahasra rathī gheni sindhurājā bāhāra hoile | 75 |

div.note: –kṣaṇe mātra chahiṁthāu arjunara mukha |(kha, ca)
–“gobinde dekhile jadyarathara mūrati” sthānare “kha, na, tha”re adhikā pāṭha :–
aneka sānanda ye sindhurājā suta
kaurabaṁka saṁge ubhā hoi ānandita |
tatakṣaṇe arjuna ye dibyabeśa hoi
śrīphaḷa goṭiẏe nija kare ghenichaiṁ |
agnire paśiba boli bāsabara śiṣa
baiśvānara pāśe āsi hoilā prabeśa
lakṣeka mukutā kare gheni se prabeśa |
śrīkare śrīphaḷa gheni pātha bule bahni
paśibāku dr̥ṛhabrata kalā phālaguni |

lg.l: adabhmate maraṇa tu ye ailu kāhuṁ gheni | 77 |
dharma chaḍiṇa ye adharmakaiṁ kalu āśā
kāḷe bihantā puruṣe tumbhanta kaleka nirāśā | 79 |
kāḷe āṇi śāsti tote bihilāka yame | 80 |
śakuni boilā kr̥ṣṇa parā sārathi rathe thāuṁ thāuṁ
śakaṭa bhūa bhedi nuārila kimpe kehu | 82 |
akha caka bāṭe yebe bhedant aprathame
āpeṇe na jāṇilu nuārilu bhūa bhedi
śakuni boilā pratagyāṁ kalu ati utakarmapaṇe
dibārātra boli kiṁpe na boilu raṇe | 85 |
ẏehāra beḷe tumbhanta nohilā kicchi bhala | 86 |
bhīmasena boilā tu śahasra gheni pātha
muhiṁ ẏehākaiṁ piṭai kāḷebara gadā gheni | 88 |
arjuna boilā svāmī hoibā ki trijībī
dharma laghiṁṇa kathā ruhāibā ki pr̥thibi | 89 |

div.note: –āmbhanta mārioloḍu tu kebaṇa upāẏe |(kha, na, ṭa)
–marare pāṇḍabe akāḷa caḍaka paḍi |(kha, na, gha, jha)
–dibārātre boli kiṁpe na boilu baẏāṇe |(ṅa, tha)

lg.l: raṇe jaẏe sādhu sādhu huanā mohori | 90 |
āu kṣaṇe yebe āditya debatā thānte rahi
kūṭa kapaṭa nātha ẏehā bhiāilu ki śrībatsa | 95 |
gobinde boile śakuni jāṇilu āmbhara satya
gadābara dhari ye garjai bīra bhīmasena

div.note: –dinamaṇa thāuṁ yebe pāranti deba māri |(ga, dha, kha, na)
–raṇe sādhu sādhu dhuni śubhantā tinapurī |(ka, ña, ca, ga)
–arjunara mukha chāhiṁ hasile debarāja | ehā pare “gha” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
dekha dekha arjuna aṁśumāḷī
bhīmasenara mukhaku chāhānti banamaḷī |
śakuni chāhiṁlā bhīmasenara mukha
(?) bhiāichani śrībatsa |
–gobinde boile śakuni tu na jāṇu tadanta |(gha, ña)

lg.l: gobinde boile tuho śahasra dhara pātha
daśa śahasra yoddhā tule rahiachai jadyaratha | 100 |
mānagobinda boilā ẏe kapaṭa kūṭa kathā
muhiṁ ye pratagyāṁ kali ruṣimānanta basāi
binā yuddhe pāṇḍabanta bhūmi tiḷārddhe na diaiṁ | 103 |
aneka sanya sakhā paḍile bhāi durddakṣa chaḍigalā | 104 |
yadyapi samare paḍibe mora aṭhāṇoi bhrātha
tadyāpi sūcīmune bhūmi pāṇḍabanta na karai sanamata | 105 |
gobinde boile tohora mahiṁmā aṭai dhani
kebaṇa puṇyakṣaṇe tote jāta kalāka jananī | 106 |
āho mānagobinda nimantraṇa kari bhīmāku nela ye bhmañjāi
nāguṇī khāu boli jaḷe melidila bhīma | 108 |
nidrākāḷe pāṇḍabe marantu boli dela poḍi
prāṇa pāile se suranadīre yāiṁ paḍi | 111 |
āho mānagobinda nimantraṇa kari ye gāndhārasenaku āṇilu
pathara ghare mudi ye tāra kuṭumbha bandīkalu | 112 |

div.note: –grāmekahiṁ ki pāṇḍabanta karai sanamata |(ṭa, ṭha, na, kha, jha)
–niśākāḷe pāṇḍabe marantu boli dela poḍi |(ṭa, ṭha, na, kha)

lg.l: śaẏe pañchāṇoi tāra bandhu kuṭumba sahite
anna na dei māilu tote dharma sahiba kemante | 113 |
dharme bratilā ẏe keuṁṇa bāge śakuni
dharmabanta puruṣa tumbhe karṇṇa dhuśāsana tini | 114 |
catra bhitare na kala keuṁṇa kr̥tya
ke ratha bhāñjila re ka māila chārihaẏe
dhuśāsanakaiṁ rāi tu paṭhiāila ho rāẏe | 116 |
dhuśāsana gadā nei puṇa piṭilā tetebeḷe | 118 |
apāra dharma tumbhara kahile na sarai
putra kaṣṭa śuṇi arjuna kare gāṇḍima dhanu dharai | 120 |
pāthara dhanu dharante bhīmasena rāge uṭhi

div.note: –dharmabanta puruṣa tumbhe karṇṇa dhuśāsana śalya śakuni |
–“dharmabanta puruṣa tumbhe karṇṇa dhuśāsana tini” ẏei pātha pare “gha” re adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏehi śakuni ẏebe tumbhara mukha chāhiṁ
mantrīpaṇe tumbhara āsane basithāi |
–beḍhiṇa māila tumbhe ratha charihaẏe |(kha, na, ṭha)
–jaẏadratha nei gadā piṭilā bakṣasthaḷe |(ṭha, na, kha)
–adhare danta chāpi chāhaṁi naẏana tarāṭi |(ṭa, ṭha, na)

lg.l: driyodhana boilā beḷa acchi ẏeka ghaḍi
paḷāiṇa prāṇarakṣā kara yā yetedhūra pāri | 125 |
sanya sakhā tejyā kariṇa asambhāḷe sindhurāẏe
ratha gaja aśva teji paḷābai pāẏe | 126 |
keśa bāsa asambhāḷa kehu abā bāndhu | 127 |
bhīma sātuki ye goḍāi baḷa dhaṁsi

div.note: –“paḷāiṇa prāṇarakṣā kara yā yete dhūra pāri”:– ẏehi pāṭha pare “gha” re adhikā pāṭha :–
kāḷacatraku rāi āgyāṁ dileka debahari
dinakara nāthe daṇḍe thibu tuu ogāḷi |
aneka samara āja hiba mahāghora
na puṇa meru pr̥ṣṭhe lucai dinakara |
āgyāṁ pramaṇe kāḷacatra tatakṣaṇe caḷai
āditya debatā sannidhye miḷilāka yāiṁ |
sābadhana hoi tumbhe śuṇimā dinamaṇi
āgyāṁ dei achanti brahmānta śiromaṇi |
jadyaratha durānteka badha hebā yāẏe
daṇḍeka biśrami tumbhe thiba debarāẏe |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye gaganabihārī
sārathiki āgyāṁ dile ratha bāha dhīrakari |
bārata kahi kāḷacatra galā dhātikāre
praṇapatya kala yāiṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇa pādataḷe |
driyodhana bacana śuṇi sindhudeśa rāẏe
rathagaja tejyākari paḷāilā bhaẏe |

lg.l: arjuna ḍāka diai raha raha sindhu ādhipati
mr̥tukāḷe nisata hoile rahai ki jībati | 131 |
bhagnīra ballabha hoi tu paśilu samare
baṁśakaiṁ droha cintilu re bāḷuta apahāre | 132 |
āho caitana arjuna śahasra chaḍila yetebeḷe
svāmī samara karanteṇa āditya asta galā
dharma nandana śuṇi pāile baḍa kaṣṭi
nakuḷa sahadeba śīkhaṇḍi dhr̥ṣṭidyumana gheni dhāmanti yujheṣṭhi | 137 |
sindhu rājāra tule ye samara karai kirīṭī
yujheṣṭhi sulabha sarūpa dekhiṇa kr̥ṣṇa pātha

div.note: –sulabha śakuna ye dekhiṇa kr̥ṣṇapātha |(adhikāṁśa pothi)

lg.l: dhanu śasra nāhiṁ jadyaratha hoiacchi ubhā
śaraṇa pañjara bāna tohora kr̥ṣṇara bharasāẏe | 144 |
āho arjuna birathī hoile tu namāru bairi
biśahasra hoile tohora hr̥de daẏā dhari | 145 |
piṭhi dekhante na māru aṁguṣṭhi bhari mukha
birasa bhāba ye śatr̥ tāku napāru tohroa nāmaṭi bibatsa | 146 |
tohora jībadātā hoi muṁ thāi deha gheni
ājahuṁ tumbhara bhr̥tya muṁ jāṇa phālaguni | 147 |
āho dhanurjaẏe dropatī haraṇe mote kala sātabeṇṭi
beḷe beḷe muhiṁ tumbhara bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya seṭi | 148 |
mastake hātha dei bolai mote uddhari dhara pātha
arjuna boilā hari kāhiṁra nimante kalu āmbhe dvanda
āpaṇāra sampada nimante ye nāśanti bandhujana
paraloke abaśya huanti se narake patana | 151 |
śaraṇa rakṣākari ho āpaṇā prāṇa hāri | 152 |
ādihuṁ nisata ẏe tuki najāṇu bīra pātha
upāẏe kari āditya ẏe karāucchi asta | 153 |
tu yāiṁ agni reṇa paśibu yetebeḷe
pāṇḍabaṁṅka cihna barṇṇa na thoiba bhale | 154 |

div.note: –pāṇḍabaṁka cihnabarṇṇa thoibe ki bhmabitaḷe |(tha, gha)
–pāṇṭabaṁka cihnabarṇṇa na thoiba rabitaḷe |(ṅa, ta, ca)
–pāṇḍabaṁka cihnabarṇṇa na thoiba raṇagoḷe |(jha, ṭha)

lg.l: putra śatr̥ ẏehākaiṁ kṣaṇeheṁ na thoi
ẏehāku namāile naraka gati doṣa pāi | 155 |
kimbhūte mauna tu hoilu begeṇa śira cheda | 156 |
tohora pratagyaṁ nimante muṁ rakhiacchi ẏehā
samare badha karāila ẏe mohora bhagnajā
catre chedibaiṁ muṁ tu abaśya kale tejyā | 159 |
apāra marmabākya kahi arjunaku karāile kopī | 160 |
śuṇiṇa arjuna ye kare dhanu gheni
śara basānte ye kampilā bhmabana tini | 161 |
kandhare paḍiṇa śira bege pakāilā kāṭi | 162 |
kāndharu muṇḍa ye cchiḍi paḍilāka cchiti
puṇa khr̥pa nārāje pātha binddhalāka ṭāṇi

div.note: –apāra marmabākya kahi arjunaku karāile bairāgī |(bahu pothi)
–binddhalā phālaguni nārāja bhmajadaṇḍa<lb/>gaṇḍasthaḷe paḍi cchiḍilā jadyaratha muṇḍa |(adhikāṁśa pothi)
–puṇihiṁ āreka muṇḍa ye upujilā dhāti |(jha, ta)

lg.l: kebaṇa prastābe ẏehāku ẏeḍeka bara sañchi | 168 |
ẏethira tadanta deba achai muhiṁ jāṇi | 170 |
svāmī dropatī haraṇa ẏe kalā yetebeḷe
dr̥śilāra nimante ẏehāre beḷe saghaṁrile tame | 172 |
abhimāna kari ẏe na galā sindhu deśa

div.note: –‘bāhuḍi śira lāgilā jadyarathara kandha |’ sthānare ‘ṭa’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
puṇa paḍilā muṇḍa yāiṁ lāgilāka kandhe
ẏehimati arjuna chāribeḷa bindhe |
–dekhiṇa nārāja thambībhūta sarbasācī |(cha, ja)
–kebaṇa prastābe ẏehāra ẏeḍeka byagre kandha sañchi |(cha, ja, ta, ḍa)
–pāṇḍabaṁkara bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya boli lekhile kapāḷe |(ka, ṇa, tha, na, kha, ṅa, ga, ña)

lg.l: bara māga bara māga boli bolanti ye śūḷī | 177 |
sadāśibe boile re dusaha kalu bāñchā
pāṇḍabe airi pakṣa hoilu tu mohore nohu rakṣā | 180 |
samare jiṇimuṁ tu yujheṣṭhi bhīmasena nakuḷa sahaebaṁku
harihara brahmā indra sūryya kubera sahite
tahāra hāthe śiraccheda hoiba nice jāṇa | 184 |
jadyaratha boilā yebe deba hoilu prasanna
cchiḍante muṇḍa mora lāgiba puṇa puṇa | 185 |
īśvare boile nice lāgiba tora śira
tāhāra tapa karuthibā pariyante muṇḍa tora lāguthiba kandhare | 187 |

div.note: hara brahmā indra candra sūryya kubera sahite<lb/>kāhāri hāthe śiraccheda nohibaṭi tote |‘ṭha’
–tāhāra hāthe śiraccheda nohibu āpaṇa |(ka)
–kāhāra hāthe śiraccheda hoiba nice raṇa |(ṭa, ja, ta)

lg.l: jadyaratha boilā mote deba kahithibu sādhya
jāṇithibi nā muṁ kemante hoibaiṁ badha | 188 |
ye tote mr̥tyubheda hāde se pāṇḍaba kirīṭī | 189 |
ratha gaja aśva se caḍhiṇa na thiba
pādagati samara se to saṅge kariba | 190 |
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara indra chāriheṁ hoithibe manuṣyaa abatāra
sehi rūpe tohora saṅge karibe samara | 191 |
pinākī samāne dhanu tāhāra kare thiba | 192 |
mohor apāśupatra śare cchiḍiba tora śira
antarīkṣe muṇḍa yāiṁ paḍiba tohora pitāra hāthara | 193 |
adabhūte muṇḍa yāiṁ paḍiba pitāra hāthara | 194 |
bhmasma hou boli muṇḍa pakāiba bhūmigate
dahana hoiba muṇḍa ẏe mr̥tubheda tote | 195 |
ẏete bāge jadyaratha hoiba prāṇe nāśa | 196 |
brahmāra muṇḍa neiṇa biṣṇ rudhira dilā | 197 |
ẏe bidhi chāri digapāḷe arjuna ẏekakāẏe

div.note: –ye tote māriba se pāṇḍaba kīraṭī |(ka, ṇa)

lg.l: antarīkṣe paḍilā yāiṁ muṇḍa surathara hāthe | 203 |
teja anaḷa jāṇi muṇḍa uṭhilāka jaḷi | 205 |
kurubaḷa saini ye dekhi hoile bismaẏe

div.head: {@suratha rājāra tapasyā@}

lg.l: āho caitana bilaṁka deśara rājā baibasuta manu
pāda arghye pūjākalā ghaṭa ruṣiṁkara tanu | 1 |
śuṇiṇa āśrija hoili ta jadyarathara bāratā | 2 |

div.note: ẏemanta kahante mantrī pūrbaru bacana<lb/>tāhā śuṇi pāśupatra binddhalā arjuna |(kha, na)
bāẏibā śahasra gheni peṣilāka turita<lb/>antarīkṣe uḍi paḍilā suratha ruṣiṁkara hātha |(ka, ṇa, tha)

lg.l: pitā tāhāra ye kisa arthe tapī
yāhā tu pucchākalu biṣṇura laẏe śrotā | 5 |
ādihuṁ ẏehāra baṁśa nirmaḷa ratha yoge | 6 |
sāṁgrāma ratha boli ẏehāṁkara nija suta | 7 |
baḍāi pratāpī se sindhu deśa rājā
kubera samāne tāhāra aṭanti jana prajā | 14 |

div.note: –uttānapāda baṁśa ẏe aṭanti rathabarge |(dha, ña, cha, ga)
–grāmaratha boli ẏehāṁkara nija suta |(kha, dha, ña, na)
–ẏehāra nandana ye aṭai bhānuratha |(ṇa, dha)

lg.l: ẏe bidhire rājya kalā se dvāpara yuge
tinisahasra nabaśata baraṣa rājya kalā madhyasvarge | 17 |
ẏe surathara bhāriyā nāma aṭai kāntānī
gomata yuddhe nīḷāmbara tāhākaiṁ bhairobīku baḷidile | 19 |
bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā ẏe jāṇai sarbasiddha | 20 |
suratha mahārājā aṭai pākā ye gaḷita
tuḷamāsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa caturdaśī dina hoiba āmbhara pitr̥tithi | 25 |

div.note: –jadyaraa kr̥ṣṇaratha upujile putra beni |(ta, tha, na, kha)
kāntanī nāma aṭai bhāriyā ẏehāri<lb/>jadyaratha dāsaratha bairatha suraratha upujile putrachāri |(ca, cha, ña)

lg.l: jadyaratha boilā muṁ na cihnai gaṇḍājība
pitā boilā tu mantrīki niasi se tote gaṇḍā cihnaiba | 27 |
jadyaratha boilā gaṇḍā na pāile loḍi
āna jība yogāiṭi ki mr̥ga ye mr̥gāri | 28 |
suratha prohita ye sudeba nāme brāhuṇa
se boile bābu āji jība māriāṇa | 29 |
manara saṁtoṣe na pāile gaṇḍā bane heri
athabā śrāddha karibā meṣa chagaḷanta māri | 31 |
ẏemāna na pāi yebe pāiba hariṇa barehā
suratha boilā ẏemāna yogāiṭ ki yugate
sudeba paṇḍā boile citta śuddhe dei pitr̥kāryya arthe | 33 |
suratha boilā yebe ẏemanta ho aṭai
muhiṁ saṁprate yibi mote dekhāni śāstra bāṭai | 34 |
sudeba paṇḍā boile ẏe satyayugara bāratā
parbateka acchi nadīra tīre maṇikarṇṇikā boli
se giri upare rutuparṇṇa nāmeṇa śabarara pallī | 37 |

div.note: –parbateka acchi nadīra tīre maṇibhadrā boli |(tha, ṭa)
–se giri upare rutukā nāmeṇa śabara pallī |(ṇa, ṭa, tha)

lg.l: se rutuparṇṇara putra jaritā nāmeṇa byādha
se jaritā byādhara nāma kiraṇa parāẏudha | 38 |
se byādhara tahuṁ upujile beniye tanu
ẏeka nāma hariṇa āreka nāme hanu | 39 |
tanu, bhānu, mūrtti, surānta, kṣiti, rīti, śānti ẏemanta sāta tanaẏe | 40 |
gaṇḍājība māriāṇa boli āgyāṁ dilāka hanu | 41 |
mr̥ga śaẏambara barehā se na pāile loḍi | 43 |
dibarātra loḍi na pāile hanura sātapoẏe
bāhuḍi āsantedekhile bāṭare ṣaṇa(?) ye goṭiẏe | 44 |
rīti nāme byāha boilā bāhuḍi yāānte āja
kirāta śabara mahlāra byādha beṇṭakāra āmbhara kuḷaku baḍa lāja | 45 |
chāla pakāi chāla māẏeṁsa gheni yibā | 46 |
āmbhe na kahibā pitā na jāṇima ẏe māṁsa goru
ẏehā gheniṇa pitā pache pitr̥kāryya karu | 47 |
yatana kari byādha thoilā tāhā pallī
pitr̥ śrāddha patre bāḍhilā gaṇḍā māṁẏesa boli | 50 |

div.note: –se rutuparṇṇara putra jaṭita nāmeṇa byādha |(cha, ḍa, ga)
–jāẏe–jāta hebā |

lg.l: nāśakara boile ẏe ṣaṇa(?) badhakale ẏehānta jātakara narakeṇa | 52 |
citta śuddhakari ẏe bāḍhile nei māẏeṁsa
ẏehānt ana lāgilā gohatyā hāde pāpadoṣa | 55 |
ẏesanaka bichāra hoilā dharma ye purāṇe
se sapata byādhe nakṣatra sātagoṭi hoi basile tārāgaṇe | 56 |
āho suratha putra pratakṣe tārāgaṇe muṁ dekhili
janma janmāntare tāku śrīkhaṭa(?) ye hāde boli | 57 |
se māṁsa rānddha bāḍhilā nahu byādhara banitā | 58 |
sehu nakṣatra hoi ude hoilāka svarge
pitr̥ kāryyara phaḷaśr̥ti kahili tora āge | 59 |
āho caitana jadyaratha prohitaṁka bacana śuṇi
gaṇḍā jībagoṭi loḍi kāhuṁ na pāilā bacana
mantrīki gheni jadyarathe paśilā yāi gahana bipunye | 61 |

div.note: –nāśakara boile ẏe ṣaṇa(?) badhakale ẏehānta pakāa rauraba narkeṇa |(ca, jha)
–śikha khaṭa, śikhaṇḍi, śikha, śrikhaṭaja, śrīkhaṭi(?)

lg.l: bāmakare keśa dhariṇa ḍāhāṇa kare khaḍaga jhuṇi
boilā iṣṭadebatā sumara mantrī tote pakāibi hāṇi | 63 |
mantrī boilā muṁ kalāi kebaṇa ye doṣa
tohore śaraṇa mote nakara prāṇe nāśa | 64 |
baḷa bapu thāu muṁ rājyaku kalāiṁ bada sadha | 65 |

div.note: –śrameṇa basilā belabr̥kṣara taḷe |(ṭa, ṇa, tha)
–baḷabapu kāḷe muṁ rājyaku karai śraddhā |(jha, ṇa)
–“baḷabapu thāu muṁ rājyaku kalāiṁ baḍa sadha” ẏehi pāṭhapare ‘ṭa’re bhinma pāṭha :–
mantrī boilā satya muṁ karai tora pāśa
rājānta kahi tote muṁ diāibi rājyaghoṣa |
ẏemante duijaṇaṁkara hoilā bichāra
beṇṭa pāridhi ye karanti apāra |
gaṇḍā śaẏembara mr̥ga ye hariṇa
rājyare prabeśa hoile ghenāiṇa |
śikāra dekhi suratha rājā haraṣa hoilā
purohitaṁku ḍakāiṇa ye pitaśrāddha kalā |
ẏemante galā tahiṁ keteheṁ kāḷai
nityeheṁ mantrī ye cittare bhāḷai |
dineka jadyaradha mantrīki pachārilā
yāhā pūrbe satyakala se ki pāsora hoilā |
mohora baḍa udabega ye houacchi citta
surathaku māri muṁ ye dharāibi chatra |
mantrī boilā tumbhe sambhāḷa kumara
yāha kahiacchi tāhā karibi nikara |

lg.l: tu mantrī paṇḍita bhūta bhabiṣyara gyāṁtā
kimpe bichāra na karuchu mora hr̥daẏara baḍa bathā | 66 |
tu ẏebe pitākaiṁ mora kara prāṇe nāśa
rājā kariṇa mote samarpa mohora deśa | 67 |
mantrī satyakari boila chaḍa mora bāḷa
rājyaku yebe icchā kiṁpe na kahu ẏetekāḷa | 68 |
muhiṁ mantrī mora kuḷaku kaṁḷaka lāgai
tohroa pitāku māri tote rājya debaiṁ | 69 |
śrāddhakāḷe pitākaiṁ muṁ karibi prāṇe nāśa | 70 |
piṇḍadāna sāri sūryyaṁku arghya debāra beḷe
hāṇibi khaḍāge muhiṁ sāhāpakṣa hoibu tetebeḷe | 71 |
āsi prabeśa hoile ye yāhāra pura | 72 |
beṇṭa binode mora putra keḍe sāmaratha | 73 |
gaṇḍājība mantrī kiṁpe na āṇilu dhari
kicchi na bheṭilu gaṇḍā śaẏembara mr̥ga ki mr̥gāri | 74 |
rājāra mukha chāhiṁ karai mantrī trodha
gaṇḍā na pāile āna jībe ki heba śrāddha | 75 |
mantrī boilā rājā tora putra hoilāka br̥ddhā
tote bhaẏe kahai tāra rājyaku baḍa śraddhā | 76 |
jadyarathakaiṁ rājya dei tu huasi tīrthabāsī
kisa arajibi rājā muṁ tote bināśi | 77 |
samaẏe britithāa rājā yete āiṣa acchi tote | 78 |
sindhu deśa chaḍi paśila śriẏā ye maṇḍaḷe | 79 |

div.note: –sindhu deśa chaḍi paḷāi paśila banasta maṇḍaḷe |(ca, cha)

lg.l: jadyarathaku bhaẏekari tapa karai gaṁgākūḷe suratha nr̥pati | 81 |
tāhāra mukha na chāhīṁbi boli cakṣubuji basila nirāśe | 82 |
talaẏe beḷe tāra rājyakathā manare paḍilā | 83 |
mohora baikule jadyaratha re kaṭāyāu tohora mukha ye paṁkaja | 84 |
suratha maharuṣira ẏesaneka hr̥da dahijara beḷe
jaẏatu kāntānī go jaẏa sarba maṅgaḷe
kamaḷamāḷā ẏeka hoi tu biśrāma mohora bakṣasthaḷe | 87 |
kṣaṇake kopamūrtti go kṣaṇake tu srāgi | 90 |
śirī sampada miḷai go tohora parasāde
śrī mahābhāratha go bikāśu mama hr̥de | 91 |
he budhajane śirī sampada mohora siddha saroḷe
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa tuḷusāra bakṣasthaḷe | 92 |
svāmī jātaanaḷa prāṇa teja baśyānara piṁgaḷa jvāḷā
barṇṇānaḷa troṭānaḷa dābānaḷa madhy ye piṁgaḷā | 97 |
ẏe dvādaśa bahati to mathaẏe jaṭa jūṭe lambanti | 98 |
durāpada khaṇḍaṇa nātha nāśakara darpa bhāṅgi | 100 |
bhūta bhabiṣya bratamāna adr̥śya yāhāra bhābi
svāmī naraka nistāraṇa nārāẏaṇa yāhāra dhyāẏe
adabhūta sākāra nātha akāḷa akāma abhaẏe | 102 |

div.note: –bighna biṇāẏaka dhārmika kandapa |(ṇa, ṭa)
–nara nārakā bidāraṇe yāhāra kāẏe |(ca)
–adabhūta sākāra nātha kāḷa kāma bhaẏe |(ca)

lg.l: svāmī sodara bibādeṇa danta yāhāra bhañjā
svāmī andheka badha kariṇa āsante biśvabāsī
dvāra nirodhilu haranta na dilu tuhi paśi | 106 |
se tohora śira kalāka hāde grāsa | 108 |
ẏe tohroa putra boli na cihnili rāti | 110 |
tāhāra śirachedi bhīma āṇaiṁ ye bega | 112 |
se gajara muṇḍa lagāile khaṇḍita puruṣara kandhe
gaja badana puruṣa sundara lambodara mahābaḷī | 114 |

div.note: –svāmī sodara bibāde tote buddhi dile girijā<lb/>parama puruṣa tote agrateṇa pūjā |(ṅa, ña)
–śrī biśvanāthe kaṣṭhore pucchanti sadānandara bāmā |(jha, ṭa)
āṇante lagāile biṇāẏakara kandhe<lb/>mr̥tusañjībanī mantre jīāṁile sadānande |(ca)
div.head: {@rātri goḷayuddhe dr̥pada rājāra mr̥tyu@}

lg.l: pāṇḍabanta ogāḷile daśasasra ratha nabakṣauṇī baḷa gheni | 5 |

div.note: –sehu pucchākalā ye śatamanura tanu |(gha, ṇa, ja, ta)
–agastiṅkhi pucchākale udaẏe hoilā gyānu |(ga, ca)

lg.l: bāraṇa na galā sanya para ke āpaṇe
thāṭha ghuñchāa ho nohiba kicchi yaśa
raẏaṇī prānta hou ude hoantu dineśa | 11 |
bhedibāku bhājana nohiba brahmā indra rudra bhaḷi | 12 |
ẏehā śuṇi hasi śalya śakuni aśastamā
pāñchalakṣa yoddhā terasahasra marāilu kūṭe pāḍila bāḷapua | 14 |
yisa abā kaurobaṁku arjuna thilāka uprodha
bandhu sodaranta chaḍilā niprohi kalā yuddha | 15 |
paḍile ẏekādaśa kṣauṇī hoilā rudhira br̥ṣṭi | 16 |
kr̥pe kahanti samaste boile ho paḷāu jadyaratha
prāṇa rakhaṇḍānā se deśa bideśeṇa paśi
ẏekāẏe mahātmā tu tāhā rakhilu biśvāsi | 18 |

div.note: –raẏaṇī pāhiṇa hou dibasa prabeśa |(gha, ṭha, na, kha)
–raẏaṇī prabhāte diśuṁ daśadiśa |(ga)
–bhūẏeka bhiāibā mahā ye kuṇḍaḷī |(ṇa, ja, cha, dha)
–pāñchalakṣa yoddhā tera sahasra rājā māilā bāḷapua |(ja, ṇa, gha)

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇa pāthaku dekhi tu galu apasari | 20 |
āho droṇa sātuki bolikari kisa mātra yodhī
sehi tote puṇa samare galāṭiki jiṇi
ẏekāẏe bhīmā tote dhaṁsiṇa galā puṇi | 22 |
pāñchara pāṇḍabe yebe hoante ẏeka mūrtti
āho dorṇe aneka sanya male jadyaratha prāṇe bhraṣṭa
tohora muṇḍe paḍiba sinā dr̥śiḷāra kaṣṭa | 24 |
dhika dhika jībana tohora āhuri kathā kahu
ohobaḷa thāṭhe basi tu kimpe lāja na pāu | 27 |
tu boli lokanta mukha chāhuṁ ho gurudroṇa
dhika dhika jībana tohora kimpe bratibā mānabhaṁge
paḷā yāho gurudroṇa na thāa kaurobaṁka saṁga | 29 |
trodha abasthā hoi hāthī upare bijaẏe mānagobinda
aneka jhiṁghāsa kr̥pe droṇaku karanti puṇa puṇi
rāge dreṇaguru tahuṁ uṭhile śira jhuṇi | 31 |

div.note: –paḷāithile bratithāntā tohora saṁgaru |(ta, ña, cha, dha)

lg.l: brāhmaṇa kaḷaku ẏe uttama aṭanti kr̥pabrahmā | 34 |
śatr̥ jiṇi nuāri āpaṇe hoibā marāmari | 35 |
karibi samara muṁ ẏehikṣaṇi ẏe niśāra madhye
yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba kr̥ṣṇa pātha
ẏehānta māri nuārile prabhāte maribi ẏe mohora satya satya | 38 |
kr̥pa āchāryye boile samasta kathā michā
ẏekā pāṇḍaba bhīma na yāi gaṇanā | 41 |
śakuni boila athabā samara karibā āmbhe rahi
ratheke śate śate lāgilā huḷā achārgaḷā | 44 |
āre āre pāṇḍabā boliṇa ḍākanti gāḍhe baẏāṇa | 46 |
āre āre pāṇḍabā bolante śubhai ghoraḍāka
dr̥pade boile ho kaurobe śubhai mukhadhuni
bhīmasena sātukiki ye yāiṇa ogāḷile baḷe | 51 |
ratha gaja aśva dhari kachāḍai mahābāhu
bgraha bibāde yehne gabana karai rāhu | 53 |
gadā rpahāre rahta gaja aśve huanti masīguṇḍā | 54 |

div.note: –leuṭile pāṇḍabe ye sāṁgrama maṇḍaḷe |(ja, ṇa, gha)
–samare biathī hoile ki śrīkr̥ṣṇa phālaguni |(ṅa, tha)
–“samare biarthī hoilā ki phālaguni” pāṭhapare (ga, ca) re pade adhika pāṭha acchi | :–
yujheṣṭhi boile sāhā yāhāṁku jagannāthe
tāhākaiṁ jiṇimāku ke puṇa sāmarathe |
–“samare biarthī hoilā kiphālaguni” ẏehi pāṭhapare “kha” re adhikā pāṭha acchi :–
leuṭi dhāiṁle ye pāṇṭababaḷa thāṭha
ki abā beni sāgara hoigalā bheṭa |
garjanti tarjanti yoddhā dei siṁharaḍi
nirghāta paḍante yehne paḍe giri jhaḍi |
māra māra boliṇa ye śubhilā bīra ḍāka
dhāiṁle samare yoddhā hoiṇa niśaṁka |
–graha bibāde yehne paẏāṇa karai rāhu |(ta, ka, tha, ṇa, gha, na, kha, ṅa, ña)

lg.l: bhīmasenara tule aneka yuddha kale rahi | 55 |
re re kāra śabada kariṇa māruti
hariratha upare gadā piṭilā nei dhāti | 58 |
hariratha śira kandha bhmaja caraṇa bhāñji hoilāka sarba cūnā | 59 |
bajra timbura benigadā gheni bhīmasena hr̥de piṭi | 60 |
sehii gadā uñcchuḍi piṭilā dāśarathara upara | 61 |
dāśaratha māri se rāgeṇa śira jhuṇi
dekhi bairatha gadāẏe prahāra kalā āṇi | 63 |
nr̥siṁha rūpa prāẏe garjai bīra bhīma | 65 |
tininti māriṇa kopa nohai tāra śānti
gadāẏe prāhāra kalā se daśasasra rathī | 66 |

div.note: –rathī sārathi sahite sarbe hoileka cūnā |(kha, gha, ṭha, jha, na, ña, tha)
–uñcchuḍi sthānare “ṇa” o “ja” pothire huñcchuḍi acchi |

lg.l: sātuki śara prahāre samaste gale sarga | 67 |
āho caitana droṇe āgyāṁ dile ye sannidhye rāi karṇṇa
ẏeteka sanya gheni tu thibu mora pāśa | 69 |
ẏeteka tule gheni ho mahārathī śalya
tu sāṁgrāma karibu ho bhīmasean tula | 72 |
tini ahibrateka rathī batiśa ahibrata hāthī
ẏeteka sanya gheni kr̥pa ye āchāryye
droṇe āgyāṁ dile ẏeteka sanya gheni
sahadebara tule samara karibu tu mantrī ye śakuni | 78 |

div.note: –br̥ndeka aśva yoddhā śaṁkheka pādānti |(ṇa, tha)
–br̥ndeka aśva yoddhā tinisārara pādānti |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: tu se samara karibu nakuḷara tule | 81 |
benipadma aśva yoddhā dile aḷāẏudhara mūḷe
tu samara karibu ho ghaṭukāra tule | 84 |
yujheṣṭhira tule yuddha karibu tu svaẏeṁ | 86 |
aśipadma yoddhā gheni arjuna chamuku saja hoile āpaṇe | 87 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ kari droṇe rathe bijekale | 88 |
bājai bīratūra bijighoṣa ṭamaka niśāna dāuṇḍi
samasta yoddhāẏe ye yāha ratha maṇḍi | 89 |
yujheṣṭhi debe baikulya na pāi bārata
sanidhye puṇi śuṇile samare malā jadyaratha | 90 |

div.note: –tu samara karibu ghaṭautkaṭa putra tule |(ṇa, ja)
–chāre kahile yāiṁ samare āja paḍilā jadyaratha |(tha, ḍa)

lg.l: gobinde boile ho ki buddhi karibā pātha
ẏebe kisa samara karibā sarbe jaṇatini | 95 |
nija rājye yibā āmbhe samarahiṁ na kara | 97 |
bhīmasean boilā tumbhe sākṣī hoithibā debahari
māribi kauroba baḷa rātra pāñchaghaḍi sari | 99 |
dropatī keśa bandhana karāibi āja dhūśāsanakaiṁ bheṭile
tāhāṁkara jhiṁghāsa saha nuārai mohora beḷe | 101 |
āre āre pāṇḍabā boli hākuchanti guru droṇa
ẏehā śuṇi kāhāra aṅge deba rahibāka prāṇa | 102 |
arjuna boile deba na bolani ẏehā
bāhile aśvanta deba pabanuṁ ati bega | 105 |

div.note: –kaurobe bolibe ḍare paḷāile samara na kari |(ja, tha, cha)
–arjuna boile deba abaśya bolibeṭi ẏehā |(cha, ja, tha)

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba śuṇile guṇa ṭaṁkāra śabada | 107 |
bābu sahadeba re mora kuśaḷe acchinā bibatsa | 108 |
bābu sahadeba re raṇaraṁga dhandoḷe paśicchi kirīṭī
ẏe niśākāḷe tāhāku pāribāṭi ki bheṭi | 110 |
bābu ẏekā kariṇa muṁ ye paṭhiāili bhīmāku
daṇḍake prabeśa hoile yāiṁ samara nikaṭa | 112 |
yujheṣṭhi deba sānanda hoile tāhā śuṇi | 113 |
bhīmāhiṁ ta mohora kuśaḷe acchi bhale
paśare samare boli yujheṣṭhi āgyāṁ dile | 114 |
ẏe mahābhāratha yuddhe tāhāra nāma raṇa manthāna bīradhū
lakṣeka rāja madhye mahiṁma tāra sādhu sādhu | 116 |

div.note: –guṇaghoṣa śabada śubhai meghanāda |(ṇa, ja, ṭa)
–ẏeka jābaḍe kariṇa muṁ ye paṭhiāili bhīmāku |(kha, na, jha)
–bābu ẏekalaẏe kariṇa muṁ ye paṭhiāili bhīmāku |(ja, ṇa, tha)
–ẏekaloci–ekāṭhi |

lg.l: puṇa kahilā se ye birāṭa ātmaje
mohora bhāge hoilā kr̥pa ye āchāryye | 123 |
aḷambuṣa rākṣasa ye mohroa bhāgare hoilā | 124 |
ke kāhāra tule ye karuacchi roḷa | 126 |
kotiẏe yoddhānta gheni ghaṭa ye utkaṭa
gaja aśva ratha sanya pādānti sahite

div.note: –durdakṣa boilā sthānare bahu pothire yujheṣṭhira boile acchi |
–ke kāhāra tule ye karuchi samaragoḷa |(jha, ṅa)
–tuṇḍa bistāra kari giḷanti apramite |(ca, ga)

lg.l: chela catra nārāja bindhanti yete bāṇa
sahasreka rathī tule ghaṭautkaṭa tāha giḷi | 132 |
daśasahasra rathī tule ghaṭautkaṭa tāhā grāsi | 133 |
tote indra dilāra achai bajra ye śakati
ẏe śakati gheniṇa muṁ māribi kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 138 |
karṇṇa boilā sārathi tu ratha āḍekara
asura tule yuddha ki priẏojana āmbhara | 139 |
sārathī boilā ẏeṇe raṇa bhaṁgāṇa karai bhīmā
āu ẏehāra chamure kisa tohora gārimā | 141 |
māriṇa kuṛha kuṛha kalā bhīmasena raṇaraṁga | 143 |

div.note: –tāhā gheni ghaṭautkaṭaku pakāu kini cchiti |(jha, da)
–priẏojana–pirojana–praẏojana
–āu ẏehāra chamure kisa tohora baḍimā |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: ke keṇe yujhuchanti na pāiṇa bāṭa | 145 |
guruja chela catra kunta lāṁkiā asipatra yāṭhi
timbura śahasre ye prahāra kalā gheni

div.note: –ke keṇe paḷābanti na pābanti bāṭa |(ca, ḍa, kha, na)
–ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭama ye bhūmanu putra beni |(cha, ja)
–daśa biṁśa tiriśa paḍuchanti cchiḍiṇa |(ca, ga)

lg.l: sihāṇa thāṭha ye dhāmanti bāhānāda kari | 157 |
aśve aśve ārohi bolanti samara rakha rakha | 161 |
dūre thāi hāka dyanti mantrī cūḍāmaṇi
hāka deuṁ deuṁ se sahadeba mantrī
āmbhara baḷaṭi ho ẏe bhīmasena rakha | 164 |
ẏe pañchu rājyara pañcharājā māilā pabana ātmaja | 165 |
pacharu pachāru āpaṇāra sanya badha kalāka ẏete | 168 |
sātuki boilā ho raha raha bhīma
yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākure ẏeṭi na kara sāṁgrāma | 169 |

div.note: –bidhr̥ta nirāẏudha birājasena madhudhvaja |(ṅa, cha, ja)
–bidhr̥ti nirāẏudha birājasena manudhvaja |(ṭa, na, tha)
–yujheṣṭhi ṭhākure boile na karibā saṁgrāma |(na, ṭha, ta)

lg.l: bābu tumbhanta paṭhiāi baikulya pañchu bhūte | 171 |
hr̥daẏa baikulya phiṭu śītaḷa hou buku | 172 |
rathī pādānti hāthī aśva ye samaste hoile badha | 175 |
para āpaṇā boli na yāi bāraṇa
bhokhilā brāgha yehne gobrāhmaṇa na bichāri
abaśya se bhakṣai chamure ye paḍi | 179 |
ārambha yoddhā dekhi nārāja kale droṇe
khaḍaga gheni droṇa saburi śirakamaḷa kāṭi | 181 |
ẏekeheṁ rātrakāḷa nārāja ghāte duguṇā raẏaṇī | 182 |
daśa boṅgiśa tiriśa prahāra kale śara
abheda sehnā ye jāṇai brahmaruṣi suta
jaṇe kehi yāi na pāranti uburi | 185 |
droṇa dropada samara kehi na jāṇanti | 187 |
droṇa prahāra kala nārāja pañchu munā
sate ki bajra paḍi bhājilā droṇaṁkara ratha | 190 |
bāhāna biarthe se ye dropadeśvara rāẏe
droṇakaiṁ prahāra se kalāka asipatra khaṇḍāẏe | 194 |

div.note: –abheda sehnā lāiacchi ruṣisuta |(ca)

lg.l: khaḍaga bulāi ye prahāra kale guru droṇa
bho maitra dropada kalu mote ẏehā
maitra hoi kali muṁ agyāna dorehā | 201 |
bhikṣā magi anna deli cauboṅgiśa baraṣa pariyante | 202 |
poḍu poḍu kisa arthe rañchili sāṁgrāma
kṣaṇake nāśagalā ta aneka kāḷa dharma | 203 |
samare upekṣi kisa kisa tu bisaru | 204 |
drone boile śuṇa ho kr̥pa āchāryye
ẏe mohora maitra aṭai dropada mahārāje | 205 |
kr̥pa boile guru he chaḍa śokabhāra
bibāde paśina kisa loḍu bandhu ye sodara | 206 |
samare nāhānti ki droṇa, bhāradvādaśaṁka tanaẏe | 209 |

div.note: –bisaru–bichāru
–bibāda muṇḍiāibi bandhu ye sodara |(ṇa, ja)

lg.l: droṇe dropade beni ye maitra aṭanti pūrbe
heḷe pañchāḷa deśa kirāta ghenilāka hāde | 214 |
tīrthabāsī hoile śahe caubiṁśa jaṇa tule | 215 |
dropade boile muṁ pāñchāḷa deśara naraindra
baḷātakāre kirāta rājā gheniḷā mohora rājya | 218 |
pāñchāḷa deśara rājā muṁ nāma mohora dropada | 219 |
āmbhara nāma droṇa tumbhara nāma dropada
ẏeka akṣara paḍilā tumbhe āmbhar ahoila maitra | 220 |
śaẏe caubiṁśa jaṇaṁku droṇe nityeheṁ paḍi dyanti | 221 |
bhikṣā māgi droṇe paḍi deuthānti nitye | 223 |
pañchāḷa deśa chaḍi kirāta āpaṇā deśakaiṁ galā | 224 |
pañchāḷa deśaru bega kari galeka munehiṁ
bho deba maitra mohora pañchāḷa deśaku yibā | 226 |
kirāta rājā ye chadilā mohora rājya
samaẏe tāṁka rājye mohora thibāka aiśuryya | 227 |
droṇa boile tumbhe ho yāa yā maitra
abaśya āmbhe he yibu tumbhara puraku
na puṇa mita ho na cinha āmbhaṁku | 229 |
dropada boilā svāmī tu mohora annaguru
tohora anna khāi muṁ bañchili ta durgatiru | 230 |
nija rājye yāi prabeśa hoile mahīpāḷa | 231 |
aḷase śarīra yahuṁ hoilā gata ātmā
nahe kr̥pīṁkara udara bidārile droṇa mahātamā | 234 |
peṭara pua goṭiku kāḍhile guru droṇa
anna ta na yogāi loḍai kṣīra phuṭi | 237 |

div.note: –samasteka mohora rājye bhmañjibā aiśuryya |(ṅa, jha, ḍa)

lg.l: tebe se poṣa pāriba bāḷuta tanaẏe | 239 |
bāāna dibase prabeśa hoile dropadaṁkara rājye | 240 |
droṇe prabeśa hoile dr̥pada pūrba dvāre
dvārapāḷaku kahile bāratā kahibu bābu rājāṁka āgare | 241 |
dropada rājāṁkara āmbhe aṭu ho maitra
yāi rājāṁku jaṇāa āmbhe brāhmaṇa bihita | 242 |
kalyāṇa, dhana, putra tote hou paḍhiārī
dharma arja babure chamure jaṇā kari | 243 |
byākuḷa bacana śuṇi ye galeka dvārapāḷe
tumbhara maitra deba darśana kari loḍuacchi | 245 |
āmbhara maitra yebe kete acchi sanyabaḷe | 246 |
chāragaṇe boile brāhmaṇeka putra goṭiẏe trode acchi
thāṭha sanya deba, tāra tule nāhiṁ kicchi | 247 |
rājara maitra bolāi ẏeka bhikṣuka brāhmaṇa
nagra bāhāre nei śira pakāa uttāri | 250 |

div.note: –pāñchadine prabeśa hoile dropadaṁkara rājye |(kha, na, jha)

lg.l: boile āre āre brāhmaṇa tohroa parasāde
ke yāiṁ droṇaṁku ye māruchanti biṇḍā
ke ṭeḷā māranti ye pāḍanti kuruḷi | 254 |
dropada yoguṁ droṇaṁku hoilā ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 257 |
caubiṁśa baraṣa poṣilā semāna keṇe galā
ẏete dūra pariyante droṇaṁku āṇile ṭeḷā māri | 260 |
droṇe boile sodara madhye śaḷāhiṁ se sāra
kr̥paṁkara ghare prabeśa upekṣi sarba lāje | 263 |
aneka byākuḷa hoile kr̥pa āchāryye śuṇi | 264 |

div.note: –āumāne beḍhile yāiṁ droṇaṁku taḍati |(ḍa, ta)

lg.l: paśurāma pāśe yāi beda ādhyāna kari | 265 |
dropada bibāde kuru pāṇḍabe śastra dharu | 268 |
āho dhr̥tirāṣṭa ādihuṁ droṇe tīrthabāsī sinā
dropada nimantu kari droṇe samasta śastrabidyā sādhi | 270 |
dr̥padara yoguṁ droṇaṁkara ho ẏeke paramāda
se rāge kari droṇe dropadaṁkara kale śiraccheda | 272 |
asthi carma māẏeṁsa samasta dhari grāsi | 275 |
mahī madhyare tāhāra anīti karma dekhi
tāhā tule mahāsamara kalu nātha gagana upekhi | 276 |

div.note: –pāṇṭabe kaurabe ye thāānti ẏekā gharu<lb/>dropadaṁkara nimante pāṇḍaba kaurabaṁkara droṇe hoile bidyāguru |(tha, ṇa)
–mahā baiṣṇaba bhagata aṭanti brahmabādī |(kha, ṇa, ṅa)

lg.l: bijaẏe kaṇāarka tīrthe svāmī ye bhāskare | 277 |
tapatābaḷī dhanu kare teja anaḷa śare | 278 |
svāmī kāmyeka bane urddhvabāhu tapa bhāṅgi
nirākuḷa narāẏaṇa tu saẏaḷa jana cintā
saẏaḷa jane mr̥tugata hoile tohora adr̥śyeṇa kari | 281 |
kṣīra samudre nātha bikāśilā tohora raśmi
svāmī pāile jībati ye tohora udaẏe
nirmaḷa jaḷa srāhāne yenhe mukata hoẏe kāẏe | 283 |
svāmī dhīrajana paṇḍita ye tapodhana yati
svāmī aniryyāpa saṁsāra ẏe lobha moha khaṇḍā
naśakara daṇḍaru taribāku ẏe mohora icchā

div.head: {@ghaṭukā dvārā aḷāẏudhara mr̥tyu o aḷambuṣa<lb/>dvārā ghaṭukāra mr̥tyu@}

lg.l: mukatikaiṁ icchā karite baibasuta manu śrotā | 1 |
āho caitana dr̥pada badha antareṇa kathā
dhr̥ṣṭadyumane ye na jāṇanti pitā badhara bāratā | 2 |
tahiṁ se khaṇḍiba nā maitra droha kaṣṭa
na jāṇi ẏeheneka pātaka arjili muṁ pāpiṣṭha | 5 |
pachāśa sahasra baḷa dhanu karai ādhāna | 8 |
kāhiṁ jāta hoilure maribu āsi kāhīṁ | 9 |
ẏehikṣaṇi prāṇa tora karipārai muhiṁ naṣṭa
dhuśāsana bolai nice maraṇaku kalu icchā
ẏebe se nāśakara debatā pāñji kalā pochā | 12 |
bajraghāta prāẏe piṭilā durdakṣa rathara upara | 13 |
gadabara paḍi durdakṣa ratha helā cūnā
ṣāṭhiẏe ṣāṭhiẏe bhāra gadā bulāi bīra kope
mahā bīrabara se kauroba bīra ṣāṇā(?)
mohora prahāraho dhuśāsana ẏebe rakha rakha | 19 |
kiñchita yuddhe tu ye hoilu nirekha | 24 |

div.note: –r̥dhire jarajarita yenhe diśai sarbaṁge |(ḍa, ca, ña)

lg.l: caudabaraṣa chaḍamāsa hoilā asakata tāra tanu | 26 |
tohora bhmaja upāḍi rudhire pakhāḷibe se bāḷa
tu abā tāhā kimpe na cetu re chāṇḍāḷa | 27 |
agyāṇa hoikari puṇa puṇa yuddhareṇa paśu
ceti dhuśāsana boilā re durddakṣa āsa mohora thāṭha
muhiṁ se preta piṇḍa karibi tumbhanta | 31 |
rātra boliṇa re tohora mohora ẏemanta kathā
na puṇa pāṇḍabe pāānti ẏesana baratā | 32 |
abichcanne bāṇa tuṣāra br̥ṣṭi jāṇi ghoṭi | 34 |
pāñchalakṣa yoddhā gheni dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane

div.note: –śikhaṇḍī śara ye binddhala chāralakṣa |(ṭa, jha, ṇa)

lg.l: peṣanti śalye kope pañchāḷaśvera kumara upara | 40 |
śalye bāṇa binddhale sahasra ye chāri | 41 |
śara chedi nārāje paḍile śalyaṁka rathara upare | 44 |
nārāja bighāte śalyaṁka ratha hoilā sarba cūnā
rome rome gaḷita yenhe mandāra puṣya raṁga | 46 |
sambhāḷiṇa ratha mohora bāha ho sārathi
śuṇina satyabara sārathi ye bāhai turaṁga

div.note: –madhyāhna kāḷe diśai yenhe pārijāta aṁga |(ca)
–rome rome gaḷita yenhe śarīra diśai bibhaṁga |(dha, ḍa)
–rome rome gaḷita yenhe śarīra diśai śaśāṁga |(gha, ṭa)
–dekhiṇa pāñchāḷeśvara jaẏaśaṁkha bāi |(adhikāṁśa pothi)
–śuṇiṇa bikarṇṇa sārathi ye bāhai turaṅga |(ca, ga)

lg.l: karṇṇara nabaśata nārāja bege pātha chedi | 54 |
puṇa chedilā se karṇṇara dhanu troṇa beni | 57 |
śalya karṇṇa duheṁ ārohi ẏeka rathe
yociṇa nārāja binddhale yahiṁ chanti kr̥ṣṇa pāthe | 60 |
śare śare paḍitāḷa arjuna karai sarbanaṣṭi | 61 |
śalya boile karṇṇa ho deḍhaprahara rāti
ẏehikṣaṇi arjuna śaraghāẏe āmbhe hoibā birathī | 62 |
tote ye bajra śakati dila maghabāna
tu ye boilu ẏeṇe māribi arajuna | 63 |
dekha ho samare āja hoiachuṁ nirastra
śakati gheni prahāra karu kinā kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 64 |

div.note: –chedilā karṇṇara se dhanuśastra puṇi |(gha, ta)

lg.l: dhyāẏe kari inda debatāṁku māgila bajra ye śakati | 65 |
karṇṇa mote māguacchi bajra ye śakati
ubhaẏe bheṭa pāiacchi hari arjuna duhinti | 67 |
amare kemante basibu kare bajra na thile | 68 |
karṇṇa kiṁpe śakati māgilā keuṁṇa prastābe
muhiṁta na jāṇai śakti māgai ẏebe | 69 |
ẏesaneka carita śuṇa pūrbara mo satya | 70 |
karṇṇara tahuṁ debu amr̥takuṇḍaḷa abheda kapaca bajra ye chauṁri | 72 |

div.note: –“muhiṁta na jāṇai śakati māgai ẏebe” ehi pāṭha pare “ṭa, ḍa, ta, tha” re bhinma pāṭha –
indra boilā amare nirbātakapaca badha kalā arjuna
satya karāi boilā kapaca kuṇḍaḷa āṇi debu maghabāna |
arjunara bacane muṁ karṇṇara tahiṁki gali
kapaca kuṇḍaḷa bajra chauṁri tinihinti māgili |
dānabhārā pāi ratha na galā śūnyagati
leuṭi pratigraha deli bajra ye śakati |
br̥haspatiṁki bujhāi indra chaḍile bajra ye śakati
karṇṇaku prāpata hua āgyāṁ dile surapati |
bajra āsanteṇa phiṭilā raẏaṇī
śrīkare karṇṇa dhailā kṣatriẏa cūḍāmaṇi |

lg.l: karṇṇaku satya karāiluṁ kapaṭe brāhmaṇa beśe | 73 |
taḷa hātha kariṇa āmbhe māganteṇa dāna
upara hātha kari dilā mahābīra karṇṇa | 74 |
bākyakari tiḷa udaka śaṅkhe bharibāra beḷe
muhiṁ māgili amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa bajra chauṁri abheda kapaca debu mote beḷe | 75 |
śuṇa ho br̥haspati karṇṇa satyabrata yugati
deharu chauṁri dilā mote se prati prati | 76 |
tāḷu bidāri kaṛhilā abheda kapaca maṇi
śarīra bidāri karṇṇa tinida na dilā
dāne bhārā pāi mora puṣyaka rathana caḷilā | 78 |
mātaḷi boila indra ho svarge nuāriba yāi
karṇṇaku pratigrahe dāna thokāẏe dia leuṭāi | 79 |
muhiṁ nāṣtikali tāra dusaha bākya śuṇi
airābata gaja se māgilā mote puṇi | 81 |
tāha debāku muṁ ye nuārili satya kari
caturthe māgilā mote bajra ye śakati | 83 |
bajra śakti maghaba karṇṇaku dia bega | 84 |
mātaḷira bacane muṁ satya kali debaiṁ śakati
āho karṇṇa tote prāpata hoiba ẏekaghānti | 85 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjunakaiṁ māribi pitā kahai to agrate | 86 |
teṇukari bajraśakati karṇṇa māgai mote ẏebe | 87 |
ẏekā arjunakaiṁ māribāku yebe māgantā śakati
se hari sinā pari kariba arjunaku | 89 |
śrīkare ghenile indra bajra ye śakati
karṇṇaku prāpata hua āgyāṁ dile surapati | 90 |
karṇṇa ye ghenilā bajra śakati hāthe
koṭi koṭi kiraṇa ki jhaṭita kurukṣetra
karṇṇara hāthare hari dekhiṇa bajra śakati

div.note: –“kr̥ṣṇa arjunakaiṁ māribi pitā kahai to agrate” pāṭhapare (ga, ca) re adhikā pāṭha–
debendra boile muṁ karṇṇaku nohe sari
karṇṇa dānī boliṇa bidita tinipurī ||
māganteṇa bāreka debi bolichaiṁ pūrbe
teṇu kari mahāmalla śakti māguacchi ẏebe ||
guru boile ẏebe dia, nāhiṁ kicchi bhrānti
śrīhari rakhanti sina tohora santati ||

lg.l: chāmure prabeśa āsi hoile guru droṇa | 96 |
saamsta nārāja ye bīra bege prāñchi | 99 |
birathī hoi āḍe hoileka guru droṇe
lakṣe lakṣe nārāja bindhanti pitā putre | 106 |
arjuna romeke śate śate bāṇa māri
śūnye rahi nuārile śūnya puruṣe kale bhaẏe | 111 |
arjuna boilā svāmī kiṁpe tejilu raṇabhūmi | 113 |
svāmī kṣatriẏa kuḷaku ta nohai ẏe karma
śara baraṣante mote na diśile aśvamāne | 115 |
guṇaghoṣa nāda kari ratha āsi prabeśa samare | 118 |
bhīmasenara yuddha kahi ta ki pāri
kr̥tāntaka bije ki kāḷadaṇḍa kare dhari | 119 |
aneka ratha gaja ye keteka aśvayodhī
gadā piṭanteṇa ratha gaja houchanti cūnā
ẏekara ratha upare āreka ratha kachāḍai toḷi
cinha barṇṇa na rahanti hoanti sarbe dhūḷi | 122 |
bhīmasenara nandana ghaṭa ye utkaṭa bīra
karai samara se kareṇa dhari ye koṭhāra | 123 |
koṭiẏe yoddhā gheni bihaḍai hiḍimbīra suta
aneka sanya nāśa hoileni ghaṭautkaṭa paritāpe | 125 |
sanya sambharba ratha gaja aśva ādikari
bhīṣmarūpa prakāśiṇa se garbhare nei bhari | 127 |
tāhāra tule samara tu kara ho aḷāẏadha | 130 |
duheṁ samara kara rakṣāyāu kauroba saini | 131 |
bāma ḍāhāṇa duikati pañchāśa sasra rathī
sabuṁkari kare kodāja āẏudha koṭhāra śakati | 134 |
ke dāḷa bulāi aḷāẏudha bege uṭhi
ghaṭautkaṭa nandana tāhā dhailā bāma haste
ẏekā prahārake dānaba paḍi hoilāka badha | 140 |
ghaṭukāra baḷa uṭhile śāḷa śiḷa gheni | 141 |
mānaba baḷa saini ye dhvaṁsile ati kope | 145 |
biśeṣe durbhāra se amāpata bala kauṇope
raha raha boli samorjai se saini | 148 |
bikaṭa daśana bikarāḷa mūrtti bikaṭāḷa mukha biśeṣa
laha laha jihvā ye baḷi khāṁkara urddhvakeśa | 149 |
ẏesaneka ghora rūpa dekhi se paḷābanti manuṣye
goḍāi ratha gaja aśva bhakṣanti duṣṭa rākṣase | 150 |
andhāre saini marddilā hāde ghaṭukā rākṣasa | 151 |
rājāra maitra tu ye bolāu biśvāsa
athabā yuddha tu na karibu niśākāḷe
niśākāḷe candra dekhi yenhe bhīṣma rūpe bikāśai rāhu | 157 |
ghaṭukāra baḷa ogāḷilā kauṇopa baḷa mukhya | 158 |
pañchaśata yoddhā gheni ghaṭukā ogāḷilā kāmarūpī | 159 |
koṭhāra bulāiṇa aḷumbuṣa karai ye yuddha
raṇa hāndoḷa kari se ghaṭukāra baḷa karai nirodha | 160 |
mahā baḷabantā se ye pratagyam samare
sahasreka yoddhā pāḍilā se ye pratyakṣe mahāsure | 161 |
thāṭha pacha kariṇa se āsi ogāḷilā ẏekā | 162 |
koṭhāra bulāiṇa ghaṭukāku prahāra kalā dhāti | 163 |
parigha bulāi māilā se ghaṭautkaṭara suta | 164 |
garjana nāda kariṇa se paḍilāka cchiti | 165 |
roṣeṇa dhāmaiṁ se dhariṇa gadābara śakati | 166 |
ghaṭukā upare prahāra kalā aḷambuṣa mahābīra | 167 |
lohāra ratheka ghaṭukā ārohi ye thilā
bajrābaḷī gadā bulāi se piṭilā aḷumbuṣaku dhāti | 169 |
bajradaṇḍe paḍi se benigadā hoilāka bhaṅga | 170 |
śūnya hātha hoiṇa se hiḍimbikīra nāti
bajra koṭhāra gheni aḷambuṣa piṭilāka dhāti | 171 |
dekhi se sanyabaḷa sadhu sādhu kari
re re kāra kariṇa uṭhilā ghaṭa ye utkaṭa | 175 |
brikodara bīryye jāta se jiṇipārai nabasr̥ṣṭa | 176 |
lg.note: –bajrābaḷī gadā bulāi aḷambuṣa saini bikoti |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: tini śahasre paḍile yāiṁ aḷambuṣa bakṣasthaḷe | 178 |
konta karabāḷa parigha paḍi hoilā sarbacūnā | 179 |
uchuḍi gheniṇa puṇa hr̥de māilā pādaghāte | 181 |
kunta bulāiṇa se prahāra kalā roṣe
benikhaṇḍa kari tāhā bhāñjilā aḷambuṣa rākṣase | 182 |
hāthe aḷambuṣa ghenicchi khaḍaga ye phaḷā | 183 |
benikhaṇḍa hoiṇa se asipatra paḍai ye jhaḍi | 185 |
re re kāre māilā nei ghaṭautkaṭa bakṣasthaḷa | 186 |
śūnya hātha hoiṇa se samare beni yodhī
muthe muthe māri se samare nirodhi | 188 |
bhmaje bhmaje bhiḍābhiḍi adhare danta chāpi
nāsikāra rodhira bahai rome rome byāpi | 196 |
diśanti ẏeka śarīra yāmaḷā taru prāẏe | 197 |
puṇa puṇa paḍante uṭhai gagane dhūḷi
ratha gaja aśva saini cūra yāuchanti mahīāḷi | 199 |
śuṇa ho caitana ghaṭautkata aḷambaṣara samar abāratā
bharaha bhārthe byāpile beniṁkara samare śakatā | 200 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ ye na sarai kahante

lg.note: ure ura paḍitāḷa koḍanti māthe mathā<lb/>dekhina bhañjile yeteka thileka śakatā |(cha, ja, kha, na)
–beni bīraṁka pratagyāṁ na sarai kahante |(cha, ja)

lg.l: raṇaraṅge asāṣṭama hoilā ghaṭa ye utkaṭa | 203 |
benibhmaje toṭi dhailā jānure hr̥da bhidi | 204 |
aneka uṣata se ye kururāja debe | 206 |
driyodhana boilā ghaṭautkaṭa nidhane na bratai bhīmā
ẏebe se maitra mohora ruhāilu gārimā | 207 |
matta karibara jāṇi uṭhilā askandabana rājā | 209 |
re re dānabā tohora mahiṁmā ye dhani
kaḷebara bidāribi tora āja ke rakhu medinī | 211 |
ẏe kurusāgare achanti nā aneka hāde yodhī
aḷambuṣara rakṣā nimante ke karipāre buddhi | 212 |
mānagobinda rāja prāṇara maitra aṭai sākhā
droṇa karṇṇa śalya thāānte hoilu nirekhā | 213 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ śuṇi karṇnakaiṁ boile śalya
ki chāhaṁ karṇṇa ho tumbhe rājara maitra mahāmalla | 214 |
lg.note: –bāma bhmaje taṇṭi māḍi caraṇe caraṇa bhiḍi |(cha, ja)
–kaḷebara bidāribi tote āja rakhuni sasrayoni |(ṇa, ja, tha, ṅa)
–kaḷebara bidāribi āja tote ke rakhu pura tini |(ka, dha)
–nāśibi tote rakhi na pāre sasrayoni |(kha, na)
lg.l: indra debatā dilā tote bajra ye śakati
koṭiẏe kiraṇa jāṇi se ādityara jyoti | 215 |
kṣatripaṇe rakṣākaru kinā deba śahasra thāuṁ thāuṁ
karṇṇa pratibākya na dila tāhara kathā śuṇi | 218 |
ghaṭautkaṭa boilā re ke rakhantā nohilā tuku
naheṇa bidāriṇa se kāḍhiā tāra buku | 219 |
sādhu ghaṭautkaṭa boli śubhilā jaẏe jaẏe | 221 |
aḷambuṣa māri bhīṣma rūpa dhailā hiḍimbikīra tanu | 222 |
beni oṣṭha bikāśilā madhyaśūnya ye bhmabane
barbha bistāri se mahā bhīṣmarūpe byāpi
pañchaśata ratha giḷilā ye asura kāmarūpī | 225 |
lg.note: –“karṇṇa pratibākya na dilā tāhāra kathā śuṇi”–ehi pādānta pare na, kha, gha, ña, ṛa, cha pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏehā gheni ādhāna muṁ na karai āne |
lg.l: pañchaśata yoddhā dhariṇa se sarba giḷi
garjiṇa raṇa dhandoḷa karai kauṇopa mahābaḷī | 226 |
ghaṭautkaṭa chamuru ratha āḍe kalā karṇṇa
yānteṇa nandighoṣa ratha bheṭilā rādheba nandana | 227 |
puṇahiṁ koḍiẏe bāṇa guṇe se basāi
chāri aśva uparaku ye binddhalā niṭhiāi | 232 |
puṇa pañchu bāṇa māilā nandighoṣa rathaku | 233 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjunakaiṁ daśa daśa bāṇa hāṇi | 235 |
lg.note: –tuṇḍa bistāriṇa se garbhaku khaṁkāḷi<lb/>pañchalakṣa yoddhā dhariṇa se sarbagiḷi | (ga, ca)
–“garjiṇa raṇa dhandoḷa karai kauṇopa mahābaḷī”–ehi pādānta<lb/>pare “kha” pothire adhikā pāṭha–
karṇṇa śalya ẏeka rathe dui rathī chanti |
raṇe dhanu dharante ke hoiba samāna |
–śaṁkhacatra cinha sārathi debarāja |(tha, ṇa, ja, ṭa)

lg.l: pañchabiṁśa nārāja piṣilā chari aśvaṁka upara | 236 |
kopeṇa arjuna ye pañchabiṁśa bāṇa māri
bābala śara puṇa binddhalā bīra pātha
sahasre khaṇḍa hoilā karṇṇara ye ratha | 238 |
puṇa ratha ṭekilā nei nandighoṣara chamure | 240 |
śateka nārāja se pūroiṇa bīra karṇṇa
karṇṇara dhanu bāṇa pakāilā bege hāṇi | 243 |
pañchabāṇa māilā arjunaku bhārata kuḷa malla | 244 |
yoḍi hoi yoddhāẏe karanti śara br̥ṣṭi | 247 |
śalya boile karṇṇa ho buḍilā kurubaḷa
kr̥ṣṇa arjune achanti māru kinā duhinti | 249 |

lg.note: –“sumarai maghabāna deba śrī ākhaṇḍaḷa” pare “kha” pothire<lb/>adhikā pāṭha :–
karṇṇa sumaraṇā karante bajra ye śakati
śakati chaḍante ye paḍilā karṇṇa hātha
śrībhmaje dharante karṇṇa bajra ye śakati
ratha āḍe kari nele deba catradhara |
nandighoṣa ratha ye yāānte āḍe hoi
śalye karṇṇe bijekale ẏeka rathe yāiṁ |
ratha pare śakati rakhiā karṇṇa bīra
kr̥ṣṇa arjunaku na dekhi karṇṇa senāpati
gobinde boile pātha ki karibā kaha
arjuna boile deba na kaha tu ẏehā
gobinde boile pātha ki karibā kaha
arjuna boile deba na kaha tu ẏehā
karṇnara chamuku ratha śīghra mora bāhā |
bābala śareka ye binddhalā pātha ṭāṇi
katurī bāṇeka peṣi karnṇa tāhā hāṇi |
kare bajra śakti dhari teja anargaḷā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
lg.l: śrībhmaje karṇṇa ghenilā bajra ye śakati
āditya udeprāẏa diśilā naśagalā ki rāti | 251 |
lg.note: thile ke yuddha kariba tāhā saṁgatara |
arjuna boile prabhma na kaha tu ẏehā
karṇṇara chamuku bege ratha mora bāhā |
puṇa ratha bāhile ye deba bhagabāna
pañchaṣaṭhī bāṇa ye arjuna tāhānta māri
jhalakiṇa bāṇa ye paḍilā karṇṇa ratha |
kare toḷi dhailā ye indra dilā śakti |
nindighoṣa āde kari nele bege chāḷi |
nandighoṣa āḍe honte dekhi karṇṇa bīra
puṇa bajra śakati rakhilā rathara upara |
dhanu dhari śara māre rādhādebī suta
yesaneke mattagaja dhāmaiṁ mukuḷā | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
lg.l: karṇṇara hāthe hari yahuṁ dekhile bajra śara
gobinda boile arjuna ẏe beḷa kaha kemanta pratikāra | 252 |
arjuna boile svāmī na bola mote ẏehā
karṇnara chamuku moho ratha bege bāhā | 253 |
dhyāneṇa jāṇile tāhā deba ye maghabā
dekhi indra gobinda ye koḷa sambhāṣaṇa

lg.note: puṇa puṇa ratha ye ṭekile debahari
bajraśakti bhaẏe ratha nele āḍa kari |
kṣatrī hoi raṇe muṁ ki hoibi nisata |
ẏe kathāku mane tumbhe kichcihiṁ na bhāḷa |
karṇṇara chamuru ratha n aghuñchāa āu
karibi samara yāhā heba tāhā hou |
dhyāneṇa jāṇile tahiṁ deba ye maghabā

lg.l: kemanta kari karṇṇaku deicha bajra ye śakati | 258 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna duhinti māriba boli hāde | 259 |
muhiṁ boili hāde brahmā biṣṇu rudra māru knā yuddhe
trailokyara nātha tu ẏethaku karu kinā sañchā
peṣu karṇṇa śakati tu upāẏe kari bañchā | 261 |
anibāraṇa śakati se jaṇeka gheni paḍi
bichāra kara yāhāku hāde deba hari | 262 |
na thāu se śahasra ye karṇṇara hāthara | 263 |
karṇṇara hāthare thile bajra ye śakati
karṇṇakaiṁ na jiṇile ta na maranti kurubaṁśa
ẏe ta sāṁgrāma ghora goḷayuddha rāti
ẏehi goḷare tora phiṭu ho manabhrānti | 266 |
keuṁṇa kathā bhiāṇa kala indra ye gobinda
kr̥ṣṇa boile tu ki na jāṇu ho pātha

lg.note: anibāra śakati se jaṇeka yāu māri<lb/>upāẏe kari dia jaṇe tumbha sari |(kha, na)

lg.l: paḍi mūrcchāgata hoilā bāḷuta ye hāde | 271 |
boile bajra māili re bajraaṁga hou tohori | 272 |
tāhāra upare śakti paḍu karibā upāẏe | 273 |
keuṁṇa kāraṇe sahi pārai deba ẏeḍe baḍa śāsti | 274 |
tāra binu śakti sambhaḷibāku acchi sakhya kehi
bipada meṇṭiba ẏe teṇu rathare acchi thoi | 275 |
na jāṇuṁ ki sarbakāḷe rakṣākare mote
aneka bipada mora nāśa se karai | 277 | [3764 + 277 = 4041]
lg.head: {@hanumanta janma bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: abikṣaṇe bāṇa jāḷābaḷi karṇṇa ye arjuna
śuṇa ho pātha gautamaṁkara bhārijā ahalyā
indra ādtya duheṁ ye kaleka kapaṭa
se dui putraṁkara nāma sāmatiḷā, jabatiḷā | 7 |
sāta sāta baraṣa ye hoiachanti putra beni | 8 |
baiśākha māsa śukaḷa pakṣa akṣaẏa tr̥tīẏāra tithi
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa biṣkumbha nāme yoga
bārādhi srāhānaku gale ruṣi dui putra duhitāku gheni saṁga | 10 |
srāhāna sāri muni candrabhāgā kūḷe japi

lg.note: –se dui putraṁkara nāma somatiḷa jabatiḷa |–bahu pāṭha

lg.l: pāda tātante muni kākhakale putra benigoṭi
añchanā boilā bābu ẏe baḍāi tapata bāli
goḍa ye poḍilā muṁ pitā nuārai chāli | 15 |
gautama boile tahuṁ añjanāku ati tāpe
tote kāhiṁ basāibi beni putre chanti kākhe | 16 |
añjanā boilā ho huḍilu ki tāta
tohora prāẏe bujhilu ki ẏe beni putranta | 17 |
asada bāṭa jāra jātakā putre achanti to kākha
cauryyadārā puaku dekhi mote kiṁpe upekha | 18 |
tāhānta suhr̥da tāta toha hr̥da ye paṁkaje
muhiṁ se niścaẏa tāta tohora hurdaẏaru jāẏe
mote kenhe tāta tohora ẏeḍeka nirddaẏe | 20 |
muhiṁ ta añchaḷe bānddha āṇai ahalyāra pañchuprāṇa
kemante mohora patnīki harile baḍa jaṇa | 22 |
dui putraṁkara muni dhaile beni hātha | 23 |
āre tumbhe mohora bīryy yebe aṭa ho jātaka
tumbhabta agalyā yebe jāta kalā paradārā
ẏe rūpa chaḍi tumbhe huasi re bānarā | 25 |
karacaraṇa bibarṇṇa ye duhiṁkari beni lāñja
kiḷikiḷā śabada karanti beni ye ātmaja | 29 |
tahuṁ rāge beni putre muni kale tejyā
pache goḍābanti ye kapimukha beni putre | 32 |
pāṇi jhariẏe gheniṇa ahalyā dvāre chanti basi
ahalyā pachārile añja nāku ruṣiṁka kākhe chāhiṁ
sāmatiḷā jabatiḷā mora putre gale kāhiṁ | 34 |

div.note: –“pache goḍābanti ye kapimukha beni putre |” pāṭha pare “ṭha, kha, na” re bhinma pāṭha :–
mr̥tu piṇḍeka hoi ahalyā chanti śoi
gautama parabeśa hoile tahiṁ yāiṁ |
mr̥tu sañjibanī paḍhi bañchāile nārī
boile tu anāchārī hoilu pāmarī |
yamadaṇḍa thāuṁ thāuṁ deha pare delu
agyāna prastara prāẏe to deha karilu |
agyānare doṣa lau hua tu pathara
nija doṣa pratiphaḷa bhoga nirantara |
ahilyā boile tahuṁ añjanā mukha chāhiṁ
sāmatiḷā jabatiḷā putra mora kāhiṁ |

lg.l: gautame boile tu kalu dārā cauryye
kapimukha hoile tohora beni ye ātmaje | 35 |
ẏekai indri ẏe ye tu nohilu triputi
gaṁgātīre pāṣāṇa hoi tu lakṣe indri dekha niti | 36 |
ahalyā boile deba durāpada śāpa dilu mote
tuṭha pathara hoibu kete kāḷa pariyante | 37 |
śāpuṁ mukuta hoibu tu tretaẏāra yuge | 38 |
śrī rāmacandra hoibe sehu yuge jāta
bhāgīrathī srāhāne yibe rāma lakṣaṇa beniśiṣi
trikāḷa sandhyā sāribe rāma tohora upare ye basi | 40 |
śrīrāma caraṇa lāgante hoibu tu pāri
ahalyā boiel ẏehā tu kalu lo añjanī
toho lāgi ẏehi śāpya dile gautama muni | 42 |
tuṭha pathara yebe hoili āu mo kisa sukha | 43 |
tohora garbhmaṁ yeuṁ putra hoibaṭi jāta
añjanā boilā muṁ bibhā ye nohibi
svāmī na icchibi muṁ śr̥ṁgāra na karāibi | 45 |
mātāra bacana se dhariṇa hr̥de kope
samasta tejyā kari yāiṁ basilāka tape | 46 |
duhitā mohora tapa karai mandara parbata upare
pratidina dārākṣā phaḷa debu tu āhāre | 48 |
naẏana buji basithāi se karaku prasāri | 49 |
puruṣaṁkara badana se na chāhiṁbā nimante
nau sahasra baraṣa basilā parama ye yoge | 51 |
kauḷaba nāme karaṇa ye śubha nāme yoga
tahuṁ yāi umā maheśvara sarobara dekhile panti
haṁsa haṁsulī beni hoile īśvara pārbatī | 55 |
manohara bane dekhile markaṭa ye pale
markaṭa markaṭuṇī rūpe deba ratitrīḍā kari
se ratiraṁga ye mohe kheda kari | 61 |
mahāteje kheda kari deba chaḍanteṇa bīryya
ẏehi bīryya deba dhari nuāriba garbhe
abaśya dahana hoibi sambhāḷa deba ẏebe | 63 |
se bīryya paḍante deba kāḍhileka upa
pr̥thīre paḍi uchuḷilā nadī ḍiṁgara ye khāla | 66 |
pracaṇḍa pabana hāthe tāhā dileka biśvanāthe | 70 |
boile debatāṁka madhye tu ye aṭu aputrika
ẏeṇu kari kāraṇa tu pāibu aneka | 71 |
kare dhari pabana bhāḷai antarāḷa hoi
garbhagate kāhāra nei thoibi boliṇa bhāḷai | 72 |
ẏehākaiṁ bīryya debi boli pabana caḷilāka gheni | 73 |

div.note: pada pare kha, na, ṭha re bhinma pāṭha :–
srabi paḍuṁ biśvarūpa prathame dhaile
tahuṁ thokāẏe yāiṇa kṣitire padile |
tahuṁ pārā saṣṭika kauḍi nīḷa ye mukutā |
meghanāḷa śaṁkha ādi hoile srijitā |
āreka mandā ye giri kandarare kṣepi
aṣṭaratna luhā ādi upujile adyāpi |

lg.l: teṇu kari triputi ye hoilā tāra mana | 74 |
añjanāra kare dhātu bīryya dilāka pabana
garbhara bhitare kumara na rahai kṣaṇe
nimiṣake hoilā nakha mukha nāsikā chāri caraṇe | 78 |
garbhara bhārāẏe na pārai caḷi satī
boilā pabana debatā mote kalu ho anīti
mandara parbatuṁ tapa chaḍi debī tatakṣaṇe | 81 |
mandara boilā tohora garbhmaṁ yeuṇa putra hoibaṭi jāta
aśvinī nakṣatra antare dvijā nakṣatra pāhānti | 84 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa siddhi nāme yoga
māhendra beḷe kumāra taupatti meru svarga | 85 |
kaṭire bajra kāchaṭā karṇṇeṇa amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷe saja | 86 |
boilā mote śāpa sinā dleka jananī | 87 |
śaẏe chāribarṣa muhiṁ tape deli mana
bimukhe putraku chaḍi galā tahuṁ uṭhi
bairāge na chāhiṁlā se tāhāku leuṭi | 90 |
putra boilā mātā kṣīra bihune kesane dharibi muṁ kāẏe
raṁgaphaḷa bhmañja boli āgyāṁ dileka añjanāẏe | 91 |
mohora āṣya re ẏebe prāpata hou tote
śrī rāmacandrakaiṁ bheta tu īskindhyā banaste | 92 |
moha chaḍi nandanaku yahuṁ tejigale māẏe
meru parbate thāi tāha dekhilā hanumāna | 94 |
bitramiṇa mana kalā se kumara kṣudhāẏeṇa bhari | 95 |
cauṣaṭhi yojana ẏekā nimiṣake ḍeiṁlā bāḷuta | 96 |
bhaẏa pāiṇa se ye dinakara nātha
ājahiṁ rāhu mote dilāka āsi dhāḍi | 98 |

div.note: –ẏe mohora śāpya re prāpata hou tote |(ja, ṭha, jha, dha)
–“śrī ramacandrakaiṁ bheṭa tu īskindhyā banaste” pare ‘ṭha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
amara hoiṇa tu yuge yuge thibu
kiskindhyā parbate rāma sahite bheṭibu |
–cauṣaṭhi yojana ẏekā pādakare gamilā bāḷuta |(ja, dha, jha, cha)
–mane bhāḷile se jyoti udaẏe chaẏākānta |(ja, dha, jha, cha)

lg.l: kida mohora udaẏe rāhu graha thile | 99 |
bajra kare dhari caḍhiṇa airabata hāthī | 100 |
kaṇaẏa raṁga basana pariharaṇa pārijātaka puṣya raṁgabarṇṇa
bajra śakati teja ye diśilā raṁgabarṇṇa | 101 |
āditya rathe thāi tāhā dekhi hanumāna
ẏehi raṁgabarṇṇa boliṇa se dhāiṁlā bahana | 102 |
hr̥de bajra paḍante kumara paḍilā mohe loṭi | 103 |
maruta boilā mote īśvara anugraha karithilā
indra debatā mote putra kaṣṭā dilā | 104 |
bāḷaputra koḷe dhari pabana samastaṁku nirodhi
saṁsāra yāka nāśa yāucchi pabanara mandabuddhi | 105 |
āmbhara āiṣa gheni bratu tora śiṣa | 107 |
indra boilā muhiṁ tote māili bajraśakati
śarīrayāka tohora baja hou boli boile surapati | 110 |
boile mana pabana bahu to lāṅguḍara | 111 |
bajra śakati bhārā se hanumantahiṁ sahiba | 112 |
kāhāra hoi deba se pāiba ẏeḍe śāsti | 113 |
mohora thāānte tāhāra śrīaṁge hoiba śasraghāta
svāmī bāhāni ẏebe ratha karṇṇara chamuku
mātu se bajraśakati muṁ sahibi karṇṇara ghāāku | 115 |
ẏekā bāṇeke tāha karṇṇa karai naṣṭi | 118 |
naba sahasra rathī tule āsi ogāḷile birāṭā | 119 |
śaṁkha uttara beni putra duhinti gheni
pāñchaśata hāthī ẏegāra śata turaṁga dui kṣauṇī pādānti saini | 120 |
dharma āchare samare paśile guru droṇa | 123 |

div.note: –ghāāku–ghātaku |
–niprohi nirddaẏā se daẏā nāhiṁ kicchi |(ṇa, ja, gha, ṭha)

lg.l: brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa ādi kari paḍuchanti yete raṇe
puṣpaka bimāne basāi gheniyānti biṣṇu gaṇe | 127 |
niprohi nirāpakṣa daẏā tāhāṁkara nāhiṁ kicchi | 128 |
śaraṇa boile se rakṣā ye na kari | 129 |
ke pātra yoddhā ke mantrī kṣatrī nr̥pa | 130 |
birāṭara tule ye nabasahasra yoddhā rājā thile
śahasra ghāte paḍile ambu deśara catrabratī | 134 |

div.note: –durdakṣa dhuśāsanaku jiṇilā ẏekājaṇe |(tha, ṅa, cha)
nārāja paḍante ye aśve yānti phaṭi<lb/>senhā phuṭi śarīre nikili bajra ghoṭi |(cha, ja)

lg.l: kaṭi jānu buḍanti deha diśai raṅgabarṇṇa | 139 |
pañchaśata yoddhā tuleṇa rāja ye trigartta
śaṁkha uttara kumare se hoile nipāta | 141 |
tāhāra śira chedilā samare nr̥pati birāṭa | 142 |
pañchu bāṇe tāhānta uttara kumāra nipāti | 143 |
nakuḷara tule samara tāhāra hoilā apramita | 144 |
nakuḷa samare pāḍile naba sahasra rathī
gaṁgāra bāli ke khaḍi kari parimāṇī | 146 |
he buddhajane yābata jībanaku jagannātha nāmagoṭi
nīḷa utpaḷa badanagoṭi cintai mana dhyāne | 149 |

div.note: –jyotipurara rājā daradasena nr̥pati |(ca, ta, ña)
–birāṭara samare se hoilā binaśyati |(cha, ja, gha)
–pañchabāṇe droṇaguru kāṭile nipāti |(ca)
–sahasre turaṅgama paḍile chaḍa sahasra mattahāthī<lb/>khr̥pa bāli khaḍile kehu kariba gaṇati |(ja, ga)
–saṁcapi kahibāku kehi nāhiṁ lekhantā |(tha, cha, ña)

lg.l: bhārābhare deba sabhāre guhāri kalāka dharaṇī
bhairobī boilā muṁ rahi nuārai ẏe mañche
tote kachāḍiba nei darpaṇa śiḷāra upare | 156 |
se piṇḍa pakāi āsibu akṣaẏa svarge
bhairobī boilā mote kisa debu ho śirīraṅge | 157 |
pañchaṣaṭhī koṭi kabandha mote debu narabaḷī
bhairobī boilā ẏete yebe na debu catradhārī
tote bhakṣibi muṁ baṁśa tohora ādi kari | 159 |
keśaba boile mohora hoilā satya satya
satya maṇāi tāṁku āṇile deba hari

div.note: –tote kachāḍiba nei akarma śiḷā upare |(ca, ṭa)
–muhiṁ tohora saṅge hoithibi bhadrakāḷī |(cha, ña, jha, ṇa, tha)

lg.l: bhairobī āṇi ye daibakī koḷe dei | 163 |
se bhairobīki nei kachāḍilā darpaṇa śiḷāra upara | 164 |
tote ye māriba nandaghare baḍhucchi pratakṣe | 165 |
āho caitana, potanā śakaṭā yāmaḷā bakā ṣaṇḍāsura
śrīkr̥ṣṇa ẏehānta māile bhairobī pibanti rodhira | 167 |
chāṇura muṣṭika ye kubaḷaẏā ambā kadambā praḷambā
keśī kaṁsa mūḷe ye aneka daita
kaṁsa mūḷe thile kobandha koṭi sāta | 169 |
tahiṁ māri dile kobandha lakṣa tini | 171 |
sāta kobandha māri dile sākhāpura maṇḍaḷe | 172 |
jambeba mantrī tule pātāḷe samara kari
jambeba dekhante dile chāri kabandha māri | 173 |
naba kobandha māri tahiṁ dileka bāsudeba | 174 |

div.note: –gopapure gupata se deba banamāḷī |(cha, tha, ña)
–gopapure sākhā āsi hoile deba śrī banamāḷī |(gha, tha)
–gajamokṣe aśvamokṣa brāghamokṣa bhāluṁkā gandharbā |(ña, cha)
–gomate yuddhe dile nabaśata kobandha |(gha, ḍha, ṇa)

lg.l: kr̥ṣṇa yebe tunī honti rahi binā yuddhe
laha laha jibhyā bulāi khapara kāti gheni bhairobī bolai de de | 175 |
aniruddha nimante ba ṇāsura tule yuddha
asura māri tahiṁ dile aśiśata kobandha | 176 |
tāhāra sanya māri tiniśata kobandha dile | 178 |
tahiṁ dile bhairobīki kobandha sahasra chāri | 179 |
ẏehāṁkara tule dile lakṣe kobandha hāṇi | 180 |
ẏehānta māri dile kobandha śata ye pandara | 181 |
lakṣeka kobandha ye māri dile tahiṁ | 182 |
chāri digaku bije sahadeba nakuḷa arjuna ye bhīma | 184 |
pacchima digabije kāḷe bhīmasena sanya māri
tahiṁ pāthahiṁ bhairobīki dile saturī kobandha | 186 |

div.note: –bilaṁka deśare kāḷanaumi kañchaṇa<lb/>lakṣeka kobandha māri dile ẏehāṁkara badha kāḷeṇa |(keteka pothi)

lg.l: tāhāra nimante bhāratha yuddha kale banamāḷī | 189 |
śaẏe bāāstarī paḍile śakaṭa bhūara madhya | 193 |
ẏethe paḍilāni hāde kobandha śata ye pandara | 195 |
aśekṣa puruṣa ẏe samasta kalā kṣaẏe

div.note: –mlekṣa–mleccha |
–dhīrajana paṇḍitaṁkara kamaḷamāḷa bakṣa |(ña, jha, cha, gha, dha)
–jagujībana nātha satya bāñchāẏe caḷi |(cha, na)

lg.l: rakata māṁsa bhakṣanti ẏethi anādi bhairobī
teṇu kari mr̥tupiṇḍa na rahanti bhmabi | 200 |
mānaba janme muhiṁ tāhāku kisa āñchi | 201 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa badaẏanti śrī puruṣottama parasāde | 202 | [4041 + 202 = 4243]

div.head: {@ghaṭotkaca badha o tāhāra pūrba śāpa bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: aneka samara tahiṁ rāẏe kalāi birāṭa | 2 |
hāboḍā śareka ye māilā bīra karṇṇa
birāṭa ratha bhāji hoilā śate cūrṇṇa | 3 |

div.note: –āñchi–anumāna bā kaḷanā karibā |

lg.l: bābala śare rādheba chedilā tāhā bega | 8 |
bajra timbūra śara karṇṇa binddhalā tīkhamunā
puṇi bindhante bāṇa basilā yāiṁ hr̥de
puṇihiṁ adhācandra bāṇa karṇṇa binddhalāka ṭāṇi
nandighoṣa ratha ṭekile śrīkr̥ṣṇa karṇṇara chamure | 13 |
nirddaẏe nārāja binddhalā bīra lakṣe lakṣe pātha | 14 |
arjunara bāṇa ghāte se hoile bikoti | 15 |
tāhāra tule yoddhā paḍile tini lakṣa | 17 |
śalya boilā he karṇṇa chāhāṁni leuṭi
tohora dekhante sanya paḍile koṭi koṭi | 18 |
tohora baḷabīryya dekhi kururājā driyodhana pāṇḍabanta kalā tejyā
tohora heḷa dekhante paḍileni pañchachāḷiśa sahasra rājā | 19 |

div.note: –nirāpakṣa bāṇa bindhai bīra pāthe |(ca)
–bajragiri deśara rājā bīrabāhu |(ṭha, ḍa, gha)

lg.l: āho karṇṇa bandhu bāndhaba marāi āpaṇe hoibu ki sukhi
śrīkāḷa janmare ho tumbhaṁku muhiṁ hāde lekhi | 20 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna māribā nimante gheniacha bajra ye śakati
se duhinti māile nikṣatrī hoibaṭi pr̥thī | 21 |
śalya karṇṇa beni jane kathā ye hoante
bhīma dr̥dakṣa māile sanya tini parāẏudha | 23 |
śakuni boilā ho tu śuṇa mānacatrabratī
karṇṇa āgare nandighoṣa bāma pāruśe ghaṭautkaṭa
tini sahasra rājā batiśa sahasra hāthī
tiriśa lakṣa yoddhā gheni bijekalā kurupati | 28 |
karṇṇara tule āsiṇa hoile ye sākhā
paḍiacchi saini ke tāhā karibāka lekhā | 29 |
mr̥tu śabamāna dekhi rājā māna ye gobinda
bho daiba boli rājā kapāḷe hātha dhinda | 30 |
bho maitra karṇṇa buḍāilu mohora rājya
tohora parā maitra thāuṁ mohora hoilā akāryya | 31 |
ādihuṁ maitra tohora bāhāku muṁ āśre kali
gāṛha rāgeṇa kare karṇṇa ghenilā bajra yhe śakati | 33 |
bho pitā asakanda ye mote dilu satyabākye
kope karṇṇa ye bulāilā bajraśakti śara
dekha karṇṇa āsuacchi bajra śakti bulāi | 36 |
dropatī debī śāpa deichanti tote sabhāre
binā yuddhe bajra śakati paḍiba tohroa hiāre | 37 |
ẏehikṣaṇi tote se māriba bajra śara
nandighoṣa pachakati lucilā asakanda bana rājā | 39 |
bābu yetebeḷe karṇṇa bajra śara peṣu
nandighoṣa ratha chāpa pātāḷa pure paśu | 41 |
yisa tisa badhakari yāu se bajra śakati
mahābhāratha tejyā kari ratha chāpilā pātāḷe | 44 |
hiḍimbikīra nandana thilā ye rathara pache
se bajra śakati paḍilā yāiṁ ghaṭautkaṭa bakṣe | 45 |
śarīre nikiḷi śate yojana kaṇṭilāka mahī | 46 |

div.note: –hanumanta ratha se begeṇa goḷilā<lb/>pāñchajanya śaṁkha śabada jagannāthaṁka śubhilā |(ca, ṭa)

lg.l: aneka utsabe ye kr̥ta kr̥ta hari
kauroba baḷa dhaṁsana se jagujana śreṣṭha | 49 |
se deba māẏāre jagata anta ye karai
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
pāñchajanya śaṁkha ta bājai baḍāi utkaṭa | 52 |
karṇṇara tahuṁ kapaca kuṇḍaḷa nelā surapati | 53 |
dāna bhārāẏe ākāśakaiṁ na caḷilā ratha
pratigraha kari bajra śakati karṇṇara dile suranātha | 54 |
indra debatā boile tu kāryyakāḷe sumara
ẏekā ghāntike tu peṣibu ye debaśara | 55 |
karṇṇa boilā māribi hari arjuna duhinti | 56 |
arjunakaiṁ śakati peṣa ho bhārathakuḷa malla | 57 |
rāgeṇa śakati peṣilā karṇṇa kr̥ṣṇa arjunaku | 59 |
ghaṭautkaṭa hr̥de paḍi se hoilā nipāta | 60 |
dropatīra śāpe kari ghaṭakatkaṭa hoilā prāṇe bhraṣṭa | 62 |
teṇu binā yuddhe bajra śakti hr̥daẏeṇa paḍilā | 63 |
pūrbara kathā tu ẏebe śuṇa kururāẏe | 64 |
muhiṁ kahai tote śuṇa tathya bāṇī
ambikāra nandana boilā ẏe kebaṇa kāraṇa
kaha ho sañjaẏe śuṇimā tohora baẏāṇa | 66 |
rājusi yāga yagyaṁ kāḷe muṁ yāhā acchi śuṇi | 67 |
bedabyāse se ye dile pūrṇṇa āhūti
mārakaṇḍe boile ho tohora parā muni
pūrṇṇa āhūti dilu agnira śikhā kimpe hāni | 69 |
nārade boile byāsaṁka nāhiṁ kicchi doṣa
yujheṣṭhi aputrika teṇu kari agni nohile toṣa | 70 |
byāse boile ho najāṇa tumbhe kicchi
āmbhe jāṇu ho yujheṣṭhiṁkara putra acchi | 71 |
pañchu pāṇḍabe ye aṭanti ẏeka ātmā
hiḍimbikī pure putreka jāta kalā bhīmā | 72 |
nārade boile ho tāhāku bege āṇa

div.note: –bigoti–bikr̥ti |

lg.l: rājusi yāga sabhākaiṁ bīra hoileka saja | 75 |
hiḍimbikī boilā bābu sabhāku yebe yibu
āu kāhākaiṁ tu ye nohibu praṇati
ghaṭautkaṭa kahilā mā go kahilu anīti | 78 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka koḷare ye thibe se pāñchāḷī
tāhāra kope niki huai ātmā bhasmagāmī | 80 |
hiḍimbikī boilā tu koṭi pāṭa abhiṣekī
tohora namaskāra ta na yogāi stirīṁki | 81 |
hiḍimbikī boilā dropatīki ḍarilu yebe bābu
āmbhe tohora tule rājusi yāgakaiṁ yibuṁ | 83 |
putraku gheniṇa se baja kapaca dulāḷī
koṭiẏe ratha tule putra gheni caḷi | 84 |
niśācara baḷa gheni hiḍimbikī rahilā sabhāra duāre
duje namaskāra kalā se byāsa bāsudebaṁku | 86 |
tije yujheṣṭhi debaṁku se kalā namasvāra
dropatīṁki namaskāra yahuṁ nohilā se suta
lakṣe rājā abhimukhe akalyāṇa hoilā bahuta | 88 |
dropatī boile re muṁ aṭai tora māẏe
asura janma tu mūrkha ẏeḍek anirddaẏe | 89 |
lakṣe rājā sammukhe tu mote dilu lajjā
sapataṇī hiṁsāẏe kari dharma kalu tejyā | 90 |
muhiṁ yebe mātā re aṭai gurupatnī yugati
binā yuddhe hr̥daẏe to paḍu bajra śakati | 91 |
ẏeṇu dropatīṁka śāpe ghaṭautkaṭa pañchu prāṇa naṣṭa | 92 |
gurujanaṁka bacana ki hoiba āna rīti
teṇu binā yuddhe ghaṭautkaṭa hr̥daẏe paḍilā śakati | 93 |
hiḍimbikī ye tahiṁ thilā kalāṭi ki kopa | 94 |
dropatīṁkara śāpa śuṇi hiḍimbikī kopa kaẏe | 95 |
stirīmānaṁka asatī tu tohora pañchu pati | 96 |
koṭi pāṭa abhiṣekī lo aṭe mora suta
stirīṁki ta namaskāra hoibā nohai yugata | 97 |
tu moḍhī āṇṭhukuḍi lo aṭu aputrikī
asatīṁkara madhye ye tote ālo lekhi | 98 |
abaśya lo pāñchaputra jāta hoibe tora garbhe
sāta sāta baraṣe śira cchedana hoibe bāḷabhābe | 99 |
boile beni badhūṁkara śāpye hoilā ta baṁśa naṣṭa | 100 | 4243 + 100 = 4343

div.note: –“tu moṛhī āṇṭhakuḍi lo aṭu aputrikī” pare ‘ṭha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
para pua maṇi tuhi dilu gurudaṇḍa
baṁśa buḍāilu niśce buḍila to piṇḍa |
div.head: {@bhīmasena aśvatthāmā ratha piṅgidebā<lb/>aśvatthāmā hastīra nidhana o tāhāra baṁśābaḷī@}

lg.l: ghaṭautkaṭa badha hoilā aṛhāi prahara rāti | 1 |
āja tohora kāḷa pūrilā re bhīmā | 6 |
guṇa ṭaṁkāra kariṇa se dhailā kodaṇḍa | 7 |
binddhalā kopeṇa se aśastamā na yāi gaṇanā | 8 |
kehi kāhākaiṁ samare nohanti ye occha
giribara prāẏeka diśilā bhīmara bāma aṅga
tiniśata nārāja paḍi hoilā sarba bhaṅga | 18 |
rome rome gaḷilā āsi se pabanara suta | 19 |
śūnyapure ghoṭilāka kampilā brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tini | 22 |
re re kāra kariṇa se kopeṇa pracaṇḍa
begeṇa dhailā yāiṁ aśastamāra ratha daṇḍa | 23 |
śarīra kampai tāra kadaḷī patra prāẏe
aśastamāra ratha dhari phiṅgidilā pabanara baḷā | 25 |
yamunā nadī jiṇi paḍile batiśa yojana ante | 26 |

div.note: –yesaneke ākāśuṁ paḍai nirighāta |(ṭha, cha, tha, gha, ña, ca, jha)

lg.l: ratha akha caka bhāṁka aśve hoileka cūri
gata ātmā prāẏe hoi paḍiacchi droṇi | 29 |
kopeṇa brikodara ye bāma aṁga pāti
paḍiṇa cūra gale mudugara yāṭhi śakati | 36 |
bāma aṅga ābori ye caḷai māruti
rathe ratha piṭi kachāḍai gaje gaja
dui dui aśva dhai se piṭai mahāteja | 38 |
asra śasa karante se na karanti bhaẏe

div.note: –aneka śahasrakaiṁ na karai bhaẏe<lb/>śaraṇe anibāraṇa se raṇeṇa ajaẏe |(ṇa, cha)

lg.l: śaraṇa boile goḍāi duguṇa piṭai bhīmasenā | 41 |
tinilakṣa yoddhā paḍile ratha gaja aśva pādānti
tāhā caḍhi nārāja baraṣai māḷaba catrabratī | 44 |
baḍāi agocara ẏe aśvatthāmā nāgara kathā | 45 |
kāhuṁ āṇilā ẏe kehu tāhā dhari
sādhu se māḷaba rājā kemante tāhā caṛhi | 46 |

div.note: –raṇeṇa aśyānti ye bīradhu yāhāra bānā<lb/>śaraṇa boile goḍāi mārai sainā |(ṭa, ṇa)
–bairābata nāmeṇa ye mahānāga meghanāda |(ja, na, cha, kha)

lg.l: gaṇapatira śira ẏe puṣyadanta dantāra muṇḍa
bhīmeka māri ẏehā kalā beni khaṇḍa | 52 |
bhāratha yuddhe muṁ ẏehānta dekhili duhinti | 55 |
bhīṣmarūpa dhaile ẏe pr̥thīki hoanti sari
upara baṁśara mahimāṁ pratakṣe āmbhe jāṇuṁ
tera kośa kamba ẏehā kiṁke parimāṇu | 57 |
bharatha samara bhūmi dvādaśa yojana sthaḷī
thorahaste ẏe jumbadīpa pr̥thī pāranti toḷi | 58 | 4343 + 58 = 4401

div.note: –mandara bhānugada (ta) mandara hastipada (kha, na)
madana, anāda, madanauneda (ṭa, ja)
madana udenada, madana unmada (ña, ṅa)
ityādi pāṭhāntara uparokta pothiguṛikare dekhāyāe |
div.head: {@droṇa badha@}

lg.l: ẏehā śuṇi triputi se baibasuta manu
aśvatthāmā hāthī yuddha kathā mote kahibā tapodhanu | 1 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho bilaṁkā deśa ādhi
se aśvatthāmā hāthī chamuku ẏekā bhīmasena yodhī | 2 |
dutī mandara giri jāṇi se bhīmasenara kāẏe| 3 |
bāāna bāāna bhāra badā beni hāthe
aśvtthāmā nāgara kumbhasthaḷe prahāra kalā tame | 6 |
raṇa bhūmire paḍilā aneka sanya māḍi
bho rājana rahiṇa samra dekhuthile ye tridaśe
thāṭha yākare śubhilā yahuṁ ẏesaneka śabada
aśvatthāmā hata boli śubhai ghora nāda | 10 |
agnira chamure ke abā ubhāhoi pāru | 11 |
kr̥ṣṇabarṇṇa prāẏe tāra pañchu ahibrata hāthī | 12 |

div.note: –kāśmīra deśara rājā kāśīśvara nr̥pati |(cha, ja, ña)

lg.l: dhāmanti droṇa ye kāśīśvara rājā dekhi
yesaneka bāta bighāte paḍai paṁku phaḷa
bāẏaibā śahasreka ye māile kope droṇaguru
śara hāboḍante kāśīśvara paḍilā gajara uparu | 18 |
hr̥de paḍi śara piṭhi katiki phuṭi
tinisahasra yoddhā tule droṇa kāṭile tāra bakṣa | 23 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe droṇa kāṭile tāhāra tanu | 24 |
tiniśata yoddhā tule se rājā hoilā panthāḷi | 25 |

div.note: tiniśata yoddhā tule se hoilā mahīāḷī |(dha, ja, cha)

lg.l: praśu koṭhāra gheni chedile samasta rājānta | 26 |
ratha gaja aśva ye bāhāna nāhiṁ kicchi
dhanu nāhiṁ troṇa nāhiṁ kare kr̥pāṇeka acchi | 28 |
trikaccha basaneka pinddha bitrama siṁha ṭhāṇi
brāhmaṇa hou kibā śūdrahiṁ hou paḍile āge hāṇi | 29 |
tini ghaḍira madhye droṇa kāṭile ẏete muṇḍa | 30 |
karṇṇara chamure śahasra dhari bijaẏe mahābaḷa | 32 |
nakuḷara rathe prahāra kalā ati rāge | 33 |
karṇṇara parigha bighāte nakuḷa ratha bhāji
prahāra kalā nei karṇṇa rathe konte
ghāntike phuṭilā ratha aśva sārathi sahite | 35 |
āre raha raha boli karṇṇa bāma kare konta dhari | 37 |
konta dharanteṇa śūnya hātha hoilā nakuḷa
kāḷa catra prāẏe se bulāi beni ḍoḷā
bāmakare nakuḷara keśa ḍāhāṇa kare karabāḷa | 39 |
adhare danta chāpi kare khare khaḍaga gheni jhuṇi
re re pāṇḍabā tora śira chedibi ẏehikṣaṇi | 40 |
ẏete lokaṁkara madhye ke āja tote rakhi | 41 |
lohasāra gadā beni gheniāsi miḷilā karṇṇa pacha | 42 |
karṇṇara upare prahāra kalā se kṣatriẏa achārgaḷa | 43 |
mādrīra nandana nakuḷaku durddakṣa kalā rakṣā | 44 |
āsante bheṭilā se dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana | 49 |
karṇṇa boilā ye dhr̥ṣṭadyumana mukha chāhiṁ
